Be sleepy.ScenesRachel: Yes, and grumpy.ScenesChandler: What are you, stop naming dwarves! (on phone) Hello, Janice. Hi, I'm so glad that you called, I know I've been acting a really weird lately. And, it's just because I'm crazy about you, and I just got...stupid, and, and scared, and....stupid a couple of more times. I'm sorry. (listens) Really?! (listens) Really?!ScenesRachel: He's soo lucky, if Janice were a guy, she'd be sleeping with somebody else by now.ScenesChandler: (on phone) I love you too.ScenesMonica: Aw, it's soo unfair. (they both start digging into the 'good' ice cream)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Carol and Susan are picking up Ben, while Monica is pouring chocolate syrup, lots of it, into her ice cream.]
rows.Content: Carol: G. I. Joe. G. I. Joe?!ScenesRoss: Hey, I don't know what to tell you guys that's the doll he chose.ScenesSusan: What'd you do, dip it in sugar?ScenesRoss: Look, G. I. Joe's in, Barbi's out. And if you guys can't deal with it, that's your 'too bad.'ScenesMonica: What are you being such a weenie for? So he has a Barbi, big deal. You used to dress up like a woman.ScenesRoss: What?ScenesMonica: Well, you used to dress up in Mom's clothes all the time.ScenesRoss: What are you talking about?ScenesMonica: The big hat, the pearls, the little pick handbag.ScenesRoss: Okay, you are totally making this up.ScenesMonica: How can you not remember? You made us call you...Bea.ScenesRoss: (remembering) Oh God.ScenesSusan: I've literally never been this happy.ScenesMonica: Wasn't there a little song?ScenesCarol: Oh please God, let there be a song.ScenesRoss: There was no song. (to Monica) There was no song!ScenesMonica: (singing) 'I am Bea.'ScenesRoss: Okay.ScenesMonica: 'I drink tea.'ScenesRoss: Okay, that's, that's enough. (retreats to the bathroom)ScenesMonica: '....Won't you, won't you, won't you.... 'ScenesRoss: (coming out of the bathroom) Won't you dance around with me.ScenesMonica: A-ha!!! (they all start laughing, as Ross hides in the bathroom)ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: It's an old home movie of the Geller's backyard, young Ross is dressed up as Bea, and pouring himself/herself some tea.]
rows.Content: Young Ross: (singing) 'I am Bea. I drink tea. Won't you dance around with....' (spills some tea and it drips onto his/her dress) Ohhh! (runs away crying)ScenesYoung Monica: (entering the shot) Ross!!! (starts to wipe up the spill)ScenesEndScenesThe One With Frank Jr.ScenesWritten by: Scott Silveri & Shana Goldnerg-Meehan.ScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joeys, there is lumber all over the apartment]
rows.Content: Chandler: (entering) Hey!ScenesJoey: Hey!ScenesChandler: Hey-hey-hey. So what happened? A forest tick you off?ScenesJoey: No. Y'know how were always saying we need a place for the mail.ScenesChandler: Yeah!ScenesJoey: Well, I started building one. But then I decided to take it to the next step.ScenesChandler: Youre building a post office?ScenesJoey: No, an entertainment unit, with a mail cubby built right in. Its a one day job, max.ScenesChandler: Okay. (notices that Joey is wearing some really tight jeans) My word! Those are snug.ScenesJoey: Oh yeah. These are my old work pants, Sergio Valentes.Scenes(Chandler goes to his bedroom and opens the door. However, only the top half opens, and he trips into his bedroom over the bottom half.)ScenesJoey: Power saw kinda got away from me there.ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Outside Central Perk, Phoebe is pacing back and forth waiting for someone.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (joining Phoebe outside) Hey Pheebs.ScenesPhoebe: Hey!ScenesRachel: Any sign of your brother?ScenesPhoebe: No, but hes always late.ScenesRachel: I thought you only met him once?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, I did. I think it sounds y'know big sistery, y'know, Franks always late.ScenesRachel: Well relax, hell be here.ScenesPhoebe: No, I know, Im just nervous. Y'know its just y'know Moms dead, dont talk to my sister, Grandmas been sleeping a lot lately. Its like the last desperate chance to have a family, y'know, kinda thing. Youre so sweet to wait with me.ScenesRachel: Well, actually Gunther sent me. Youre not allowed to have cups out here, its a thing. (takes her cup and goes back inside)

rows.Scenes: inside Central Perk]
rows.Content: Chandler: Does anyone else think David Copperfield is cute?ScenesMonica: No, but he told me, he thinks your a fox.ScenesChandler: All right, Janice, likes him. In fact she likes him so much she put him on her freebie list.ScenesJoey: Her what?ScenesChandler: Well, we have a deal, where we each get to pick five celebrities that we can sleep with, and the other one cant get mad.ScenesRoss: Ah, the heart of every healthy relationship. Honesty, respect, and sex with celebrities.ScenesMonica: So, Chandler, whos on your list?ScenesChandler: Ah, Kim Basinger, Cindy Crawford, Halle Berry, Yasmine Bleeth, and ah, Jessica Rabbit.ScenesRachel: Now, you do realize that shes a cartoon, and way out of your league?ScenesChandler: I know, I know, I just always wondered if I could get her eyes to pop out of her head.ScenesJoey: Hey, Monica, who would yours be?ScenesMonica: First, I need a boyfriend, then I can have a list.ScenesJoey: Its just a game Mon. (makes a Can-you-believe-her face to the rest of the gang.) Rach, how about you?ScenesRachel: Oh, I dont know, I guess, Chris ODonnel, John F. Kennedy, Jr., Daniel Day Lewis, Sting, and Parker Stevenson.ScenesRoss: Spiderman?ScenesRachel: Hardy Boy.ScenesChandler: Peter Parker.ScenesRoss: Thank you.ScenesRachel: What about you honey, who would be on your list?ScenesRoss: Well I-I-I, that kind of thing requires some serious thought. First, Ill divide my perspective canidates into catergories....ScenesChandler: (coughing) What a geek!ScenesPhoebe: (entering) Everbody this is Frank! This is my half-brother Frank.ScenesAll: Oh, hi.ScenesPhoebe: This is everybody. This is Ross.ScenesFrank: How are you?ScenesRoss: Hey.ScenesPhoebe: Chandler.ScenesChandler: Hi.ScenesFrank: Hi.ScenesPhoebe: Joey.ScenesJoey: Hey-hey!ScenesFrank: Hey.ScenesPhoebe: This is Monica.ScenesFrank: Whoa!ScenesPhoebe: And this is Rachel.ScenesRachel: Hi!ScenesFrank: Whoa!!ScenesPhoebe: Im gonna get coffee.ScenesFrank: Hey, how do you guys get anything done?ScenesChandler: We dont, really.ScenesRachel: Well, so, now, do you guys have a lot of big plans?ScenesPhoebe: Oh yeah! Yeah, no, were gonna connect, y'know bond, and everything.ScenesFrank: Yeah, I was thinking that maybe we could go down to Time Square and pick up some ninja stars. And, oh, um, my friend Larry, he wants me to take a picture of a hooker.ScenesChandler: You know, we dont really take advantage of living in the city.ScenesJoey: I know.

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joeys, Joey is drilling a hole in the wall and the drill comes out the other side really close to Chandlers head. Chandler then rushes out to talk to Joey.]
rows.Content: Joey: Oh, Im sorry. Did I get ya?ScenesChandler: No, you didnt get me!! Its an electric drill, you get me, you kill me!!ScenesJoey: Calm down, do you want this unit or not?ScenesChandler: I do NOT want this unit!!ScenesJoey: Well, you shouldve told me that before, Im not a mind reader. Hey, were out of beer. Im going to Monicas.ScenesChandler: Fine! (goes into his room and slams the door, then he slams the bottom half of the door.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachels, Joey is entering]
rows.Content: Monica: Hey! Where ya headin in those pants? 1982?ScenesJoey: Oh Monica, listen, I ah, I saw down at the hardware store, they got those designer tiles on sale. If you ever want to redo the bathroom floor.ScenesMonica: Why, whats wrong with my bathroom floor?ScenesJoey: Nothing. Its just old and dingy, thats all.ScenesMonica: I highly doubt that. (they both go to the bathroom)ScenesJoey: Oh yeah. If you ah, move your hamper, you see what color the tile used to be. (Monica gasps) Yeah.ScenesMonica: I cant live like this! What are we gonna do? What are we gonna do?ScenesJoey: Relax. Here hold this (hands her his beer). This old stuff just comes right off. (he bends down to try and lift some tile right in the middle of the floor, in his tight pants.)ScenesMonica: Thats a little more than I wanted to see.ScenesJoey: (manages to pry off only a small piece) Aw! Look at that, every inch of this stuff is glued down. Itd take forever to pry this up. You should ah, you should just leave it. (starts to walk away, but Monica grabs him)ScenesMonica: I cant leave it! You gouged a hole in my dingy floor.Scenes(Joey places the toliet brush and holder over the hole, which is in the middle of the floor.)ScenesJoey: Eh! There you go.ScenesMonica: You know thats nice, y'know we could put it back there after the surgeons remove it from your colon!

rows.Scenes: Phoebes, Frank and her, are sitting on the counh, watching TV]
rows.Content: Phoebe: (sits up) Oh, ew!ScenesFrank: What?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah I know what I wanted to ask you. Um, can you roll your tongue? Because I can, and my Mom couldnt, and I thought y'know, I figured that was something I got from our Dad.ScenesFrank: What, wait, you mean like this? (does it)ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, yeah. You can do it to. (tries to do it, but cant)ScenesFrank: Your not doing it.ScenesPhoebe: Oh right, yeah okay, my Mom could, and I cant. We dont have that....ScenesFrank: Whens your birthday?ScenesPhoebe: Feburary 16th.ScenesFrank: I know a guy whos the 18th.ScenesPhoebe: Wow, thats close. Whens yours?ScenesFrank: October 25th.ScenesPhoebe: Thats the same month as Halloween. So, um, what kinda things do you like to do at home?ScenesFrank: Melt stuff.

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Ross is working on his list]
rows.Content: Ross: Okay, Ive got three of my five.ScenesRachel: Three of your five, what?ScenesRoss: Celebrities Im allowed to sleep with.ScenesRachel: Oh my God! You are giving this a lot of thought.ScenesRoss: Yeah, its hard okay, I only have two spots left.ScenesChandler: All right, so who do you got it narrowed down to?ScenesRoss: Okay, Elizabeth Hurely....ScenesChandler: Oooh-hoo, very attractive, forgiving.ScenesRoss: Susan Sarandon.ScenesChandler: Eh, y'know what, shes to political, she probably wouldnt let you do it, unless you donated four cans of food first.ScenesRoss: And!! Isabella Rosselini.ScenesChandler: Ooh-hoo. Very hot, very sexy. But ah, y'know shes too international, y'know shes never gonna be around.ScenesRachel: So?ScenesChandler: So, you gotta play the odds, pick somebody whos gonna be in the country like all the time.ScenesRachel: Yeah, cause thats why you wont get Isabella Rosselini, geography.

rows.Scenes: Phoebes, Frank is melting a plastic spoon.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Okay so, by melting, you meant melting.ScenesFrank: Yeah.ScenesPhoebe: So is it like art?ScenesFrank: Yeah, you can melt art. Hey, can I use your phone?ScenesPhoebe: Um, yeah sure. Why you wanna call your Mom?ScenesFrank: No, I wanna melt it.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, well um, not right now. Y'know Im just gonna go to bed, I think the fumes are giving me a headache.ScenesFrank: (starts laughing) Yeah!ScenesPhoebe: Gnight, bro.ScenesFrank: Gnight.ScenesPhoebe: Here. (gives him a fire extinguisher) Y'know, just in case.ScenesFrank: Oh, excellent. (starts to melt the fire extinguishers hose.)ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachels, Phoebe is eating breakfast with Monica while Frank is playing with num-chucks on the balcony]
rows.Content: Monica: What kind of karate is that?ScenesPhoebe: No kind. He just makes it up.ScenesMonica: So hows it going with you guys?ScenesPhoebe: So far, it kinda blows. I dont know, I just thought y'know that hed feel more like a brother y'know, like you and Ross, just like close and connected and....ScenesMonica: Oh honey, were close now but you-you wouldnt believe the years of-of nugies, and wedgies, and flying wedgies, and atomic wedgies, and....(Phoebe shakes her head like she doesnt understand) Thats where the waistband actually goes over your head.ScenesPhoebe: Ah!!ScenesMonica: Oh, we used to drive each other crazy playing the shadow game.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, how do you play the shadow game?ScenesMonica: Oh, how do you play the shadow game?ScenesPhoebe: I just asked you.ScenesMonica: I just asked you.ScenesPhoebe: I dont have time for this.ScenesMonica: No, that is what the game is.ScenesPhoebe: Which you just gave up really quickly.ScenesChandler: (entering) Have you seen Joey?ScenesMonica: Whats the matter?ScenesChandler: Oh, just this! (turns around and has a paint lid stuck to the back of his pants.) Yknow what its my fault really, because the couch is usually where we keep the varnish.ScenesJoey: (yelling from bathroom) Hey, does somebody wanna hand me one of those tiles.ScenesChandler: Whats going on?ScenesMonica: Hes retiling my floor. (they both run to the bathroom)ScenesChandler: Yo!! Spackel boy! Get up!ScenesMonica: Ah-ah-ah, now you started this, you will finish it.ScenesChandler: He started mine first!ScenesPhoebe: Build the unit Cinderelly, lay the tile Cinderelly.

rows.Scenes: Phoebes, Phoebe and Frank are watching TV.]
rows.Content: Frank: Whoa! Big octopus.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah. (phone rings and Phoebe answers it) Hello. (listens) Oh my God, I totally forgot! (listens) Well cant someone else do it. (listens) But, I have company. (listens) Yeah, no look, thats all right Ill come in. (hangs up phone) Um, Frank, Im really sorry but I have to go to work. Its-its one of my regulars and hes insisting that I do um.ScenesFrank: Hey, what kind of work do you do?ScenesPhoebe: Oh! Im a masseuse. I give people massages and stuff.ScenesFrank: You-you work at one of those massage parlors?ScenesPhoebe: Well, y'know we dont call it that, but yeah!ScenesFrank: (starts laughing) Wow! Thats wild! No, I had no idea.ScenesPhoebe: All righty. Ill be back in-in a little bit. Unless you wanna come with me?ScenesFrank: You mean like watch?ScenesPhoebe: No, no, you can get one yourself. Itll be on the house! Y'know what are big sisters for?ScenesFrank: Well, I dont think this, y'know.ScenesPhoebe: No, no, no, I wouldnt do you myself, I mean that would be weird. Yeah, no, Ill get one of the other girls to do it. Oh, this will be so much fun! Hey! Are you excited?ScenesFrank: Yeah! Hey, do Monica and Rachel work there?

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachels bathroom, Joey and Monica are admiring the new floor.]
rows.Content: Monica: Its beautiful! Its like the first bathroom floor there ever was. (Chandler tries to go to the bathroom) Whoa! Are you going in there for?ScenesChandler: What, like a number?ScenesRoss: (entering) Hey!ScenesChandler: Hi! Bye! (runs to the bathroom)ScenesRoss: Okay, Im done with my choices, these are final. (holds up a little card)ScenesRachel: Well, its about time.ScenesJoey: Ooh, very official.ScenesRoss: Oh, yeah, well y'know Chandler printed it up on his computer.ScenesMonica: And who laminated it?ScenesRoss: That would be me.ScenesRachel: All right let me see. (grabs the card) Uma Thurman, Winona Ryder, Elizabeth Hurely, Michelle Pfieffer, and Dorothy Hammel?ScenesRoss: Hey, its my list.ScenesRachel: Okay honey, you do realize she only spins like that on ice.

rows.Scenes: Healing Hands Inc. (Phoebes work), Frank is being ushered in, by the arm, to the room Phoebe is in by another girl.]
rows.Content: Frank: Ow!-Ow!-Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Y'know, ow!ScenesPhoebe: Hey!-Hey! Whats going on?ScenesFrank: She broke my arm.ScenesGirl: He touched my fanny.ScenesFrank: No, she touched mine first!ScenesGirl: Thats my job!ScenesFrank: So wait, whats the deal here, I can have sex with you, but I cant touch you?ScenesPhoebe and Girl: Ewww!!!ScenesPhoebe: You cant have sex with her!ScenesGirl: Whatd you think I was, a hooker?ScenesFrank: No, your a masseuse, its cool, Im not a cop.ScenesPhoebe: Okay, Jasmine, can you, can you ask Mr. Whiffler if he can wait for like five minutes.ScenesJasmine: Fine. (starts to leave, and points at Frank) I dont like you!! (leaves)ScenesPhoebe: (turns around and hits Frank) So thats what you thought I did!! God! Thats not what I do!ScenesFrank: Wait thats-thats, what thats not what you do?ScenesPhoebe: Nooo! Why would you think that?ScenesFrank: I dont know, I mean, y'know, this is the city y'know, I just, I mean, I dont know.ScenesPhoebe: Whatever, its the perfect end to the perfect weekend anyways.ScenesFrank: Oh, wait, no your right, no it was perfect and I cant believe that I screwed it up so bad.ScenesPhoebe: You really thought it was perfect?ScenesFrank: Well, no, maybe-maybe it wasnt perfect, but y'know it was pretty cool, y'know, cause we had all those great talks y'know.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, um, which ones in particular were great for you?ScenesFrank: Well y'know about the tongue thing, y'know, and how I told you about my likes and my dislikes...ScenesPhoebe: I dont....ScenesFrank: How-how I like to melt stuff, and how I dislike stuff that doesnt melt.ScenesPhoebe: Right, okay, um-mm.ScenesFrank: Yeah, y'know I feel like I can really talk to you cause y'know youre my sister, y'know.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, I guess I do, yeah.ScenesFrank: Then I go feel your friend up and make you mad at me.ScenesPhoebe: Well, I-I wasnt hopping mad, y'know.ScenesFrank: You hopped a little bit. Yeah, I really sorry.ScenesPhoebe: Okay. All right, this is my favourite part of the weekend, right now, this.ScenesFrank: This?ScenesPhoebe: Uh-huh.ScenesFrank: Oh come on we went, we went to Time Square, we found ninja stars, I almost got arm broken by a hooker...ScenesPhoebe: She wasnt a hooker.ScenesFrank: Well, when I tell my friends about her she will be.

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joeys, everyone is there, helping to lift the entertainment center into place]
rows.Content: Chandler: Okay, on three. One....Two....ScenesJoey: Why dont we just go on two.ScenesChandler: Why two?ScenesJoey: Because its faster.ScenesChandler: Yeah, I coulda counted to three like four times without all this two talk.ScenesRachel: Oh!ScenesJoey: All right, but in the future...ScenesRoss: Okay!! Okay!!ScenesRachel: Come on!ScenesRoss: Heavy thing, not getting lighter!ScenesChandler: Okay, one...two...ScenesJoey: So we are going on two?ScenesAll: All right!! (they lift it into place, however there is one small problem, the unit is so long that it blocks some of both of their bedroom doors.)ScenesChandler: Oh, good job Joe.ScenesJoey: Wow, its big!ScenesChandler: Yeah-yeah, so big that it actually makes our doors look smaller!ScenesJoey: Maybe, my rulers wrong.ScenesPhoebe: Maybe all the rulers are wrong.ScenesJoey: Look its not that bad. So what, it blocks a little of your door, a little of my door.ScenesChandler: Yeah, y'know what I got a better idea. How-how bout it blocks none of mine door and a lot of yours? (throws his shoulder into the center to try and move it, but it doesnt move.)ScenesJoey: Yeah, listen, before I forget that side is still wet.

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Rachel is serving some guy coffee.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Okay sir, um-mm, let see if I got this right. Ah, so this is a half-caf, double tall, easy hazel nut, non-fat, no foam, with whip, extra hot latte, right? (the guy nods) Okay, great. (she starts to walk away and under her breath) You freak.Scenes(Isabella Rosselini enters)ScenesRoss: (to Gunther) Thank you.ScenesIsabella: (to Gunther) Um, coffee to go, please.Scenes(Ross recognises her and goes over to the couch, mouthing Oh my GodScenesRoss: Isabella Rosselini. (points to her)ScenesMonica: Are you serious? (they all look) Oh my God.ScenesRoss: Damn! I cant believe I took her off my list.ScenesMonica: Why? Cause otherwise youd go for it?ScenesRoss: Yeah, maybe.ScenesRachel: Oh-oh, you lie.ScenesRoss: What you dont think Id go up to her?ScenesRachel: Ross, it took you ten years to finally admit you liked me.ScenesRoss: Yeah, well missy, you better be glad that list is laminated.ScenesRachel: You know what honey, you go ahead, well call her an alternate.ScenesRoss: Okay, hold my crawler.ScenesRachel: Okay.ScenesMonica: Rach, are you really gonna let him do this?ScenesRachel: Honey, hes about to go hit on Isabella Rosselini. Im just sorry we dont got popcorn.ScenesRoss: (to Isabella) Hi! Hi, Im Ross, you dont know me, but Im a big, big fan of yours. I mean, Blue Velvet, woo-oo hoo! Um, I was wondering if I could um, maybe buy you a cup of coffee? (Gunther hands her change) Or maybe reimburse you for that one?ScenesIsabella: Arent you with that girl over there? (points at Rachel, who waves back)ScenesRoss: Well, yeah, kinda. Um, but thats okay, see we have an understanding, um, see we each have this list of five famous people, (gets his out) so Im allowed to sleep with you. No, no, no, its flattery.ScenesIsabella: Im sorry. (starts to leave)ScenesRoss: Oh no, no, no, wait, wait, Isabella. Dont, dont just dismiss this so fast. I mean this is a once in a lifetime opportunity...ScenesIsabella: Yeah, for you. Is that the list?ScenesRoss: Um, yeah.ScenesIsabella: May I see it?ScenesRoss: Um, no.ScenesIsabella: Come on! (grabs the list)ScenesRoss: But, okay.ScenesIsabella: (reading it) Im not on the list!ScenesRoss: Um, see, but thats not the final draft.ScenesIsabella: Its laminated!ScenesRoss: Yeah, um, okay see, you were, you were on the list but my friend, Chandler (Chandler waves) brought up the very good point that you are international, so I bumped you for Wynona Rider, local.ScenesIsabella: Y'know its ironic...ScenesRoss: What?ScenesIsabella: ...because I have a list of five goofy coffee house guys and yesterday I bumped you for that guy over there. (points at a guy and leaves)ScenesRoss: (to the rest of the gang) Were just gonna be friends.ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joeys, they are admiring the entertainment center]
rows.Content: Joey: Y'know what?ScenesChandler: Umm?ScenesJoey: I bet ya ya I could fit in there. (points to a hole in the center)ScenesChandler: Ive got five bucks says you cant.ScenesJoey: Get out your checkbook, mister.ScenesChandler: Oh, I think I have the cash.Scenes(Joey successfully enters the entertainment center, and Chandler closes the door on Joey.)ScenesJoey: You are dogged man! I totally fit!ScenesChandler: Yeah, you got me. (picks up a 2x4 and puts it through the handles so that the doors wont open) Im out five big ones! (puts the money in the crack between the door and frame) Here you go.ScenesJoey: Thank you. Cha-ching! (Chandler starts to leave) Oh, well hello Mr. Lincoln. Better luck next time buddy. (Chandler leaves and closes the door) And the drinks are on me!ScenesEndScenesThe One With The FlashbackScenesWritten by: Marta Kauffman & David CraneScenesTranscribed by: Eric AasenScenes{Transcriber's Note: Rachel has two friends that are not named, so I referred to them as Friend No. 1 and Friend No. 2.}

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, the whole gang is there including Janice.]
rows.Content: Janice: Janice has a question. Who of the six of you has sleep with the six of you?ScenesPhoebe: Wow, its like a dirty math problem.ScenesRoss: Im sorry the answer there would be...none of us.ScenesJanice: Come on over the years none of you ever y'know, got drunk and stupid.ScenesJoey: Well, thats really a different question.ScenesJanice: Im sorry I find it hard to believe that a group of people who spends as much time together as you guys do has never bumped uglies.ScenesJoey: Well, there was that one time that Monica and Rachel got together.ScenesMonica and Rachel: What?!!ScenesRachel: Excuse me, there was no time!ScenesJoey: Okay, but lets say there was. How might that go?ScenesJanice: Okay, okay, well then answer me this. Has any of you ever.... almost?ScenesRachel: Does anybody need more coffee?ScenesRoss: Yeah, Ill take some.ScenesJoey: Hey, theres a dog out there!ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Monica and Phoebes, three years earlier, Phoebe, Monica, and Ross are there]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Oh, that is so unfortunate.ScenesRoss: What?ScenesPhoebe: Cute naked guy is really starting to put on weight.ScenesMonica: (entering from bedroom) Okay, Ill be back in just a minute. Oh, Phoebe Im sorry that I left lipstick marks on the phone.ScenesPhoebe: You didnt leave lipstick marks on the phone.ScenesMonica: Oh, then it mustve been you. Bye. (leaves)ScenesPhoebe: (angrily) Bye-bye! (to Ross) Thats why I moved out.ScenesRoss: Hey, y'know while were on that, when are you gonna tell my sister that you dont live here anymore.ScenesPhoebe: I think on some levels she already knows.ScenesRoss: Phoebe, she doesnt know that you sneak out every night, she doesnt know that you sneak back every morning, and she doesnt know that youve been living with your Grandmothers for a week now.ScenesPhoebe: Okay, well maybe not on those levels.ScenesChandler: (entering, with a goatee) Hey.ScenesRoss: Hey.ScenesChandler: Im never gonna find a roommate, ever.ScenesPhoebe: Why, nobody good?ScenesChandler: Well lets see, there was the guy with the ferrets, thats plural. The spitter. Oh-ho, and yes, the guy that enjoyed my name so much he felt the need to make a little noise every time he said it. Nice to meet you, Chandler Bing Bing! Great apartment Chandler Bing, Bing!ScenesRoss: So how many more do you have tomorrow?ScenesChandler: Two. This photographer, who seemed really dull. And this actor guy, who Im not sure about, because when he called and I answered the phone Chandler Bing, he said Whoa-whoa, short message.ScenesMonica: (entering) Ross (who has his foot on the coffee table), foot on the floor or come over no more!ScenesRoss: (to Phoebe) Sure, your dresser is missing but this she notices.ScenesMonica: What?ScenesRoss: I have to go. Yeah, Carol should be home by now, soo...ScenesChandler: Umm, hows it going with you guys?ScenesRoss: Oh, better, actually. Y'know I-I-I think I finally figured out why we were having so much trouble lately.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, really?ScenesRoss: Yeah, y'know how I have you guys, well she doesnt really have any close friends that are just hers, but last week she meet this woman at the gym, Susan something, and they really hit it off, and I-I-I think its gonna make a difference

rows.Scenes: Chandlers, Chandler is interviewing a potential roommate.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Soo, ah, Eric, what kind of photography do ya do?ScenesEric: Oh, mostly fashion, so there may be models here from time to time, I hope thats cool.ScenesChandler: Yes, that is cool. Because I have models here y'know......never.ScenesEric: Oh, yeah, during the summer, I spend most weekends at my sisters beach house, which you are welcome to use by the way. Although, I should probably tell you, shes a porn star. (Chandler breaks his pencil in half)ScenesChandler: Well, listen I ah, still have one more person to ah meet, but unless it turns out to be your sister, I think youre chances are pretty good. (Eric offers to shake hands) All right. (Chandler hugs him.)

rows.Scenes: Chandlers, Chandler is interviewing Joey.]
rows.Content: Chandler: (running around the apartment pointing out things) Bedroom. Bathroom. Living room. This right here is the kitchen, and thanks for coming by, (opens door) Bye-bye.ScenesJoey: Dont you ah, dont you wanna ask me any questions?ScenesChandler: Sure. Ummm. Whats up?ScenesJoey: Well, ah, Im an actor. Im fairly neat. I ah, I got my own TV. Oh, and dont worry Im totally okay with the gay thing.ScenesChandler: What gay thing?ScenesJoey: Ah, y'know just in general people being gay, thing. Im totally cool with that.

rows.Scenes: the hallway, Monica is coming up the stairs.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Well okay Jerry, thanks for stopping by.Scenes(Joey is leaving and notices Monica, as Monica notices him)ScenesMonica: Hi.ScenesJoey: Hey!Scenes(Joey leaves and Monica mouths to Chandler Oh my God!)

rows.Scenes: A bar, Chandler is entering.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Hey, Mon.ScenesMonica: Hey-hey-hey. You wanna hear something that sucks.ScenesChandler: Do I ever.ScenesMonica: Chris says theyre closing down the bar.ScenesChandler: No way!ScenesMonica: Yeah, apparently theyre turning it into some kinda coffee place.ScenesChandler: Just coffee! Where are we gonna hang out now?ScenesMonica: Got me.ScenesChandler: (to bartender) Can I get a beer.ScenesMonica: Hey, did you pick a roommate?ScenesChandler: You betcha!ScenesMonica: Is it the Italian guy?ScenesChandler: Um-mm, yeah right!ScenesMonica: Hes so cute.ScenesChandler: Oh yes, and thats what I want a roommate that I can walk around with and be referred to as the funny one.ScenesMonica: Oh look, the pool tables free. Rack em up. Ill be back in just a minute. Get ready for me to whip your butt.ScenesChandler: Okay, but after that, were shootin some pool.ScenesRachel: (sitting at a table with some of her friends) (to waitress) Oh, um, no, no, no, no excuse me, hello. Hi. My friend ordered an onion, not an olive, and uh I ordered a rum and Diet Coke, which I dont think this is.ScenesWaitress: I am so sorry.ScenesRachel: Thats all right. (to her friends) I mean hard is it to get a couple drinks right, huh?ScenesFriend No. 1: Well, I would like to propose a toast to the woman, who in one year from today, become Mrs. Dr. Barry Farber DDSScenesRachel: Ummm, I think its time to see the ring again. (holds her hand out and they all scream)ScenesFriend No. 2: Oh, isnt it exciting, I mean its like having a boyfriend for life.ScenesRachel: Yeah, I know.ScenesFriend No. 1: What?ScenesRachel: Oh, I dont know. Well maybe its just the idea of Barry for the rest of my life. I dont know I think I feel like I need to have one last fling, y'know, just to sorta get it out of my system. (Chandler is listening in very intensely)ScenesFriend No. 1: Rachel stop!ScenesFriend No. 2: Youre so bad!ScenesRachel: Im serious, I really, I think I need just to have some...meaningless, sex y'know, with the next guy that I see.Scenes(Chandler throws the cue ball under there table.)ScenesChandler: Excuse, I seem to have dropped my ball.ScenesRachel: Yeah, so?ScenesChandler: (picks it up) And now Ive picked it up again. (walks over to Monica.)ScenesMonica: Oh my God, I went to high school with her. (to Rachel) Rachel! Hi!ScenesRachel: Monica! Look! Hi! What do ya think? (shows her, her ring)ScenesMonica: Oh my God, you cant even see where the Titanic hit it.ScenesRachel: Yes, his name is Barry, hes a doctor, thank you very much.ScenesMonica: Awww, just like you always wanted. CongratulationsScenesRachel: Thank you. So how-how bout you, are-are you seeing anybody?ScenesMonica: Aww, not right now.ScenesRachel: Oh, but thats okay.ScenesMonica: I know.ScenesRachel: Yeah.Scenes(An awkward silence)ScenesMonica: So, Ill get-get back to my friend.ScenesRachel: Oh, yeah, sure, sure, sure, sure. (points at Chandler, who holds up the cue ball as a Remember me? thing) Listen, can we please have lunch the next time Im in the city?ScenesMonica: Oh, thatd be great.ScenesRachel: Okay!ScenesMonica: Thanks.ScenesRachel: Bye!ScenesMonica: Bye! (to Chandler) Ten bucks says, I never see that woman again in my life.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Phoebes, Ross is on the phone, as Phoebe is walking by carrying a lamp.]
rows.Content: Ross: No real-, honey, really its fine, just g-go with Susan. Really, I, no, I think girls night out is a great idea. Okay, okay, byeScenesPhoebe: So what are they doing?ScenesRoss: I dont know, something girlie.ScenesPhoebe: (to Monica, whos entering) Hey, youre early.ScenesMonica: What are you doing with the lamp?ScenesPhoebe: Im just taking it to be re-wired.ScenesMonica: Oh, well dont take it to the same place you took the stereo, cause theyve had that thing for over a week.Scenes(There is a knock on the door, Phoebe answers it, its Mr. Heckles)ScenesPhoebe: No, no, Mr. Heckles no one is making any noise up here.ScenesMr. Heckles: Youre disturbing my oboe practice.ScenesPhoebe: You dont play the oboe!ScenesMr. Heckles: I could play the oboe!ScenesPhoebe: Then Im gonna have to ask you to keep it down. (slams the door in his face.)Scenes(in the hallway, Eric is moving in)ScenesMr. Heckles: (to Eric) Who are you?ScenesEric: Hi, Im Eric, Im gonna be Chandlers new roommate.ScenesMr. Heckles: Im Chandlers new roommate.ScenesEric: I-I-I dont think so.ScenesMr. Heckles: I could be Chandlers new roommate.ScenesEric: But, he told me over the phone.ScenesMr. Heckles: He told me in person.ScenesEric: Thats weird.ScenesMr. Heckles: Well, Im going to go into my new apartment now. (goes over to the door and opens it) Ehh! (Eric leaves)Scenes(inside Chandlers apartment, Chandler is coming in from his bedroom, sees Mr. Heckles, and screams.)

rows.Scenes: the hallway, Joey is moving in, Monica is leaving.]
rows.Content: Monica: Hi, again.ScenesJoey: Hey! (goes into the apartment)ScenesChandler: (leaving to go to work) Hey!ScenesMonica: Thank you soo, much.ScenesChandler: Oh, dont thank me, thank the jerk that never showed up. Okay, I gotta get to get to work.Scenes(Joey comes back into the hallway and starts to pick up a heavy box)ScenesMonica: You want some help with that?ScenesJoey: Oh, no thanks, I got it. (picks it up) No I dont!ScenesMonica: Whoa! Are you okay?ScenesJoey: Whew! Stood up to fast, got a little head rush.ScenesMonica: Its the heat. (has her hand on his chest, and then pulls it away) And-and the humidity.ScenesJoey: Thats a uh, thats a tough combination.ScenesMonica: Do you wanna come in for some lemonade?ScenesJoey: Like you wouldnt believe. (they go into the apartment) Wow! This is a great place.ScenesMonica: Thank you. Just make yourself comfortable.ScenesJoey: Gotcha.ScenesMonica: This place is really my Grandmothers. (Joey starts to take off all of his clothes, while Monica gets the glasses and pours the lemonade.) I got it from her when she moved to Florida, otherwise I could never afford a place like this. So if the landlord ever asks, Im 87 year old woman, whos afraid of her VCR. So are you thirsty?ScenesJoey: Oh, you bet I am!ScenesMonica: (turning around) Okay, heres your penis!ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: continued from earlier.]
rows.Content: Monica: Oh my God!!! What are you doing?!!ScenesJoey: You said, you wanna come in for some lemonade?ScenesMonica: So?!ScenesJoey: Whoa, ah!! Were you just gonna give me some lemonade?ScenesMonica: Yeah huh!! Cover yourself up!ScenesJoey: Oh right, right.ScenesMonica: I dont believe this! When someone asks you in for lemonade, and to you that means they wanna have sex?ScenesJoey: Well usually...yeah! Well, not just lemonade, iced tea, sometimes juice. Well, sorry, I just, I thought you liked me. Im such a jerk.ScenesMonica: Its okay. I suppose it could happen to anyone, not anyone I know, but... By the way I can still see it.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Phoebes, Monica is vacuuming.]
rows.Content: Monica: Pheebs?ScenesPhoebe: Huh?ScenesMonica: Wheres your bed?ScenesPhoebe: Its not in the apartment? (Monica gives a Come on look) Oh no. I cant believe this is happening again.ScenesMonica: What?ScenesPhoebe: Okay, enough with the third degree! I-Ive, I dont live here anymore.ScenesMonica: What are you talking about?ScenesPhoebe: Im sorry, I-I-I-I dont live here anymore. I-I didnt know how to tell you, but y'know everybody else knows!ScenesMonica: Everybody knows!ScenesPhoebe: That was supposed to be a good thing, I forget why. Just listen, Monica, I, do you know, okay, do you know, I couldnt sleep for like a month because I got like a dot of ink on one of the sofa cushions.ScenesMonica: Well, you-you coulda just turned the cushion over.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, I wouldve except I had a big spaghetti stain on the other side.ScenesMonica: What?!?!ScenesPhoebe: Okay, this is what Im talking about, this. I-I need to live in a land where people can spill.ScenesMonica: You can spill. In the sink.ScenesPhoebe: Aw, honey its not your fault, y'know this is who you are, and I love you, and I want us to be friends, and if I keep living here I dont see that happening.ScenesMonica: I love you, too.ScenesPhoebe: Aww, good. (they hug) What?ScenesMonica: What? Im just said.ScenesPhoebe: No youre not, youre wondering which cushion it is.

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joey's, (now) Joey is watching Baywatch, as Chandler enters from his bedroom.]
rows.Content: Chandler: So ah, whatcha watching?ScenesJoey: Baywatch.ScenesChandler: Whats it about?ScenesJoey: Lifeguards.ScenesChandler: Well, it sounds kinda stupid... (looks at the TV) Whos she?ScenesJoey: Nicole Eggert. You'll like her.Scenes(Baywatch goes into one of those running scenes.)ScenesChandler: Wow! Look at them run.ScenesJoey: They do that a lot. Hey, you want a beer?ScenesChandler: Yeah, Ill go get one.ScenesJoey: No, no, no, dont get up, I got a cooler right here.

rows.Scenes: Monicas, Monica is coming out of the bathroom wearing nothing but a towel, as Chandler is entering.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Well, hello!ScenesMonica: Hey.ScenesChandler: Do you have any beers? Were out of beers.ScenesMonica: (all depressed) Help yourself.ScenesChandler: You okay?ScenesMonica: Phoebe moved out.ScenesChandler: Right.ScenesMonica: I dont understand, I mean am I so hard to live, is this why I dont have a boyfriend?ScenesChandler: Noo!! You dont have a boyfriend because....I dont, I dont know why you dont have a boyfriend. You should have a boyfriend.ScenesMonica: Well, I think so.ScenesChandler: Oh-ho, come here. (goes and hugs her) Listen, you are one of my favourite people and the most beautiful woman Ive ever known in real life.

rows.Scenes: the bar, Ross is entering, Phoebe is at the bar, they are the only two in the place.]
rows.Content: Ross: (all depressed) Hi. Where is everybody?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, its already closed, Chris gave me the keys to lock up-what is wrong?ScenesRoss: My marriage, I think my marriage is um, is kinda over.ScenesPhoebe: Oh no! Why?ScenesRoss: Cause Carols a lesbian. (Phoebe is shocked) And, and Im not one. And apparently its not a mix and match situation.ScenesPhoebe: Oh my God! I dont believe it! Oh, you poor bunny.ScenesRoss: (sets out a bunch of shot glasses and starts to poor himself a drink, many drinks) Im an idiot. I mean shoulda seen it, I mean Carol and Id be out and shed, shed see some beautiful woman, and, and shed be Ross y'know look at her, and Id think, God, my wife is cool!ScenesPhoebe: Aw! Hey, do you think that Susan person is her lover?ScenesRoss: Well, now I do!!ScenesPhoebe: Im sorry.ScenesRoss: Seven years. I mean weve been together seven years, shes the only woman whos ever loved me, and the only woman Ive-Ive ever....ScenesPhoebe: Aw, God Ross. Oh.(goes over and hugs him)

rows.Scenes: Monicas, Chandler and Monica are still hugging each other.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Umm, this is nice.ScenesMonica: I know, it is isnt it?ScenesChandler: No, I mean it, this feels really good. Is it a hundred percent cotton?ScenesMonica: Yeah! And I got it on sale, too.ScenesChandler: Anyway, I should go, one of the lifeguards was just about to dismantle a nuclear device.ScenesMonica: Well, if you wanna get a drink later we can.ScenesChandler: Oh yeah, that sounds great. (starts to leave) Oh, and listen, its, its gonna be....ScenesMonica: I know. Thanks. (Chandler leaves)

rows.Scenes: the bar, Phoebe is still hugging Ross.]
rows.Content: Ross: Maybe this wouldve happened if Id been more nurturing, or Id paid more attention, or I... had a uterus. I cant believe this!ScenesPhoebe: I know no, no, y'know you dont deserve this, you dont Ross. Youre, youre really, youre so good. (kisses him on the cheek)ScenesRoss: Thanks.ScenesPhoebe: And youre so sweet. (kisses him on the other cheek) And youre kind (kisses him on the lips)ScenesRoss: Thanks. (kisses her on the lips)Scenes(They pause, and they the start kissing passionately, and taking off each others clothes, and they start to lie down on the pool table.)ScenesRoss: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait.ScenesPhoebe: Huh?Scenes(Ross tries to clear off the pool table by knocking the balls to the other end of the table, but they all bounce back, and he frantically starts to throw them into the pockets.)ScenesPhoebe: Okay, its okay.Scenes(Phoebe jumps on to the table and lays down, Ross follows her and hits his head on the light hanging over the pool table.)ScenesPhoebe: Oh. (they start kissing again)ScenesRoss: Wait, wait, wait.ScenesPhoebe: What?ScenesRoss: My foot is stuck in the pocket.ScenesPhoebe: What?ScenesRoss: No, I cant get it out.ScenesPhoebe: Well, thats not something a girl wants to hear.ScenesRoss: No, come on dont start. (they start kissing again) Ouch!ScenesPhoebe: What?ScenesRoss: Stupid balls are in the way. (holds up two balls)Scenes(They both look at each other and start laughing (Lisa almost lost it there), and sit up. Ross hits his head on the lamp again.)ScenesRoss: Oh well. It probably wouldve been the most constructive solution.ScenesPhoebe: You have chalk on your face.ScenesRoss: Huh? (the rest of the gang enters)ScenesPhoebe: Oh, Ross youre right, I dont know why I always thought this was real grass.ScenesMonica: Hey, are you okay?ScenesRoss: My wifes a lesbian.ScenesJoey: Cool!!ScenesChandler: Ross-Joey, Joey-Ross. (they shake hands)ScenesRoss: Hi.ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: the bar, Chandler is playing pool, as Rachel enters.]
rows.Content: Chandler: I cant believe you came back.ScenesRachel: Dont say anything. I dont wanna speak, I dont wanna think. I just want you to take me and kiss me and make love to me right here, right now.Scenes(She hits the jukebox Fonzy style, and Its That Time of Season starts to play, as they start to kiss.)ScenesFriend No. 2: Rachel! Rachel! (stirs Rachel from her dream, shes in her car driving back from the city)ScenesRachel: What?ScenesFriend No. 2: You missed the exit!ScenesRachel: Oh, sorry.ScenesFriend No. 1: My God, what were you thinking about?ScenesRachel: Um, (shyly) Barry.ScenesHer Friends: Awwww!!ScenesEndScenesThe One With the Race Car BedScenesWritten by: Seth KurlandScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, the whole gang is there, Ross is telling a story about what happened at work and the rest of the gang are thinking to themselves, denoted by italics.]
rows.Content: Ross: So I told Carl, Nobody, no matter how famous their parents are, nobody is allowed to climb on the dinosaur. But of course this went in one ear and out.....ScenesRachel: I love how he cares so much about stuff. If I squint I can pretend hes Alan Alda.ScenesMonica: Oh good, another dinosaur story. When are those gonna become extinct?ScenesChandler: If I was a superhero who could fly and be invisible, that would be the best.ScenesGunther: What does Rachel see in this guy? I love Rachel. I wish she was my wife.Scenes(Joey is singing in his head.)ScenesPhoebe: Whos singing?ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, the whole gang is there including Janice, theyre watching Happy Days.]
rows.Content: Ross: Hey. When you guys were kids and you played Happy Days, who were you? I was always Richie.ScenesMonica: I was always Joanne.ScenesJoey: Question. Was ah, Egg the Gellers! the war cry of your neighbourhood?Scenes(A commercial for the Mattress King, Janices ex-husband, comes on TV.)ScenesPhoebe: Ewww! Oh! Its the Mattress King!ScenesJoey: Booo!!ScenesChandler: (to Janice) Dont look honey. Change the channel! Change the channel!ScenesJanice: Wait! Wait! I wanna see this. After I divorce him, half of that kingdom is gonna be mine.ScenesMatress King: (on TV) Despair fills the mattress showroom. My kingdom is suddenly without a queen. Im so depressed Im going to slash... my prices!! Check it out! Four ninety-nine for a pillow top queen set! Im going medieval on prices!ScenesChandler: What a wank!ScenesJanice: Oh, I cannot believe hes using our divorce to sell mattresses.ScenesMonica: I know! And four ninety-nine for a pillow top queen set, who cares about the divorce, those babies will sell themselves. (they all stare at her) And Im appalled for you by the way.ScenesMatress King: (on TV) Im close. Im cheap. Im the king.

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Rachel is on the phone, everyone else is there except Joey.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Okay. (listens) Okay, daddy well see you tomorrow night. (listens) Okay bye-bye. (hangs up)ScenesRoss: We?ScenesRachel: Are ah, having dinner with my Dad tomorrow night, I hope thats okay.ScenesRoss: Oh shoot, tomorrows not so good, Im supposed to um, fall off the Empire State building and land on a bicycle with no seat. Sorry.ScenesRachel: Ross, my father doesnt hate you.ScenesRoss: Please, he refers to me as wethead.ScenesRachel: But honey he calls everybody by a nickname! Okay, look, I know, all right, just one dinner, please, just one night for me, please. I just want him to love you like I do. (Ross looks at her) All right, well not exactly like I do, but, but, if you do come to dinner, Ill love you like I do in that black thing that you like.ScenesChandler: (leaning in) Ill go.ScenesRoss: Fine.ScenesRachel: Thank you.ScenesRoss: Hi Gunther.ScenesGunther: Yeah, well see!ScenesJoey: (entering) Hey, you guys!ScenesPhoebe: Hey!ScenesJoey: Guess what?ScenesRoss: What?ScenesJoey: I got a gig!ScenesAll: Yay!!ScenesChandler: See, thats why I could never be an actor. Because I cant say gig.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, I cant say croissant. (realises) Oh my God!ScenesMonica: Whats the part?ScenesJoey: Well, its not a part, no. Im teaching acting for soap operas down at the Learning Extension.ScenesRoss: Come on! Thats great.ScenesAll: Wow!ScenesJoey: Yeah, yeah. Its like my chance to give something back to the acting community.ScenesRoss: Yknow your probably not allowed to sleep with any of your students.ScenesJoey: (glares at him) I know!

rows.Scenes: Mattress King, Monica and Phoebe are shopping for a new mattress.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Ugh! I dont know Monica. It feels funny just being here. I mean if you buy a bed from Janices ex-husband, thats like betraying Chandler.ScenesMonica: Not at these prices.ScenesPhoebe: (sees a little kid playing with a race car bed) (to kid) Hi. Y'know in England this car would be on the other side of the store. (the kid just stares at her, and she makes the that went right over your head motion) Woo!ScenesMonica: (lying down on a mattress) Oh! Ohhhhh! Oh! Phoebe, come here. Aw, this is my new bed. You gotta feel this bad boy.ScenesPhoebe: Eh, Monica it, it feels so weird, y'know, Chandlers your friend... (hops onto the bed) Oh! Oh my God! Aw, all right take this bed, you can make other friends.

rows.Scenes: Classroom. Joey is writing his name on the board, but turns around before hes done which causes him to write his name with a downward curve, and he then underlines it, and draws the line right through his name.]
rows.Content: Joey: Good evening. Im Mr. Tribbiani. And I will be teaching acting for soap operas. Now um, on my first day as (proudly) Dr. Drake Remoray on Days of Our Lives, (looks for a reaction from his students, and gets none.) I learned that one of the most important things in soap opera acting is reacting, this does not mean acting again, it means, you dont have a line, but someone else just did. And it goes like this. (looks all intense for a moment and then gasps, the students cheer him) Thanks, thanks, a lot. Oh, by the way, before I forget to work in soap operas some of you will have to become much more attractive. All right, moving right along.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Joey is entering, Phoebe is already there waiting for the delievery guy.]
rows.Content: Joey: Hi!ScenesPhoebe: Hey! Ooh! How was teaching last night?ScenesJoey: Oh it was great. Yeah, you get to say stuff like, Hey, the bell doesnt dismiss you, I dismiss you.ScenesPhoebe: Ooooh, nice.ScenesJoey: Oh, and guess what, I got an audition for All My Children.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, yay!ScenesJoey: Yeah, its this great part, this boxer named Nick. And Im so, so right for it, y'know, hes just like me. Except hes a boxer, and has an evil twin.Scenes(There is a knock on the door.)ScenesPhoebe: Oh. (goes and answers the door and there is this huge black delievery guy.)ScenesGuy: Dom da-da dom! Here ye! Here ye! Delivery from the Mattress King. (to Phoebe) You Miss Geller?ScenesPhoebe: Okay.ScenesGuy: Sign here. (hands her a clipboard)ScenesPhoebe: Oh, do I have a middle name. All right Monica Velula Geller. Its that bedroom there. (points to Monicas room)ScenesJoey: Hey, Monica bought a bed from the Mattress King?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, so please, please, please, dont say anything to Chandler.ScenesJoey: You want me to lie to Chandler?ScenesPhoebe: Is that a problem?ScenesJoey: No.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, hey, hey Nick the boxer lets see what you got. All right ya, put em up. Come on. (they start shadow boxing)ScenesJoey: Hey, youre ah, pretty good at this.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, well I had to learn, I was staying at the Y and some off the young men werent acting Christian enough.ScenesJoey: Ahh!Scenes(Joey throws a punch and just lightly taps her on the shoulder, Phoebe counters with a jab to the nose.)ScenesJoey: Hey now!Scenes(Phoebe throws another jab, and lands it on Joeys nose, causing it to bleed.)ScenesJoey: Hey!!! Oww!! And Im bleeding.ScenesPhoebe: Oh! Oh! Oh!ScenesJoey: Okay, great.ScenesPhoebe: Wow! And Im a vegetarian! All right, all right, well Im sorry, well put some ice on it.ScenesJoey: Okay.ScenesPhoebe: Kay, put your head back.ScenesJoey: All right. I cant see.ScenesPhoebe: All right, I have ya. Oh God.ScenesGuy: Which bedroom do ya want it in Miss Geller?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, its the compulsively neat one by the window, okay.ScenesGuy: Gotcha. (he and his helper walk in carrying the racecar bed.)

rows.Scenes: Restaurant, Rachel and Ross and Dr. Green are having dinner.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Hi Daddy!ScenesDr. Green: This where they put it? What, there no table available in the kitchen! Hello, baby.ScenesRachel: You remember Ross.ScenesDr. Green: Um-hmm.ScenesRoss: Nice to see you again Dr. Green.ScenesDr. Green: So! (they both try to sit next to Rachel but Dr. Green is successful.) (to Ross) Hows the library?ScenesRoss: Ugh, museum.ScenesDr. Green: What happened to the library?ScenesRoss: There never was a library. I mean there are libraries, its just that I ah, I never worked at one.ScenesDr. Green: You know whats really good here, the lobster. What do you say shall I just order three.ScenesRoss: Yeah, if youre really hungry. (Dr. Green stares at him) It was a joke, I made a joke.ScenesRachel: Yeah, actually Daddy Ross is allergic to lobster.ScenesDr. Green: What kind of person is allergic to lobster? I guess the kind of person that works at a library.ScenesRoss: Its not a library...ScenesDr. Green: (interrupting him) I know!! Its a museum! What, youre the only one around here who can make a joke! At least mine was funny. Ah, waiter, we will have two lobsters and a menu. (nods at Ross, and mouths I dont know to the waiter.)

rows.Scenes: After dinner.]
rows.Content: Ross: So, Dr. Green, hows the old boat.ScenesDr. Green: They found rust. You know what rust does to a boat?ScenesRoss: It gives it a nice antiquey look.ScenesDr. Green: (he stares at Ross) Rust, is boat cancer, Ross.ScenesRoss: Wow. Im sorry, when I was a kid I lost a bike to that. (Rachel giggles at that)ScenesDr. Green: Excuse me for a moment, will you please, I want to say good night to the Levines, before we go.ScenesRachel: Okay.ScenesRoss: Okay! (picks up a knife and pretends to stab his heart.)ScenesRachel: Aw honey stop! Its not that bad.ScenesRoss: Yeah. (sees the bill) Op! Uh-oh! I think your Dad mustve added wrong. He only tipped like four percent.ScenesRachel: Yeah. Thats Daddy.ScenesRoss: Thats Daddy?! But doesnt it bother you? Youre a waitress.ScenesRachel: Yes, it bothers me Ross, but y'know if he was a regular at the coffee house, Id be serving him sneezers.ScenesRoss: So?ScenesRachel: So. Ross, Ive bugged him about this a million times, hes not gonna change.ScenesRoss: You really serve people sneezers?ScenesRachel: Well um, I dont.ScenesDr Green: You kids ready?ScenesRoss: Thanks again, Dr. Green.ScenesDr. Green: All right.Scenes(Ross takes a twenty and slips it underneath the bill when Dr. Green isnt looking.)ScenesDr. Green: Oh, wait, wait, wait, wait, I think I forgot my receipt.ScenesRoss: Oh, ah, you dont need that.ScenesDr. Green: Why not?ScenesRoss: The carbon, its messy, I mean it gets on your fingers and causes, the, the ah, night blindness.ScenesDr. Green: (gets his receipt and notices the twenty) What is this? Who put a twenty down here? Huh?ScenesRoss: Oh, yeah, that would be me, um, I have, I have a problem I-I tip way too much, way, way, too much, its a sickness really.ScenesRachel: Yeah it is, it is. (to Ross) We really, really have to do something about that.ScenesRoss: I know.ScenesDr. Green: Excuse me, you think Im cheap?ScenesRachel: Oh Daddy, no he didnt mean anything by that, he really didnt.ScenesRoss: Nothing I do means anything, really.ScenesDr. Green: This is nice. I pay two hundred dollars for dinner, you put down twenty, and you come out looking like Mr. Big Shot. You really want to be Mr. Big Shot? Here, Ill tell you what, you pay the whole bill, Mr. Big Shot, all right. (rips up the bill, and throws it at Ross, then leaves)ScenesRoss: Well Mr. Big Shot is better than wethead.

rows.Scenes: Classroom, Joey is lecturing on facial expressions.]
rows.Content: Joey: Okay, some tricks of the trade. Now, Ive never been able to cry as an actor, so if Im in a scene where I have to cry, I cut a hole in my pocket, take a pair of tweezers, and just start pulling. Or ah, or, lets say I wanna convey that Ive just done something evil. That would be the basic I have a fishhook in my eyebrow and I like it (Does it by raising one eyebrow, and showing off the pretend fishhook.) Okay, lets say Ive just gotten bad news, well all I do there is try and divide 232 by 13. (looks all confused) And thats how its done. Great soap opera acting tonight everybody, class dismissed.ScenesStudent: Hey, Mr. Trib.ScenesJoey: Hey-hey.ScenesStudent: Guess what, I got an audition!ScenesJoey: Awww, one of my students got an audition. Im so proud.ScenesStudent: I was wondering if you would consider coaching me for it?ScenesJoey: You bet! Whats the part?ScenesStudent: Oh its great, its a role on All My Children, Nick the boxer.Scenes(Joey does the 232 divided by 13 bad news look.)ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: Hallway, Ross and Rachel are returning from dinner.]
rows.Content: Rachel: You had to do it, didnt you? You couldnt just leave it alone.ScenesRoss: Four percent. Okay. I tip more than that when theres a bug in my food.ScenesRachel: Ross, tonight was about the two of you getting along. (Ross groans and rubs his neck) Oh, would you just see my chiropractor, already.ScenesRoss: Yeah, Im gonna go to a doctor who went to school in a mini-mall.Scenes(they go into Monica and Rachels, and see Phoebe hopping around.)ScenesRoss: Hey Pheebs, what are you doing?ScenesPhoebe: Im, Im freaking out! Monica kinda trusted me with something and she shouldnt have! All right, I havent lived here in a while, so I have to ask you something. Does Monica still turn on the lights in her bedroom?ScenesRachel: Um. yeah.ScenesPhoebe: I am soo dead. (goes to Monicas room)ScenesRachel: All right, look, heres the bottom line Ross, this is fixable, if we act fast, okay. So, Ill invite him to brunch tomorrow and you can make nice.ScenesRoss: Look, honey, I have tried to make nice, it doesnt work.ScenesRachel: Okay, look, Ross, I realise that my Father is difficult, but thats why you have got to be the bigger man here.ScenesRoss: Look sweetie, I could be the bigger man, I could be the biggest man, I could be a big, huge, giant man, and it still wouldnt make any difference, except that I could pick your Father up and say Like me! Like me tiny doctor!ScenesRachel: Okay, well cant you just try it one more time Ross? For me? For me?ScenesRoss: Rachel one brunch is not gonna solve anything. You gotta face it, okay were never gonna get along.ScenesRachel: Okay, well you are just gonna have too, okay. Because I already got a Mother and a Father who cannot stay in the same room together, okay, I dont wanna have to have a separate room for you too!! (starts to cry)ScenesRoss: Okay, okay, okay. (hugs her) Ill get the bagels.

rows.Scenes: Monicas bedroom, Phoebe is trying to hide the bed from Monica.]
rows.Content: Monica: (sees the bed) Whats this?ScenesPhoebe: Isnt it cool! Varoom! Varoom!ScenesMonica: This is not the bed I ordered!ScenesPhoebe: I know, you mustve won like a contest or something!Scenes(Phoebe starts to make a sound like a car accelerating)ScenesMonica: Phoebe!Scenes(Phoebe makes a sound like a car screeching to a halt.)ScenesMonica: Why is this car in my bedroom?ScenesPhoebe: Im sorry, okay, I-I wasnt looking, and the store says that they wont take it back because you signed for it...ScenesMonica: When did I sign for it?ScenesPhoebe: When I was you! Y'know what, its all Joeys fault, cause he left his nose open!ScenesMonica: Did you make brownies today?ScenesChandler: Knock, knock.ScenesMonica: (to Phoebe) Quick, take off your dress, he wont notice the bed.ScenesChandler: Hey, Im going for sushi does anybody want.. (enters and sees the bed) Whoa-whoa, somebody missed the off ramp.ScenesPhoebe: Its Monicas bed. What?ScenesChandler: Okay. (to Monica) Its a racecar.ScenesPhoebe: So. This has always been Monicas bed, what youre just noticing now, how self-involved are you?ScenesChandler: Okay, well it this bed isnt new, how come there is plastic on the mattress?ScenesMonica: Sometimes I have bad dreams. (starts to break down, and Phoebe offers her, her hand to comfort her.)

rows.Scenes: Classroom, Joey is coaching his student.]
rows.Content: Student: Look, I just saw my best friends brains smeared across the canvas, thats not gonna be me, not me.ScenesJoey: Wow! That was good. That was...(points to his pocket) Tweezers?ScenesStudent: No.ScenesJoey: Whoa. That was really good.ScenesStudent: Thanks, any suggestions?Scenes(Joey gets the evil look on his face.)

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Chandler, Monica, and Phoebe are there, yelling at Joey.]
rows.Content: Chandler: You told him to play the boxer gay!!ScenesJoey: Well, I-I mightve said supergay.ScenesChandler: You totally screwed him over.ScenesMonica: Joey, youre this guys teacher. I mean how could you do this?ScenesJoey: Because, Monica, the guys so good, and I really, really want this part.ScenesPhoebe: Well, if you really, really want it, then its okay.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Rachel is greeting her Father for their brunch.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (opening the door) Hi Daddy.ScenesDr. Green: Baby. Ross.ScenesRoss: Dr. Green. How are you? (offers his hand, and Dr. Green puts his scarf on it.)ScenesDr. Green: Thanks for dinner last night.ScenesRoss: Thank you for teaching me a valuable lesson.ScenesDr. Green: Nice hair. Whatd ya do? Swim here?ScenesRoss: (to Rachel) Okay, thats it, I cant take it anymore.ScenesRachel: What? What? Hes interested in you. He-he likes your hair, he just wants to know how you got here.ScenesRoss: Oh, please. Sweetie its hopeless, okay, Im just gonna go. (starts to leave rubbing his neck)ScenesRachel: What?!ScenesRoss: Look, look Im sorry. Its just that....ScenesDr. Green: Ross? Whats with the neck?ScenesRachel: Hes got this thing. And I keep telling him to go to my chiropractor...ScenesDr. Green: Youre still going to that chiropractor, that man couldnt get into medical school in Extapa!ScenesRoss: Thank you! Thats what I keep saying.ScenesRachel: Excuse me, Dr. Bobby happens to be an excellent doctor.ScenesRoss: Uh.ScenesDr. Green: Wait a minute, his name is Dr. Bobby?ScenesRachel: Well thats his last name.ScenesRoss: And his first name.ScenesDr. Green: Hes Bobby Bobby?ScenesRachel: Its Robert Bobby.ScenesDr. Green: Oh.ScenesRachel: And um, excuse me, he helps me.ScenesRoss: Oh-ho please. Ask her how?ScenesDr. Green: What do you need help for?ScenesRachel: With my alignment. Ive got one leg shorter than the other.ScenesDr. Green: Oh God!ScenesRoss: Argue with that.ScenesRachel: What? Its true, my right leg is two inches shorter.ScenesDr. Green: Come on! Youre just titling! (to Ross) Her legs are fine!ScenesRoss: I know that!ScenesDr. Green: So, why do you let her go to a chiropractor for?ScenesRachel: Im sorry, let her?ScenesRoss: What can I do, she doesnt listen to me about renters insurance either.ScenesDr. Green: Wait a minute, you dont have renters insurance?!ScenesRachel: No.ScenesDr. Green: Well what if somebody steals something? How are you gonna run after him with one leg shorter than the other?!Scenes(Both he and Ross start laughing)ScenesRoss: Hey, would you ah, would you like some juice?ScenesDr. Green: Id love some juice. Thanks.ScenesRoss: Okay. (to Rachel) Wow! This is going so well. Did you see us? Did you see?ScenesRachel: Yeah honey, Im standing right there! Why didnt you just tell him about the mole I havent got checked yet.ScenesRoss: Excellent!

rows.Scenes: Classroom, Joey is talking to his students.]
rows.Content: Joey: (sadly) There will come a time in each of your careers when youll have a chance to screw over another soap opera actor. I had such an opportunity in the recent, present. And Im ashamed to say that I took it, I advised a fellow actor to play a role, homosexually. Yeah, we both auditioned for the part, and uh, as it turned out, they ah, they liked the stupid gay thing and cast him. And now, hes got a two year contract opposite Susan Luchhi, the first lady of daytime television, and me, me Im stuck here teaching a bunch of people, most of whom are too ugly to even be on TV. Im sorry, Im sorry, Im sorry. (he gets a huge round of applause from his students.) Thank you.

rows.Scenes: Mattress King, Monica is trying to return her bed.]
rows.Content: Jester: Uh, may I help you?ScenesMonica: Yeah, I talked to you on the phone, Im the lady that got stuck with the racecar bed.ScenesJester: Look, its like I told you, theres nothing I can do. You signed for it, Monica Velula Geller.ScenesJoey: All right, Jester man, look we wanna see the king.ScenesJester: Nobody sees the king!ScenesJoey: Oh-ho-kay, Im talking to the king. (starts to go to a back room)ScenesJester: Hey! You cant go back there!Scenes(Joey goes to the door, but stops and looks through the window at Janice and the Mattress King, her ex-husband, kissing.)ScenesJanice: Oh my God.Scenes(Joey fakes a scream.)ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: Monicas bedroom, Chandler is playing with the bed.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Varrrrrroom! Hey! Watch it lady! Varrrrrrrrrrom! (makes a screeching sound as he pretends to stomp on the brakes.) Hey-hey good lookin! (honks the beds little horn on the steering wheel.) Varrrrrrrrroom. (notices Rachel and stops) All right, Ill leave. My beds so boring.ScenesEndScenesThe One With The Giant Poking DeviceScenesWritten by: Adam ChaseScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe, Chandler, and Ross are there, Rachel is serving brownies.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Here you go Pheebs. Who else wants one of my special homemade brownies?ScenesChandler: I will have one. (Ross and him both take one.)Scenes(Phoebe takes a bite and spits it out and screams.)ScenesChandler: Okay, Im not gonna have one.ScenesRoss: Neither will I. (they both put back the brownies.)ScenesPhoebe: No, no, its just my tooth.ScenesChandler: All right Ill have one. (he and Ross take another brownie,)ScenesRoss: So whats a matter, you need a dentist? Ive got a good one.ScenesPhoebe: No thanks, I have a good one too. I just, I, I cant see him.ScenesChandler: See that is the problem with invisible dentists.ScenesRoss: Why? Why cant you go to him?ScenesPhoebe: Because, every time I go to the dentist, somebody dies.ScenesChandler: That is so weird, because every time I go to the dentist, I look down the hygienists blouse.ScenesRachel: Phoebe, what? Umm...what?!ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, yeah, first there was my aunt Mary, and then there was umm, John, my mailman, and then my, my cowboy friend Albino Bob.ScenesRachel: And all these people actually died?ScenesPhoebe: Yes, while I was in the chair! Thats why I take such good care of my teeth now, y'know, its not about oral hygiene, I floss to save lives!ScenesRoss: Pheebs, come on, you didnt kill anybody, these people just happened to die when you went to the dentist. Its, its, its just ah, a coincidence.ScenesPhoebe: Well tell that to them. Oh! You cant, their dead.ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Ross, Rachel, and Phoebe are there.]
rows.Content: Ross: Thanks, Gunther. (takes the plate Gunther serves him and Rachel comes up and kisses him) (to Rachel) Hey! (to Gunther) Umm, can I get a napkin too?ScenesGunther: Oh, like you dont already have everything.ScenesPhoebe: (trying to bite into an apple) Ow! Ow! (drops the apple in disgust.)ScenesRachel: Phoebe, your in pain, would you just go to the dentist, just go.ScenesPhoebe: All right, fine, fine, but if youre my next victim, dont come back as a poltergeist and like suck me into the TV set.ScenesRachel: I promise.ScenesPhoebe: Although, dont feel like you cant visit.ScenesJoey: (entering with Monica) Hey, is, is, is Chandler here?ScenesRoss: (patting his clothes like he is looking for his wallet) No, no hes not.ScenesMonica: You guys, Joey just saw Janice kissing her ex-husband.ScenesRoss: What? (to Joey) So what are you going to do? I mean how, how are you going to tell Chandler?ScenesJoey: Well, I was thinking about that and I, I think the best way would be, to not.ScenesRachel: Joey, you cant keep this to yourself, if you know about this, you have to tell him.ScenesJoey: Itll kill him. I mean itll, itll just kill him.ScenesPhoebe: Well, you could wait til I go to the dentist, maybe Ill kill him.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, All are there except for Chandler.]
rows.Content: Joey: (looking out the window) Ewww! Ugly Naked Guy is using his new hammock. Its like a Play-Doo Fat Factory.ScenesPhoebe: Well, Im going to the dentist, so listen, okay, just be on the look out for anything that, that, that you can fall into, or, or that can fall on you, or... All right, just look out! Okay, And um, I also just wanna, I just wanna tell you all that um...... (starts to cry and runs out)ScenesRoss: Okay, I have a problem I have to go into work for a few hours, some kids messed up the Homo Sapien display.ScenesJoey: What did they do?ScenesRoss: Well, they painted over the word Sapien for one thing, then they rearranged the figures, lets just leave it at that.ScenesMonica: So, do you want me to watch Ben for you?ScenesRoss: Yes, thats what I was going to ask, thank you.ScenesRachel: Whoa! Wait! Hello! What about me?ScenesRoss: You? You! Want to watch Ben? (in the background Monica mouths Dont worry, Ill be here the whole time. to Ross.) Yes! Thatd be great, no, I just wanted to ask Monica, because I know how empty her life is. (Monica sarcastically mouths Yeah! and holds up her thumb.)ScenesJoey: Hey-hey, Ross?ScenesRoss: Yeah.ScenesJoey: Ive got a science question.ScenesRoss: Hmm?ScenesJoey: If the Homo Sapiens, were in fact Homo-sapien, is that why there extinct?ScenesRoss: Joey, Homo Sapiens are people.ScenesJoey: Hey-hey, Im not judging.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Monica and Rachel are babysitting Ben.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (holding Ben) Look Benny, spoon. (moves it back and forth) Spoon. Come on! All right, y'know what I think hes bored.ScenesMonica: Here. Ben, do you wanna play the airplane game, do you wanna show Rachel? Come here. (takes Ben) Were gonna do something fun. Okay. (throws Ben up in the air a little bit and catches him) Weee!! (moves into the living room and does it again) Weee!! (starts to walk back into the kitchen as she does it again, and hits Bens head on that wooden beam across the ceiling.)Scenes[cut to later]ScenesMonica: (to Ben) Whos so brave, youre so brave, yes you are, youre so brave.ScenesRachel: Okay. Okay honey, hes fine, hes fine, lets just put him down. Come here, Ben. (sets him on the couch) See thats a good boy. (to Monica) How could you do that to him!! Ross trusted me, what is he going to say?!ScenesMonica: Hes not gonna say anything, because were not gonna tell him.ScenesRachel: Were not?!ScenesMonica: No were not.ScenesRachel: All right, I like that.ScenesMonica: Okay.ScenesRachel: So were okay, were okay, were okay, (starts to exam Ben) arent we? No, were not okay, were not okay, theres a bump, theres a bump.ScenesMonica: Oh my God! Well push it in! Push it in!ScenesRachel: I cannot push it in!ScenesMonica: Okay, were gonna need a distraction.ScenesRachel: Okay, okay, okay.ScenesMonica: I got it!ScenesRachel: Okay.ScenesMonica: The second that Ross walks in that door, I want you take him back to your bedroom and do whatever it is that you do that makes him go, (high pitched) rweee!!ScenesRachel: Or. We could put a hat on his head.ScenesMonica: A hat! Yes! We need a hat.ScenesRachel: We need a hat..ScenesMonica: Where are we gonna find a tiny little hat?ScenesRachel: Oh, oh, oh, Ill get Rainy Day Bear!! (runs to get him)ScenesMonica: Because hell know what to do? (Rachel comes out of her room with a bear thats dressed in a rain suit.) Oh my God, youre a genius!ScenesRachel: Oh God, oh God, its sowed on though.ScenesMonica: Give it. Give it.ScenesRachel: Okay.Scenes(Monica takes the bear, grabs his hat, and rips off his head.)ScenesMonica and Rachel: Oh!!ScenesRachel: Oh, its just like a bloodbath in here today.

rows.Scenes: The street, Chandler and Joey are walking past a jewelery store.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Hey! Hold on a minute, hold on a second. Do you think these pearls are nice?ScenesJoey: Id really prefer a mountain bike.ScenesChandler: Janices birthday is coming up, I want to get her something speacial. Come in here with me.ScenesJoey: Whoa, whoa, whoa, wait, whoa. Do you ah, want to get her something speacial, get her flowers, get her candy, get her gum, girls love gum.ScenesChandler: Thats a good idea, Dear Janice have a Hubba-Bubba birthday. I would like to get her something serious.ScenesJoey: Oh, you want something serious. Y'know what you should do, you should get her one of those um, barium enemas. Those are dead serious.ScenesChandler: All right. Look, Im gonna go in here, and you dont buy me anything ever. (starts to go into the store)ScenesJoey: (stopping him) No, no, you cant, you cant, okay, you cant, you cant buy her pearls, you just cant, you cant, you cant.ScenesChandler: Why not?!ScenesJoey: Oh God. Uh, okay, heres the thing, this is the thing, okay, the thing is...ScenesChandler: What is the thing?ScenesJoey: Okay. I went down to the Mattress King showroom and, and I saw Janice, kissing her ex-husband.ScenesChandler: (shocked) What?ScenesJoey: They were in his office.ScenesChandler: Well she, she wouldnt do that, shes with, shes with me.ScenesJoey: Im telling you man, I saw it.ScenesChandler: Yeah, well, youre wrong! Okay, youre wrong.ScenesJoey: Im not wrong! I wish I was. Im sorry. Bet that barium enema doesnt sound so bad now, huh?

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Monica and Rachel are dressing up Ben in the entire rain suit from Rainy Day Bear.]
rows.Content: Monica: It just makes more sense as an ensemble.ScenesRachel: Right.ScenesMonica: Besides, it takes the focus off the hat.ScenesPhoebe: (running through the door) No! Oh! Youre alive! Youre alive!ScenesRachel: See Pheebs, I promised you no one would die, didnt I?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, well, well see about that. Can I use your phone? I just wanna call everyone I know.ScenesMonica: Sure, we have no money, go ahead.ScenesPhoebe: (on phone) Hey! Youre not dead! Okay, see ya!ScenesBen: Monica.ScenesMonica: Oh my God! He just said my name! Did you hear that?ScenesBen: Monica bang!ScenesRachel: Okay, I heard that.ScenesMonica: Did he just say Monica bang?ScenesRachel: Uh-huh.ScenesMonica: Oh my God! Hes gonna rat me out!ScenesBen: Monica bang!ScenesMonica: Oh-ho-ho, sweetie, sweetie, you gotta stop saying that, now. Its no big deal, its not even worth mentioning, you see we all do it all the time. See watch this, Ben, Ben, Ben. (goes over and starts hitting her head on the post) Ow, Monica bang! (does it again) Everybody bang. (repeats) Ben bang. (repeats) Rachel bang. (repeats) Bang, Rachel bang! Oh, isnt that fun?ScenesRachel: (goes over and hits her head on the post) Look at that! (repeats) Look at that! (repeats) We all do it. (repeats) Okay, Im stopping now.ScenesMonica: You okay?ScenesRachel: Oh yeah! Y'know, if its not a headboard, its just not worth it.

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joey's, Chandler is waiting for Janice to arrive, and is angrily fllipping through a magazine.]
rows.Content: Janice: (entering) Hows my Bing-a-ling?ScenesChandler: Ah, I dont know, you tell me. Anything you ah, wanna tell me, because, if you ah, you should, if you, you would, tell me.ScenesJanice: Why are your eyes so white?ScenesChandler: You tell me! Maybe, its because I was just fooling with my ex! Oh no-no-no-no, no-no-no-no, that was you!!ScenesJanice: Oh my God!!ScenesChandler: All right!ScenesJanice: How did you know?ScenesChandler: Joey told me, he saw you two kissing.ScenesJanice: In the park?ScenesChandler: No! In his office! How many kisses were there?ScenesJanice: Just those two!ScenesChandler: Wh-wh-why, wh-why, why, why was there kissing!? There should be no kissing!!ScenesJanice: Oh, Im sorry honey, Im so, so, (nasally) haaaaa! Im so, so sorry, I just (nasally) haaaaaa! But I, oh what happened was, I-I-I cant breathe. Can you get me a bag, or something?ScenesChandler: (giving her a bag) Here.Scenes(Janice starts to breath into it and sucks in the reciept, and then spits it out.)ScenesJanice: The receipt.ScenesChandler: Ill take it! All right look, I gotta know. Are you finished with me? (Janice shakes her head no) Are you finished with him? (Janice shakes her head no) Do you still love him? (Janice shakes her head yes) Do you still love me? (Janice shakes her head yes) All right look, (grabs the bag) Im gonna need an actual answer here okay, so which is it, him or me? (his phone starts to ring)ScenesJanice: I dont know.ScenesPhoebe: (rushing in) Okay. If youre alive you answer your phone!ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Monica, Rachel, Phoebe, and Joey are there.]
rows.Content: Monica: Okay, Ben, I wont tell your daddy that you had ice cream for dinner, if you dont tell about our little bonking incident.ScenesRachel: Monica, number one, I dont think Ben understands the concept of bribery, and number two, I... (Joey starts laughing in the background) (to Joey) What?!ScenesJoey: You said number two.ScenesRachel: I also said number one.ScenesJoey: I know. (giggles harder)ScenesRoss: (entering) Hey! Everyone.ScenesRachel: Hi!ScenesRoss: Hows my little boy?ScenesRachel: Hes perfect, hes never been better.ScenesRoss: (noticing the outfit he is wearing) Whatd you do, take him whaling?ScenesBen: Monica.ScenesRoss: Oh my God, he just said your name, thats great! Good job Ben.ScenesBen: Monica bang!ScenesMonica: Oh thats right, thats what Id sound like if I exploded.ScenesPhoebe: Woo-Hoo! The curse is broken! I called everybody I know, and everyone is alive.ScenesJoey: Uh.ScenesPhoebe: What?ScenesJoey: Ugly Naked Guy looks awfully still. (Phoebe runs to the window and gasps.)Scenes[Cut to later, all except Chandler are staring out the window at Ugly Naked Guy.]ScenesPhoebe: Oh my God! I killed him! I killed another one! And this curse is getting stronger too, to bring down something that big.ScenesRachel: Well maybe hes just taking a nap.ScenesJoey: Im tellin ya, he hasnt moved since this morning.ScenesMonica: All right, we should call somebody.ScenesRoss: And tell them what? The naked guy we stare at all the time isnt moving.ScenesRachel: Well, we have gotta find out if hes alive.ScenesMonica: How are we gonna do that? Theres no way.ScenesJoey: Well, there is one way. His windows open, I say, we poke him.

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joey's, Chandler is throwing darts, as Joey enters.]
rows.Content: Joey: Hey! Y'know how we ah, save all those chopsticks for no reason we get when we get Chinese food?ScenesChandler: Yeah.ScenesJoey: Well, now we got a reason.ScenesChandler: What?ScenesJoey: Well, were fashioning a very long poking device.ScenesChandler: All right.ScenesJoey: Hey uh, whats a matter?ScenesChandler: I talked to Janice.ScenesJoey: Oh my God, is she going back to him?ScenesChandler: She doesnt know. Says she loves us both. Y'know I woke up this morning and I was in love, well I was happy. Y'know it serves me right for buying that twelve pack of condoms. And now I cant even return them, because she choked on the reciept!ScenesJoey: What are you ah, what are you gonna do?ScenesChandler: I dont know, y'know. What, what, would you do?ScenesJoey: Well, it doesnt matter what I would do.ScenesChandler: Come on, tell me.ScenesJoey: All right, youre probably not gonna want to hear this but ah, if it was me, and this is just me, (Chandler gets ready to throw another dart) I would ah, I would bow out.ScenesChandler: What? (turns around quickly still ready to throw the dart and Joey quickly ducks and hides behind the chair) What are you, what are you talking about?ScenesJoey: They have a kid together, y'know. Theyre like, theyre like a family, and if, I dont know, theres chance they could make that work, I know I wouldnt want to be the guy who stood in the way of that. Are you okay? Do you wanna ah, come poke a nude guy?

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Ross has just finished putting Ben to sleep, and is entering from Rachels room.]
rows.Content: Ross: Well, hes finally alseep. About that ah, bump on his head?ScenesRachel: Are you, are you, are you sure its ah, a new bump? I mean, no offense, Ive always thought of Ben as a fairly bumpy headed child.ScenesRoss: Its okay if he bumps his head, kids bump their heads all the time, y'know, it was your first time babysitting, I figured you did the best you could.ScenesRachel: (confidently) I did!ScenesRoss: I know! Im saying you have to watch them all the time.ScenesRachel: I did!! I watched! I watched! I watched Monica bang his head against that thing!ScenesRoss: Monica did it?Scenes(Monica runs into the kitchen from the terrace.)ScenesRoss: Monica?ScenesMonica: Yeah.ScenesRoss: Umm, did you notice anything wierd about Ben today?ScenesMonica: No. Why?ScenesRoss: Well, I was just playing with him, and y'know we were doing the alphabet song, which he used to be really good at, but suddenly hes leaving out e and f. Its like they just ah, I dont know, fell out of his head.ScenesMonica: Really?!ScenesRoss: Oh, and also, hes, hes walkin kind of funny, his left leg is moving a lot faster than his right leg, and hes in there just sort of y'know... (walks around in a circle)ScenesMonica: Oh my God, I wrecked your baby!! (runs into the bedroom)ScenesRachel: I hope its still funny when youre in hell.ScenesMonica: (coming out of the bedroom) You jerk! You know how much I love that kid! (starts to chase Ross around the living room)ScenesRoss: Monica bang! Monica bang! (runs into one of the posts) Ow!ScenesRachel: Ill get the hat.

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Chandler and Janice are there.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Janice, I have something I need to tell you, and I want you to let me get through it, because its, its, its not gonna be easy.ScenesJanice: Okay.ScenesChandler: I think you should go back with Gary. I dont wanna be the guy that breaks up a family, y'know when my parents split up, it was because of that guy. Whenever I would see him I was always think y'know Youre the reason, you are the reason why their not together. and I hated that guy.
