(starts to dance really, really, really badly)ScenesChandler: Oh no, no, no, no.ScenesPhoebe: (covering her mouth in shock) What, what is that?ScenesJoey: Sure, it looks stupid now, there's no music playing.Scenes(phone rings)ScenesChandler: All right, I have to get that, but no-no. (answering phone) Hello? (listens) (happily) Hi! Yeah listen, I'm, I'm in need of a stripper and I was told that you do that. (listens) Let me ask you this, what, what do you do for the extra hundred? (listens) So would I, would I have to provide the grapes?ScenesMonica: (entering) Hi!ScenesPhoebe: Oh, how was last night with Julio, senorita?ScenesMonica: It was soo amazing, he is so sexy, and smart, which makes him even sexier. Oh gosh, I gotta so you this. Last night, we were fooling around and he stops to write a poem.ScenesJoey: Get out! I couldn't stop if a meteor hit me.ScenesChandler: Okay, we have our stripper. A miss Crystal Chandelier.ScenesJoey: Well sure, you name a kid that, what do you expect them to grow up to be?ScenesMonica: Anyway um, when he left he forgot to take the poem with him. Now, I am like totally dense about poetry, but I think it's pretty good all right. Check it out. (hands them the poem)ScenesJoey: (reading) The Empty Vase. Translucent beauty...ScenesChandler: To yourself. (finishing) Hey-hey-hey, y'know what that's pretty good.ScenesMonica: Oh good, I think so too. Pheebs?ScenesPhoebe: Oh yeah.ScenesMonica: Oh, I'm so glad you guys like it. Yay! All right I gotta go to work. (tries to take the poem)ScenesJoey: Whoa, I'm not done.ScenesMonica: All right, just give it back to me when your done. See you guys.ScenesChandler: Bye-bye.Scenes(Monica leaves)ScenesPhoebe: Oh my God, oh my God! Poor Monica!ScenesChandler: What, what, what?!ScenesPhoebe: What?! He was with her when he wrote this poem. Look, (reading) 'My vessel so empty with nothing inside. Now that I've touched you, you seem emptier still.' He thinks Monica is empty, she is the empty vase!ScenesChandler: You really think that is what he meant?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, totally. Oh, God, oh, she seemed so happy too.ScenesJoey: Done.

rows.Scenes: Rachel's office, her desk is covered with stuff Ross has sent her.]
rows.Content: Mark: (reaching through the flowers) Do you have the, the Ralph Lauren file?ScenesRachel: Oh, yeah, sure, it's umm... (she picks up this bug and it starts to play the theme from Love Story)ScenesMark: Wh-what's that?ScenesRoss: It's from Ross, it's a love bug.ScenesMark: Wow! Somebody wants people to know you have a boyfriend.ScenesRachel: Oh no, no-no-no, that's not, not, not, what he is doing. He's just, he's just really romantic.ScenesMan: (to Rachel) Ah, excuse me, are you Rachel Green?ScenesRachel: Yes.ScenesMan: (being joined by the rest of the barbershop quartet) One, two, three...ScenesQuartet: (singing) Congratulations on your first week at your brand new job! It won't be long before your the boss.ScenesThe Bass Barber: Omm-pah, omm-pah, omm-pah.ScenesQuartet: (singing) And you know who will be there to support... you?! Your one and only boyfriend...ScenesThe Bass Barber: It's nice to have a boyfriend.ScenesQuartet: Your loyal loving boyfriend Ross..... Ross!ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Ross and Rachel are entering the living room from her bedroom.]
rows.Content: Ross: I'm hurt! I'm actually hurt, that you would think that I would send you any of those things out of any thing other than love. Hurt! Hurt!ScenesRachel: All right Ross!! I get it!!ScenesRoss: I mean my God...ScenesRachel: You're hurt!ScenesRoss: ...can't, can't a guy send a barbershop quartet to his girlfriend's office anymorrrrre!!ScenesRachel: Oh, please, Ross it was so obvious! It was like you were marking your territory. I mean you might have well have just come in and peed all around my desk!ScenesRoss: I would never do that!ScenesRachel: Look, I know what's going on here, okay, Mark explained it all to me. He said this is what you guys do.ScenesRoss: Yeah well if, if, if Mark said that, than Mark's an idiot.

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Chandler, Ross, Joey are there.]
rows.Content: Joey: Mark's a genius!ScenesRoss: Why?! How?! How is he a genius?ScenesChandler: Look, don't you see what's happening here. Instead of hitting on her right away, he's becoming her confidant. Now he's gonna be the guy she goes too to complain about you.ScenesRoss: What am I going to do?ScenesChandler: Well, why don't you send her a musical bug, op, no you already did that. All right look, you're going to have to go there yourself now, okay, make a few surprise visits.ScenesRoss: I don't know you guys.ScenesChandler: All right fine, don't do anything, just sit here and talk to us, meanwhile she is talking to him about you. And he's being Mr. Joe Sensitive, and she starts thinking 'Maybe this is the guy for me, because he understands me.'ScenesJoey: And before you know it, she's with him. And you'll be all, 'Ohh, man!' And he'll be all, 'Yes!' And us, we'll be like, 'Wh-whoa, dude.' And pretty soon you'll be like, (sadly) 'Hhiii,' and, and, and, 'I can't go, Rachel and Mark might be there.' And we'll be like, 'Man get over it, it's been four years!!'ScenesChandler: He paints quite a picture doesn't he?

rows.Scenes: Rachel's office.]
rows.Content: Woman: (walking up to Mark) Here's the Shelly Siegal stuff from December.ScenesMark: (turning around) And wait, I've got something for you. (kisses her)ScenesWoman: Mark!!ScenesMark: It's okay, Rachel knows.ScenesWoman: Yeah, but even soo.Scenes(Ross appears in the hallway just outside of Rachel's office.)ScenesMark: I can't help it, I'm just, I'm just crazy about you.ScenesRachel: Ohhh! That is soo sweet! (gets up to get herself a cup of coffee)Scenes(Ross is eavesdropping in the hallway.)ScenesMark: Okay, okay look, I know I'm being Mr. Inappropriate today, but it's just so tough, I mean see you walking around and I just wanna touch you and hold you, come on no one's around, just, just kiss me.Scenes(They start to kiss, and Ross rushes into the office to break it up.)ScenesRoss: All right that's, that's it!! Get off her!ScenesMark: What is going on?ScenesRoss: What's going on?! (throws the love bug at him) That's what's going on!!ScenesRachel: (now standing behind Ross) Ross!Scenes(Ross finally looks at the woman kissing Mark.)ScenesRoss: I have been down in your store for twenty minutes trying to get a tie! What do I have to do to get some service?! (turns to Rachel) Hi Rach. (He's puts his hand on her shoulder and she knocks it away.)

rows.Scenes: Joey's dance audition, Joey is warming up.]
rows.Content: Director: Ah Joey. Joey Tribbiani. Listen Joey, I got a problem, I just got a call from my dance captain, he's having a relationship crisis and can't get out of Long Island.ScenesJoey: So, does that mean the audition is off?ScenesDirector: Listen Joey, seeing as you've got the most experience, I want you to take these dancers and show them the combination.ScenesJoey: What?!ScenesDirector: Aw come on Joey, it's easy. Y'know, it's hand, hand, head, head, (very quickly, Joey watches stunned) up, pas de bouree, pas de bouree, big turn here, grand sissone, sissone, sissone, slide back, step, step, step, and jazz hands!ScenesJoey: It's ah, step-ity, step and jazz hands.ScenesDirector: Have fun.ScenesJoey: Bye. (does the jazz hands)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Monica is tying a ribbon to a vase.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: (entering) Hey!ScenesMonica: Hey.ScenesPhoebe: What are you wrapping?ScenesMonica: Oh-ho, look what I got Julio.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, it's a vase.ScenesMonica: Yeah, just like the one in the poem.ScenesPhoebe: Well not exactly like the one in the poem.ScenesMonica: What do you mean?ScenesPhoebe: Remember how you said you were really dense about poetry? Oh. (hugs her)

rows.Scenes: The Moondance Diner.]
rows.Content: Monica: (to Julio) So! I'm just an empty vase, huh?ScenesJulio: What?ScenesMonica: Y'know, so I don't read as many important books as you do, and I don't write trick poems that seem to be about one thing but are actually about something else. And y'know what, I get excited about stupid stuff, like when I my People magazine comes on Saturday, and the new Hold Everything catalog. Y'know but that does not mean that I'm empty, I care about things. I care about my friends and family. You have no right to make that kind of judgment about me.ScenesJulio: Whoa, whoa, whoa.ScenesMonica: You don't even know me...ScenesJulio: Whoa, whoa, whoa, the poem is not about you.ScenesMonica: What?ScenesJulio: The Empty Vase is not about you. My baby, you make me so sad that you would think this.ScenesMonica: I'm sorry, my friend Phoebe...ScenesJulio: No, it's about all women. Well, all American women. You feel better now?ScenesMonica: (sarcastically) Oh yeah.

rows.Scenes: Joey's audition, the director has returned and wants to see the combination.]
rows.Content: Director: All right, let's do it!Scenes(The group does the same horrible dance that Joey did earlier in the show, except they're all out of sync and they do the jazz hands at the end.)ScenesDirector: No, no, no. What was that?ScenesJoey: I know, it was the best I could get out of them.ScenesDirector: Well, people!ScenesJoey: People, people, people.ScenesDirector: Let's try it again, and this time let's watch everybody watch Joey. (to Joey) Show 'em how it's done. (to the pianist) Count it off.Scenes(The pianist starts to play, and Joey readies himself, and then runs out of the audition.)

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Chandler and Rachel are there.]
rows.Content: Rachel: So ah, did you have fun at the bachelor party last night?ScenesChandler: Oh yeah, yeah! Look what I got, look what I got. (holds up a pen) See, she's fully dressed, right?ScenesRachel: Right.ScenesChandler: And then you click it and, uh-oh, she's naked. And then, and then you click it again and she's dressed. She's a business woman, she's walking down the street, she's window shopping, and (clicks pen) whoa-whoa-whoa, sh-she's naked! (Rachel just stares at him.)ScenesRoss: (entering) Hi.ScenesRachel: Hello.ScenesChandler: Y'know what, I'm, I'm gonna spend some alone time with the pen.ScenesRoss: (sits down next to her) I'm sorry, I was an idiot.ScenesRachel: A big idiot.ScenesRoss: A big idiot. Just you have to realize is, this whole Mark thing is kinda hard for me.Scenes(Gunther is eavesdropping in the background.)ScenesRachel: Honey, why is it hard, I mean we've been together for almost a year now?ScenesRoss: Well, I was with Carol for like eight years and I lost her. And now if it's possible I think I love you even more. So, it's hard for me to believe that I'm not gonna, well that someone else is not going to take you away.ScenesGunther: Let it be me! Let it be me!ScenesRachel: Honey, that's very sweet, it just seems to me though, that if two people love each other and trust each other, like we do, there's no reason to be jealous. (she kisses him)ScenesRoss: I gotta get going. Bye Chandler.ScenesChandler: Oh, okay Ross. Listen, this pen is kinda getting boring, so can you pick me up some porn?ScenesRachel: Where ya going?ScenesRoss: Oh, I've got to go pick up Ben, we've got a play date this afternoon.ScenesRachel: Ohh, with who?ScenesRoss: Oh, just this woman that I met last night at the party.ScenesRachel: There was a woman at the... (realizes) The stripper?!ScenesRoss: Yeah.ScenesRachel: You have a play date with a stripper?!ScenesChandler: Man, I gotta get a kid. (looks at the pen and starts laughing)ScenesRoss: Ah, yeah, yeah. Umm, we started talking after she y'know, did her thing. And it turns out she's got a boy about Ben's age, so we're taking them to a gym-boree class. Why, is that okay?ScenesRachel: Sure, is she married?ScenesRoss: Ahh, no.ScenesRachel: Oh. (starts shaking the sugar down in a packet really hard.)ScenesRoss: Are you jealous?ScenesRachel: Noo, I y'know I don't see why she has to play with you, that's all. I mean doesn't she have any y'know other stripper moms friends of her own?ScenesRoss: You are totally jealous.ScenesRachel: I'm not jealous. All right this is about, umm, people feeling certain things y'know about strippers. And y'know, and um, I...ScenesRoss: Honey, I love you too.ScenesRachel: Ugh. Wait, wait, wait.ScenesRoss: What?Scenes(She runs over and gives him a very passionate kiss.)ScenesRoss: Huh.ScenesRachel: (to Chandler) Well, there's a kiss that he won't forget for a couple of hours, y'know.ScenesChandler: Yeah. Either that, or you just turned him on and sent him off to a stripper.ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: The Moondance Diner.]
rows.Content: Man: (entering) Is there a Julio here?ScenesJulio: (to him) I am Julio.Scenes(The rest of barbershop quartet enters, and joins him.)ScenesMan: (singing) Mister Pretensous, (Monica stands up in the background) you think there's no one finer, well but your poems are unpublished, and you work in a diner.ScenesQuartet: Your no God's gift to women, that's all in your headdddd. You are just a buttmunch.ScenesBass Singer: No one likes a buttmunch.ScenesQuartet: And your also bad in bedd-edd-edd!.Scenes(Monica waves at Julio.)ScenesEndScenesThe One Where Monica and Richard Are FriendsScenesWritten by: Michael BorkowScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: A Video Store, Monica is running in to return a video.]
rows.Content: Monica: (to clerk) Hi.Scenes(The clerk enters the video into the computer.)ScenesClerk: Six dollars, please.ScenesMonica: Six? I just had it for one night. Its three.ScenesClerk: Eight oclock is the cut-off and, (looks at his watch) aww, its 8:02.ScenesMonica: Y'know in a weird way, you have too much power. Look, youre gonna have to help me out here, cause I only have three.ScenesRichard: (standing behind her, without his moustache) I can help with that.ScenesMonica: Oh my God. Richard? (turns around) Hi!ScenesRichard: Hi!ScenesMonica: Wow! Your lip went bald. (Richard pays the clerk) Hey, thanks.ScenesRichard: So, you look great.ScenesMonica: Right.ScenesRichard: No you do. You... just...ScenesMonica: What?ScenesRichard: Youve got panties stuck to your leg.ScenesMonica: (removes them) Thats because I-I was just grabbing some things out of the dryer, and its static cling. Or maybe its just that God knew Id be running into you and saw an opportunity.ScenesRichard: Its good to see you.ScenesMonica: Its good to see you too.Scenes(They hug, and Richard notices a stocking stuck to Monicas back, which he removes for her.)ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: continued from earlier.]
rows.Content: Monica: You see that guy? Hes in classics now, but y'know as soon as we leave hes going straight to the porn.ScenesRichard: Hes gonna go up to the counter with Citizen Kane, Vertigo, and Clockwork Orgy. (they both laugh) This is nice.ScenesMonica: Yeah.ScenesRichard: I missed this.ScenesMonica: Me too.ScenesRichard: So, you wanna get a hamburger or something?ScenesMonica: Oh, um, I dont know if thats a good idea.ScenesRichard: Oh. Look, just friends, I wont grope you. I promise.ScenesMonica: No, I just I think that its too soon.ScenesRichard: No its not too soon, I had lunch at a eleven.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Chandler, Ross. Joey, and Rachel are eating breakfast. Chandler is holding a bottle of Herseys Syrup.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Yeah, baby!ScenesRoss: What are you doing?ScenesChandler: Making chocolate milk. Do you want some?ScenesRoss: No thanks. Im 29.ScenesRachel: (looking at her watch) Oh my God, I gotta go to work!ScenesRoss: Oh sweetie, when do you think youre going to get off tonight?ScenesRachel: Oh I dont know honey. Its gonna be really late.ScenesRoss: Oh come on, not again.ScenesRachel: I know. Im sorry. Look, Ill make a deal with you all right? Okay?ScenesRoss: Hmm.ScenesRachel: For every night that youre asleep before I get home from work...ScenesRoss: Yeah.ScenesRachel: I will wake you up in a way thats proved very popular in the past.ScenesRoss: Now, if you need to stay late, I want to be supportive of that.ScenesRachel: Right.ScenesPhoebe: (entering, holding a pair of Roller Blades) Hi.ScenesAll: Hey.ScenesJoey: (to Phoebe) Look at you. Since when do you roller blade?ScenesPhoebe: Oh! Since tomorrow. I met this really cute guy in the park and he like y'know, jogs, and blades, and swims, and so y'know we made a deal thats hes going to teach me all sorts of jock stuff.ScenesRoss: And what are you going to do for him?ScenesPhoebe: Im going to let him.ScenesRoss: Okay.ScenesJoey: Cool.ScenesMonica: (entering from her bedroom) Morning.ScenesAll: Hey.ScenesRachel: Somebody got in late last night.ScenesMonica: Yeah well, I ran into Richard.Scenes(They all gasp)ScenesRachel: When did this happen?ScenesMonica: Oh, um, around 8:02. We ah, talked for a little while, and then um, we went out for an innocent burger.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, theres no such thing as an innocent burger.ScenesRoss: So, are you gonna see him again?ScenesMonica: Tomorrow night.ScenesRachel: Monica, what are you doing?ScenesChandler: Well, she spent the last six months getting over him, and now shes celebrating that by going on a date with him.ScenesMonica: Its not a date, okay. Im just gonna teach him how to make lasagne for some pot luck dinner he has.ScenesJoey: Well, you might wanna make a little extra, y'know youll probably be hungry after the sex.ScenesMonica: Were not gonna have sex! Okay, nothings changed here. He still doesnt want children and I still do, so thats why were just gonna be friends.ScenesRoss: Naked friends.

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joey's, Joey is watching TV.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (entering) Hey.ScenesJoey: Hey.ScenesRachel: Do you have any ice?ScenesJoey: Check the freezer. If theres none in there, then were probably out. Are you just getting in from work? Its late.ScenesRachel: Yeah, I know. I had the greatest day though, I got to sit in on the meeting with the reps from Calvin Klien. I told my boss I liked this line of lingerie, she ordered a ton of it. How was your day?ScenesJoey: I discovered Im able to count all of my teeth using just my tongue.ScenesRachel: Hmm. (she opens the freezer) Umm, why do you have a copy of The Shining in your freezer?ScenesJoey: Oh, I was reading it last night, and I got scared, so.ScenesRachel: But ah, youre safe from it if its in the freezer?ScenesJoey: Well, safer. Y'know, I mean I never start reading The Shining, without making sure weve got plenty of room in the freezer, y'know.ScenesRachel: How often do you read it?ScenesJoey: Havent you ever read the same book over and over again?ScenesRachel: Well, umm, I guess I read Little Women more than once. But I mean thats a classic, whats so great about The Shining?ScenesJoey: The question should be Rach, what is not so great about The Shining. Okay? And the answer would be: nothing. All right? This is like the scariest book ever. I bet its way better than that classic of yours.ScenesRachel: Okay. Ah, well well just see about that, okay. I will read The Shining, (she tries to take the book away from him but he doesnt want to let it go) and you will read Little Women.ScenesJoey: All right, you got it.ScenesRachel: All right.ScenesJoey: Okay.ScenesRachel: Okay.ScenesJoey: Ah, now Rach, these ah, these little women.ScenesRachel: Yeah.ScenesJoey: How little are they? I mean, are they like scary little?

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Chandler and Ross are there, Phoebe is entering with her date Robert.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Um, Chandler, Ross, this is Robert.ScenesChandler: Oh, hey.ScenesRobert: Hi.ScenesRoss: Hey.ScenesPhoebe: (to Robert) Youve have lipstick right here (points to her cheek). Thats okay, its mine, we just kissed.ScenesRoss: Oh.ScenesChandler: (to Robert) So ah, isnt a bit cold out for shorts?ScenesRobert: Well, Im from California.ScenesChandler: Right, right. Sometimes you guys just burst into flames.Scenes(Robert leans back on the arm of the chair and allows Chandler to see up his shorts and sees little Robert. Chandler is horrified by this view.)ScenesChandler: (standing up) Im up! Im up, Ive gotten up now! Anybody ah, want anything?ScenesPhoebe: Ill have coffee.ScenesRobert: Yeah, me too.ScenesRoss: Yeah, make that three.ScenesChandler: Okay Ross, why dont you come with me?ScenesRoss: Okay. (goes over to the counter) (to Chandler) What ah, what is the matter with you? Whats going on?ScenesChandler: Roberts coming out.ScenesRoss: What, what do you mean, what? Is he gay?ScenesChandler: No. He.....hes coming out of his shorts.ScenesRoss: What?!ScenesChandler: The man is showing brain.ScenesRoss: Are you sure? (Chandler nods: Yes!) Hold on. (walks over behind the couch) Im sorry you guys, that was a coffee and a....ScenesRobert: Coffee.ScenesRoss: Okay.ScenesRobert: We could write it down for you?ScenesRoss: No, no, that wont be ah, that wont be necessary (leans down and looks up Roberts shorts, seeing Roberts package.)ScenesChandler: (to Ross) Wellll?ScenesRoss: Yeah, yeah, yeah!ScenesChandler: What do we do? What do we do?ScenesRoss: Well, I suppose we just try to not look directly at it.ScenesChandler: Like an eclipse.Scenes(Ross nods his head.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Monica is teaching Richard how to make lasagne.]
rows.Content: Richard: So when people complement me on my cooking should I, what do I say?ScenesMonica: You say Thank you very much, and then you buy me something pretty. Come on, were gonna put are hands in this bowl, and were gonna start squishing the tomatoes.Scenes(They both start squishing the tomatoes.)ScenesRichard: Ew, this feels very weird.ScenesMonica: You touch peoples eyeballs every day and this feels weird.ScenesRichard: Yeah, well, sure I touch them, but I spent years learning not to squish them. (Monica grabs his hand in the tomatoes.) Thats my hand.ScenesMonica: Oops.ScenesRichard: Okay.ScenesMonica: Gotta keep squishing.ScenesRichard: Tomatoes are squishing.ScenesMonica: Okay.Scenes(Richard squishes a little too hard and some lands on his shirt.)ScenesRichard: Op.ScenesMonica: Oh, gosh, you got some on your shirt.ScenesRichard: Yeah.ScenesMonica: Hold on a second, just put a little club soda on it (does so) and it should umm, be.....Scenes(She is rubbing his chest and her voice trails off into silence, a long pause follows.)ScenesRichard: What?ScenesMonica: Umm, youve got some on your pants.ScenesRichard: Ill just throw them out.

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Chandler is watching Joey read Little Women, Ross is also there.]
rows.Content: Joey: These little women. Wow!ScenesChandler: Your liking it, huh?ScenesJoey: Oh yeah! Amy just burned Jos manuscript. I dont see how he could ever forgive her.ScenesRoss: Umm, Jos a girl, its short for Josephine.ScenesJoey: But Jos got a crush on Laurie. (Ross nods his head) Oh. You mean its like a girl-girl thing? Cause that is the one thing missing from The Shining.ScenesChandler: No, actually Lauries a boy.ScenesJoey: No wonder Rachel had to read this so many times.Scenes(Enter Phoebe and Robert)ScenesPhoebe: Hey!ScenesChandler: Hey.ScenesRoss: Hey! Howd the ah, basketball go?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, okay, I learned how to shoot a lay-up, a foul shot, and a twenty-three pointer.ScenesChandler: You mean a three pointer?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, I get more because Im dainty.ScenesRobert: So um, is there a phone here, I can check my messages?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, in the back. You want a quarter?ScenesRobert: Oh, no thanks. I always carry one in my sock.Scenes(He puts his leg up on the couch to get the quarter, once again exposing himself to Chandler and Ross. In horror, Chandler, slides over and leans against Joey on the couch.)ScenesJoey: (noticing Chandler) What are you doing? (he pushes Chandler back to his side of the couch) Get back over on your side of the... (sees Robert in all his glory) Hello!! (to Robert) Hi, Im Joey, we havent met.ScenesRobert: Ah, good to meet you. Robert.Scenes(Robert walks away and the guys all start laughing in front of Phoebe.)ScenesPhoebe: What? (the guys keep laughing.) What? You guys, what is going on? You not like Robert? (the guys keep laughing.) Why are you laughing?!ScenesRoss: Calm down. Theres no reason to get testy.Scenes(The guys start laughing harder.)ScenesPhoebe: You guys!! Come on!ScenesChandler: Im sorry, Im sorry, it just seems that Robert isnt as concealed in the shorts area, as ah, one may have hoped.ScenesPhoebe: What do you mean?ScenesRobert: Hey. (sits down)ScenesPhoebe: Hey.ScenesJoey: Hey Robert, could you ah, ha, pass me those cookies?ScenesRobert: Sure.Scenes(He puts his leg up on the table to pass Joey the cookies, and Phoebe sees what the guys are laughing at, and gasps.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Monica is talking to Richard on the phone.]
rows.Content: Monica: So, howd the lasagne go over? (listens) Really?! Good. So you owe me three pretty things. (listens) Yeah, Ive been thinking a lot about you too. (listens) I know. Its hard this whole platonic thing. (listens) Its a word!Scenes(Theres a knock on the door.)ScenesMonica: Yeah, I do think its better this way. (listens) Yeah, were being smart. (gets up to answer the door) (listens) Yes, Im sure.(she opens the door and its Richard)ScenesRichard: You really sure?ScenesMonica: Ill call you back. (starts kissing him)ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: Monicas bedroom, shes in bed with Richard.]
rows.Content: Monica: So we can be friends who sleep together.ScenesRichard: Absolutely, this will just be something we do, like racquetball.ScenesMonica: Sounds smart and healthy to me. So um, just out of curiosity, um, do you currently have any other racquetball buddies?ScenesRichard: Just your dad. (pause) Although thats actually racquetball. You know I-I do have a blind date with my sisters neighbour next Tuesday.ScenesMonica: Oh.ScenesRichard: You want me to cancel it?ScenesMonica: No! (pushes him) No!ScenesRichard: Okay.ScenesMonica: Cause if you do that means youd be cancelling it for me, and were just friends.ScenesRichard: Exactly. (pushes her back)

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Robert is picking up Phoebe for a date.]
rows.Content: Robert: Hey.ScenesPhoebe: Hey. Ooh! Dont sit down!ScenesRobert: You ready to go to the batting cage?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah. And, first heres a gift.ScenesRobert: Oh! Wow! Hey!ScenesChandler: Stretchy pants! Why, those are the greatest things in the world! If I were you I would wear them every day, every day!ScenesRobert: Jeez, thank you really that is so nice. But um, to be honest, I dont think I can wear these, theyre so tight, I feel like Im on display. Im sorry.ScenesPhoebe: Thats all right, thats well, I figured.... (they start to leave as Joey enters.)ScenesRobert: (to Joey) Hey!ScenesJoey: Hey! (starts to laugh.) Hows it going?ScenesRoss: Good.ScenesJoey: Hey, Rach, how you doing with The Shining?ScenesRachel: Oh, Danny just went into room 217.ScenesJoey: Oooh, the next parts the best, when that dead lady in the bathtub...ScenesRachel: Oh, no, meh-nah-nah-nah, come on youre gonna ruin it!ScenesJoey: All right Ill talk in code. (to Ross and Chandler) Remember when the kid sees those two blanks in the hallway?ScenesChandler: Hmmm, thats very cool.ScenesJoey: Oh, all blank, and no blank, makes blank a blank blank. Oh no-no-no, no, the end when Jack almost kills them all with that blank, but then at last second they get away. Aww!ScenesRachel: Joey! I cant believe you just did that!ScenesChandler: I cant believe she cracked your code!ScenesRachel: All right, okay, Laurie proposes to Jo, and she says no, even though shes still in love with him, and then he ends up marring Amy.ScenesJoey: Hey! Mine was by accident! All right, the boiler explodes and destroys the hotel, and kills the dad.ScenesRachel: Eh. Beth dies.Scenes(Joey recoils and gasps in horror.)ScenesJoey: Beth, Beth dies?ScenesRachel: Um-hmm.ScenesJoey: Is that true? If I keep reading is Beth gonna die?ScenesChandler: No, Beth doesnt die, she doesnt die. Does she Rachel?ScenesRachel: What?!ScenesRoss: Joeys asking if youve just ruined the first book hes ever loved that didnt star Jack Nicholson?ScenesRachel: No. She doesnt die.ScenesJoey: Then why would you say that?!ScenesRachel: Because, I wanted to hurt you.ScenesRobert: (running in) Oh, there they are! I-I dropped my keys.Scenes(He bends over to pick them up, right in front of Rachel, who then gets a free peep show.)ScenesRachel: (gasps) Oh my....ScenesRobert: Got em.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Rachel is reading The Shining, as Monica enters.]
rows.Content: Monica: Hi.ScenesRachel: (screams and grabs a potato masher to defend herself) Sorry. Im sorry.ScenesMonica: You would not believe my day! I had to work two shifts, and then to top it off, I lost one of my fake boobs, (opens her coat revealing a large burn mark over her left breast.) in a grill fire.Scenes(Rachel starts laughing.)ScenesMonica: What are you smiling at?ScenesRachel: Im sorry, I was just thinking youre day could still pick up.ScenesMonica: Yeah, right.Scenes(She goes into her bedroom, and sees Richard who has covered the room in roses and has two glasses of wine and a rose between his lips.)ScenesRichard: Hello.ScenesMonica: I love this friend thing!

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Phoebe, Chandler, and Ross are there.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Listen, Roberts gonna be here any second so, will one of you just tell him?ScenesRoss: Oh.ScenesPhoebe: Please, right now, no, every time I see him its like Is it on the lose? Is it watching me?ScenesChandler: We cant tell him, you cant go up to a guy you barely know and talk about his.... stuff.ScenesRoss: Hes right, even if its to say something complementary. (He stops and thinks about what he just said.)ScenesRobert: (entering) Hey!ScenesPhoebe: Hey.ScenesRobert: (to Phoebe) So are ready for the gym? Theyve got this new rock climbing wall, we can spot each other.ScenesPhoebe: No, I can spot you from here.ScenesRobert: What?ScenesPhoebe: Okay, listen Robert...ScenesRoss: (to Chandler) Hey, dont we have to...ScenesChandler: Yeah, we got, um-hmm.ScenesPhoebe: Umm, I think youre really, really great...ScenesRobert: Oh God! Here we go again. Why does this keep happening to me? (spreads his legs) Is it something Im putting out there? Is this my fault? Or am I just nuts?ScenesPhoebe: I-I-I-I-I dont know, I dont know what to say.ScenesGunther: (cleaning up the table) (to Robert) Hey buddy, this is a family place, put the mouse back in the house.Scenes(Robert looks down and realises the problem.)

rows.Scenes: Richards bedroom, Monica has covered it in rose pedals and candles. We hear Richard come in to the apartment, and Monica frantically throws the rest of the pedals on the bed, and jumps onto the bed and puts a rose in her mouth, and bites a thorn.]
rows.Content: Monica: Ow!ScenesRichard: (outside the bedroom) Really?! Well, its just like everyone elses apartment. Its got rooms, walls, and ceilings.ScenesRichards Date: Well, I just wanted to see where you lived. Now, give me the tour.ScenesMonica: Oh my God! Oh my God! (She frantically tries to clean up the bedroom as Richard starts the tour.)ScenesRichard: Ah well, this is the living room.ScenesRichards Date: Impressive.ScenesRichard: All right. This is the kitchen.ScenesRichards Date: Oh, thats real pretty. Wait a minute, dont I get to see the bedroom?ScenesRichard: The bedroom. Well its pretty much your typical... (opens the door as Monica hides under the covers, and quickly closes the door before his date can see the room.) bedroom.ScenesRichards Date: Were still on this side of the door.ScenesRichard: Um-hmm.ScenesRichards Date: Yeah, but I didnt get to see it.ScenesRichard: Oh shoot! Maybe next time. (yawns) Thanks for a lovely evening. (shows her out)Scenes[Cut to into the bedroom, with Monica still hiding under the covers. Richard enters and sits down next to her.]ScenesMonica: (still hiding under the blankets) So um, who was she?ScenesRichard: Oh, (laughs) that was the blind date that I told you about, she called and switched it to today.ScenesMonica: (still hiding under the blankets) Did you like her? And Im just asking as a friend, because I am totally fine with this.ScenesRichard: Well, you seem fine.ScenesMonica: (gets up) Okay, y'know what, Im not fine, Im not. I mean how can I be fine, hearing you come in with her, she wants to see your bedroom.... (pause) Y'know what, what if were friends who dont see other people?ScenesRichard: You mean like exclusive friends?ScenesMonica: Why not?! I mean this has been the most amazing week. Would it be so terrible? Even if we were friends who lived together. Or, maybe someday friends who stood up in front of their other friends, and vowed to be friends forever.ScenesRichard: Wow. Y'know were back where we were. Honey, I would love to do all that, but nothings changed.ScenesMonica: Thats not true, you dont have a moustache.ScenesRichard: Okay, okay, one things changed. But we still want different things and we know how this is gonna end.ScenesMonica: Y'know what, Ive got to walk out of here right now, cause getting over you is the hardest thing that I have ever had to do. I dont think I could do it again.ScenesRichard: I know I couldnt. So....Scenes(Monica kisses him.)ScenesMonica: How bout one last game of racquetball?Scenes(They both kiss, and Richard picks her up and goes over to the bed and starts to lie down.)ScenesMonica: Watch the thorns!ScenesRichard: (lying down) Ow!!ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Joey is entering, and hes very dejected.]
rows.Content: Rachel: What?ScenesJoey: Beth is really, really sick.ScenesRachel: Awwww.ScenesJoey: Jos there, but I dont think theres anything she could do.Scenes(Rachel hugs him)ScenesRachel: Joey?ScenesJoey: Yeah.ScenesRachel: Do you want to put the book in the freezer?ScenesJoey: (nodding his head) Okay.ScenesRachel: Okay.Scenes(Joey hands her the book and she puts it in the freezer.)ScenesEndScenesThe One With Phoebes Ex-PartnerScenesWritten by: Wil CalhounScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, the gang, except Rachel, is watching a new singer.]
rows.Content: Singer: (singing) Cause every time I see your face, I cant help but fall from grace. I know.....ScenesJoey: Wow! This girl is good.ScenesPhoebe: Oh-ho yeah! A song with rhyming words. Oo, I never thought of that before.ScenesChandler: I like her.ScenesPhoebe: (to Chandler) Why? Because she can sing and play guitar and do both at the same time?ScenesChandler: Well, thats pretty much all Im looking for from these people.ScenesMonica: (to Phoebe) Look at you. All jealous.ScenesRoss: Yeah Pheebs, come on, you two have completely different styles. Y'know, shes more..(shakes his shoulders, like hes dancing) y'know, and youre more (sees the look from Phoebe and stops)ScenesSinger: (singing) beside meeeee-eeee-ee. (everyone applauds her).ScenesPhoebe: Okay, see, see, everyone else is happy shes done.ScenesSinger: Okay, my next songs called: Phoebe Buffay, What Can I Say. I Really Loved When We Were Singing Partners, And I Shouldnt Have Left You That Way.Scenes(The gang all looks at Phoebe.)ScenesPhoebe: Oh no, one of those look for the hidden meaning songs.ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, later.]
rows.Content: Singer: Hey Phoebe.ScenesPhoebe: Hey Leslie, howd you know Id be here?ScenesLeslie: I ran into Vlad at the place where they sell the big fish, and he said you played here a lot, so umm....ScenesChandler: (to Ross) All right listen, I have to go to the bathroom, but if the place with the big fish comes up again. Id like know whether thats several big fish or just one big fish.ScenesJoey: (to Leslie) So ah, Phoebe tells us you write jingles.ScenesPhoebe: Actually I said she abandoned me to write jingles.ScenesJoey: (to Leslie) Ah, anything we might of heard of?ScenesLeslie: Ah, yeah, umm. (singing) Home is never far away..ScenesMonica, Ross, and Joey: (joining in) Home is Home Star stew.ScenesLeslie: Yeah, but, I dont do that anymore. I got kinda sick of it, and then I couldnt come up with anything good, so they fired me.ScenesPhoebe: Hmm, bummer.ScenesLeslie: Well, I y'know, I was just, umm, I was just thinking and hoping, that umm, maybe youd want to get back together?ScenesPhoebe: No. But thanks.ScenesLeslie: Aw come on Phoebe would you just think about it?ScenesPhoebe: Okay. No. But thanks.ScenesLeslie: Okay, ah, see ya Pheebs. (leaves)ScenesJoey: (to Phoebe) Wow, that was kinda brutal.ScenesPhoebe: Well okay, let this be a lesson to all of you, all right. Once you, once you betray me, I become like the ice woman, yknow. Very cold, hard, unyielding, y'know nothing, nothing can penetrate this icy exterior. (to Monica) Can I have a tissue, please?ScenesMonica: Yeah, sure.

rows.Scenes: Outside the bathroom, Chandler is pacing back and fourth, waiting is use it.]
rows.Content: Gunther: (to Chandler) Someone in there?ScenesChandler: No. This is just part of a dare devil game that I play called wait until the last moment before I burst and die.Scenes(The door opens.)ScenesChandler: Jeez, man did you fall..(sees its a beautiful woman coming out of the mens room) Hi! So ah, did ya, did-did-did ya fall high?ScenesWoman: Someone was in the lady's room, I couldnt wait. I left the lid up for ya though.Scenes(Gunther walks up)ScenesChandler: (to Gunther) Y'know what Gunther, go ah, go ahead, Im-Im talking to ah, (tries to get her to say her name). (to her) This is the part where you say your name.ScenesWoman: Ginger.ScenesChandler: Ginger. Im talking to Ginger, so....ScenesGinger: Dont you have to use the bathroom?ScenesChandler: Nope, nope, Id just ah, Id rather talk to you. (pause) Yes, I do. Yes, I do have to go to the bathroom. (knocks on the door)ScenesGunther: Someone in here.

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, the gangs putting their coats on to leave.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Wheres Chandler?ScenesJoey: Ah, he cant make it, he said he had to his... (sees Ginger) Whoa-oh! (hides behind the coat rack.)ScenesGinger: Joey? Joey Tribbiani?Scenes(She walks over behind the coat rack, but Joey picks it up and moves it so that hes still behind it, and she cant see him.)ScenesGinger: Joey I can see you okay? Youre hiding behind the coats.Scenes(Joey puts his finger over his mouth to tell Ross to keep quiet. Ginger looks at Monica who looks away and leave.)ScenesJoey: Phew, close one.

rows.Scenes: Rachels office, Mark is packing his stuff into a box.]
rows.Content: Ross: Hi.ScenesRachel: Hi, sweetie!ScenesRoss: Hello.ScenesMark: Hi, Ross.ScenesRoss: Yeah, huh.ScenesRachel: Ive got some bad news.ScenesRoss: What?ScenesRachel: I can get a quick bite to eat, but then I have to come back up here.ScenesRoss: Come on sweetie! Youve had to work late every night for the past two weeks, what is it this time?ScenesMark: Actually, its kinda my fault. I-I quit today.ScenesRoss: (to Rachel) But work comes first! (to Mark) Oh hey, but thats sad about you though, what happened? Burn out? Burn all out, did ya?ScenesRachel: Nooo, hes leaving for a better job.ScenesRoss: Oh well thats great, so I guess this is ah, this is good bye then. Huh? (picks a pad up off Rachels desk and tosses it into his box) Good bye.ScenesMark: Okay, then.ScenesRoss: Okay.ScenesRachel: Well were gonna miss you around here.ScenesMark: Yeah, me too.Scenes(Rachel goes to hug him but Ross is holding one of her hands and doesnt let go, so she can only put one arm around him.)ScenesMark: So, see ya on Saturday.ScenesRachel: Yeah, you bet.Scenes(Ross is shocked, but Rachel drags him out of the office.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe and Monica are playing with a Ouija board, Phoebes beeper goes off and Monica screams.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Oh. (takes her beeper puts in a pot, covers it, and puts the pot in the oven)ScenesMonica: Y'know those are a delicacy in India.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, that was Leslie calling again to see if we can get back together. Thats the twentieth time today! And good luck Leslie!ScenesMonica: Wow, she must have hurt you pretty bad, huh?ScenesPhoebe: Well, yeah. Y'know, we were best friends, ever since we were little, our Moms worked on the barge together.ScenesMonica: Oh, you two must have been so cute running around on a barge.ScenesPhoebe: You never run on a barge!ScenesJoey: (entering) Hey.ScenesPhoebe and Monica: Hey.ScenesJoey: Is ah, is Chandler around?ScenesMonica: No, umm, he met some girl at the coffee house.ScenesJoey: Oooh.ScenesMonica: Yeah, Ginger something.ScenesJoey: Nooo. No, no, ah, are you sure it wasnt something that sounded like Ginger, like ah, Gingeer?ScenesMonica: No, it was Ginger. I remember, because when he told me, I said, (singing) the movie star.ScenesJoey: Aww, man. Thats the girl I was hiding from. When she finds out hes my roommate, shes gonna tell him what I did.ScenesMonica: Well, what did you do?ScenesJoey: What, oh, oh, oh, no, no, I cant, I cant tell you that, its like the most awful, horrible thing Ive ever done my whole life.ScenesMonica: Y'know what, dont tell us. Well just wait until Chandler gets home, (to Phoebe) because itll be more fun that way.ScenesJoey: All right!! Okay, it was like four years ago. Okay, Ginger and I had gone out a few times, and then this one weekend, we went up to her Dads cabin. Just me, her, and her annoying little dog Pepper. Well that night, I cooked this really romantic dinner....ScenesMonica: You gave her food poisoning!?ScenesJoey: I wish. No. After dinner, me, her, and Pepper all fell asleep in front of the fire. Well I woke up in the middle of the night and I saw that the fire was dying out. So, I picked up a log and threw it on. Or, at least what I thought was a log.ScenesPhoebe: Oh my God!! You threw Pepper on the fire!ScenesJoey: I wish. See, I guess another thing I probably shouldve told you about Ginger is that she kinda has a ah, artificial leg.Scenes(Phoebe and Monica both stand up and gasp.)ScenesMonica: Oh my God! Joey, what did you do after you threw her leg on the fire?ScenesJoey: I ran!!

rows.Scenes: A street, Chandler is kissing Ginger.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Well, thats the best kiss Ive had with anyone Ive ever met in a mens room.ScenesGinger: Actually, me too.ScenesChandler: (sees her foot is in a slush puddle) Op, foot in a puddle, foot all in a puddle.ScenesGinger: Oh damn, I hate that.ScenesChandler: Yeah, were gonna have to get you out of those shoes.ScenesGinger: Oh, dont worry about it.ScenesChandler: No, really youre gonna freeze.ScenesGinger: No, Im not.ScenesChandler: Youre not, what do you, what do you got a bionic foot?ScenesGinger: Some day, maybe.

rows.Scenes: Rosss bedroom, Rachel getting into bed while Ross is reading and laughs.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Funny book?ScenesRoss: Hmmm. Oh, no, no, I just thinking about something funny I heard today. Umm, Mark, Mark saying Ill see you Saturday.ScenesRachel: Yeah, at the lecture, I told you that last week, you said you didnt mind.ScenesRoss: Oh, no, no, no, its-its not the lecture ah, I mind, umm....ScenesRachel: Oh, please tell me its not because Im going with Mark.ScenesRoss: Oh, well...ScenesRachel: Oh my God!!! Ross!!ScenesRoss: Well, Im sorry, but ah, look if youre not working with him anymore, why do you have to still do stuff with him?ScenesRachel: Because, hes my friend.ScenesRoss: Okay, but do you really need another friend? I mean...ScenesRachel: Okay, well if I stop playing with Joey and Chandler, can I play with Mark?ScenesRoss: Is that funny? Am I supposed to be laughing?ScenesRachel: I dont know, you thought See you Saturday was funny. Look honey, Mark is in fashion okay, I like having a friend that I can share this stuff with. You guys would never want to go to a lecture with me.ScenesRoss: Pa-haa!! I would love to go with you.ScenesRachel: Really!?ScenesRoss: Yeah, hey I-I have clothes, I even pick them out. I mean for, for all you know I could be a fashion..... monger.ScenesRachel: Okay. Honey, I would love for you to go with me. (Ross has a worried look on his face) What?ScenesRoss: What should I wear, now Im all nervous.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe is looking at her beeper still in the pot. She takes it out, shakes it, and puts it back in.]
rows.Content: Monica: Y'know they say a watched pot never beeps.ScenesPhoebe: Its just y'know, been a couple of hours, and she hasnt called. Not that I even care, y'know.ScenesMonica: Phoebe why dont you just call her? You obviously want to.ScenesPhoebe: You think you know me so well.ScenesMonica: Well, dont cha wanna?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah.ScenesMonica: Okay, well I do know you.ScenesPhoebe: Thats what I said.ScenesMonica: Well so?ScenesPhoebe: I cant. I cant. She dumped me, I mean I totally trusted her and then one day it was Okay, bye Pheebs gone. Y'know what the saddest part is, when we were playing together, that was like the most fun Ive ever had in like all my lives.

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Leslie is singing.]
rows.Content: Leslie: (singing) My best shoes, so good to me. I wear them everyday. Down at the heel, holes in the toes. Dont care what people say. My feets best friends, pals to the end. With them Im one hot chicky. Though late one night, not much light, I....Scenes(Phoebe runs in and joins her.)ScenesPhoebe: (singing) I stepped in something icky.ScenesPhoebe and Leslie: (singing) Sticky shoes, sticky shoes, always make me smile. Sticky shoes, sticky shoes, next time Ill.... avoid the..... pillleeeee.ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: The lecture, Rachel is listening closely, Ross is bored out of his mind.]
rows.Content: Lecturer: Were beginning to see a lot of layering of sheer fabrics and colours. For instance a sheer navy blouse over a pink....ScenesRoss: (to Rachel) Im really glad we came. (Rachel smiles and rubs his arm) Youre so pretty. I love you.ScenesRachel: Oh. (puts her hand over his mouth)

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Phoebe is teaching Leslie how to sing Smelly Cat.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: (singing) Smelly cat, smelly cat, what are they feeding you? Smelly cat, smelly cat, its not your fault.ScenesLeslie: Wow, thats great.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, yeah!ScenesLeslie: Y'know you could totally sell this. Itd be perfect for like umm, a kitty litter campaign.ScenesPhoebe: I..., a jingle? No, no-no-no, no.ScenesLeslie: What? Why not? You could make a ton of money.ScenesPhoebe: Okay, well if I was in this for the money, Id be a millionaire by now, y'know. You just got to get out of that jingle head sweetie.ScenesLeslie: Aw, youre right, youre right. Im sorry.ScenesPhoebe: Thats okay. All right, Im gonna play song thats really, really sad. Its called Magician Box Mix Up. (she turns her guitar upside down to play it.)

rows.Scenes: The lecture, Ross is passed out against Rachels shoulder.]
rows.Content: Lecturer: ....oversized bracelets, oversized earrings, oversizing of accessories in general are very popular now.Scenes(Ross wakes up with a start and startles Rachel. The guy next to him starts laughing, which starts Ross laughing, Rachel gives him a look and he stops.)

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joey's, Chandler is reading the newspaper.]
rows.Content: Monica: (entering) Hi!ScenesChandler: Hey.ScenesMonica: Oh, can I borrow this? (points to his milk) My milks gone bad.ScenesChandler: Oh, I hate that. I once had a thing of half and half, stole my car.ScenesMonica: So umm, how was your date with Ginger?ScenesChandler: Great. It was great. Shes ah, shes great, great looking, great personality, shes greatness.ScenesMonica: Sounds like shes got the ah, whole package.ScenesChandler: Joey told you about the leg, huh?ScenesMonica: Uh-huh.ScenesChandler: Oh God, it freaked me out. Okay, I know it shouldnt have, but it did. I mean I like her, I dont want to stop seeing her, but every so often its like Hey, y'know what, wheres your leg? I mean Im the smallest person in the world arent I? Im the smallest person in the world.ScenesJoey: (entering from his bedroom) Morning.ScenesChandler: (to Monica) Actually hes the smallest person in the world.ScenesJoey: (to Chandler) Heard about the leg burnin huh?ScenesChandler: It came up.ScenesJoey: Listen, I ah, I know its a longshot. But, by any chance did she find that funny?Scenes(Both Chandler and Monica walk away in disgust.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Ross and Rachel are getting back from the lecture.]
rows.Content: Ross: (entering) So I nodded off a little.ScenesRachel: Nodded off!! Ross you were snoring. My fathers boat didnt make that much noise when it hit rocks!ScenesRoss: Come on! Forty-five minutes! Forty-five minutes the man talked about strappy backed dresses.ScenesRachel: Well okay, how about four hours in a freezing museum auditorium listening to Professor Pitstains and hes Hey everybody! Remember that thing thats been dead for a gazillion years. Well theres this little bone we didnt know it had!ScenesRoss: First of all its Professor Pittain! And second of all, that little bone, proved that, that particular dinosaur had wings, but didnt fly.ScenesRachel: Okay, see now, what I just heard: blah-blah-blah, blah-blah-blah-blah-blah, blah-blah-blah, blah, blah.ScenesRoss: Y'know what, 100 million people went to see a movie about what I do, I wonder how many people would go see a movie called, Jurassic Parka.ScenesRachel: Oh, that is so...ScenesRoss: No-no-no, a bunch of out of control jackets take over an island. (Makes an unusual sound, then he realises that he still has his jacket on and quickly tries to shake it off, thinking its alive and attacking him.)ScenesRachel: Y'know if what I do is so lame, then why did you insist on coming with me this morning? Huh? Was it so I just wouldnt go with Mark?ScenesRoss: No. I... I wanted to be with you. I dont know, I feel like lately, I feel like youre slipping away from me, y'know. With this new job, and all these new people, and youve got this whole other life going on. I-I-I know its dumb, but I hate that Im not a part of it.ScenesRachel: Its not dumb. But, maybe its okay that youre not a part of it. Y'know what I mean? (Ross looks confused) I mean its like, I-I-I like that youre not involved in that part of my life.ScenesRoss: Thats a little clearer.ScenesRachel: Honey see, it doesnt mean that I dont love you. Because I do. I love you, I love you so much. But my work its-its for me y'know, Im out there, on my own, and Im doing it and its scary but I love it, because its mine. I, but, I mean is that okay?ScenesRoss: Sure, I-I-I... (hugs her and mouths No!!)

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Joey's, Chandler and Ginger are eating dinner.]
rows.Content: Ginger: Your thinking about my leg arent you?ScenesChandler: No. No. Actually I forgot, what is the deal with that again?ScenesGinger: Its okay if it bothers you. Really. I mean the only thing I need to know is: How much it bothers you? because I dont like wasting my time. Am I wasting my time?ScenesChandler: No. No. I dont think so.ScenesGinger: Okay. Its just like anything else, you just have to get used to it.Scenes(They start making out. She opens his shirt and feels inside and stops.)ScenesGinger: Whats that?ScenesChandler: Thats-thats my nubbin.ScenesGinger: Whats a nubbin?ScenesChandler: Its kinda a ah, a third nipple kinda thing.ScenesGinger: You have three nipples?ScenesChandler: Well, y'know two regulars. And ah one that barely qualifies as... (starts to kiss her again, but she gets up.) Ahh, what?ScenesGinger: Nothing. I, I just remembered I have to leave.ScenesChandler: You ah, you have, you have to leave, now? How come?ScenesGinger: Ah well, its nubbin. Nothing! Umm. Y'know what, Ill see you later. Okay. (She leaves and in the hall we see her shake her shoulders like when someone runs their fingernails across a blackboard.)

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Phoebe is getting ready to sing as Leslie enters.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: (to Leslie) Oh, I thought you werent coming. What? Where were you?ScenesLeslie: Come here, come here. (they go to the side of the stage) Okay, dont get mad, okay.ScenesPhoebe: Okay, dont give me a reason to get mad, okayScenesLeslie: I played Smelly Cat for the people at my old ad agency, they went nuts.ScenesPhoebe: No, look, I told you that I didnt want you to try and sell it, and you just, you big fat did it anyway. God, y'know what, I think five years ago I probably wouldve done anything to play with you but, I can do it by myself. And if I cant trust you then just forget it.ScenesLeslie: No, no, I dont want to forget it.ScenesPhoebe: Okay y'know what you have to choose. All right, if-if the most important thing on the planet to you is this cat poopy thing then, okay you can have Smelly Cat, but we wont be partners. So whats it gonna be?

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe, Monica, and Joey are watching TV.]
rows.Content: Commercial: (in the background their singing Smelly Cat) Problem odour in the litter box? Dont change your kitty, change your kitty litter.Scenes(Monica gets up and shuts off the TV.)ScenesMonica: Sorry, Pheebs.ScenesJoey: Yeah. You okay?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah. I actually am, yeah. Y'know life-lifes gonna had you all kinds of stuff, y'know you learn your little lessons and hopefully you grow. Wanna hear a new song?ScenesJoey: Yeah.ScenesMonica: Wed love too.ScenesPhoebe: Okay. (singing) Jingle bitch screwed me over! Go to hell jingle whore! Go to hell Go to hell. Go to hell-hell-hell. Thats all I have so far.ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, the whole gang except Chandler is there.]
rows.Content: Chandler: (entering, happily) Well hello!ScenesJoey: Where have you been?ScenesChandler: The doctor.ScenesRoss: Is everything okay?ScenesChandler: Oh yes! Just had me a little nubbin-ectomy. Yep! Two nipples, no waiting.ScenesMonica: Wow! Its like Rachel in High School.ScenesRachel: What?!!ScenesMonica: Come on! Come on, I was kidding! It was such an obvious joke!ScenesChandler: That was an obvious joke, and I didnt think of it. Why didnt I think of it? The source of all my powers. Oh dear God, what have I done!ScenesEndScenesThe One Where Ross and Rachel Take A BreakScenesWritten by: Michael BorkowScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Joey is taking a jar of olives out of the fridge.]
rows.Content: Joey: (to Monica) Hey, how much will you give me to eat this whole jar of olives?ScenesMonica: I wont give you anything, but youll owe me 2.95.ScenesJoey: Done.ScenesPhoebe: (entering) Hey. I need an atlas! I need an atlas!ScenesMonica: Why? (in a motherlike tone) Do you have a report due?ScenesPhoebe: I have a date with this diplomat I met while I was giving free massages outside the UN and, I dont know where his country is.ScenesMonica: Okay, lets start with the free messages outside the UN.ScenesPhoebe: Oh!! Thats my new thing. I figure bodies at peace, make peace.ScenesMonica: Wow! You might just get the first Nobel prize in rubbing. So what country is this guy from?ScenesPhoebe: Ick-neck-tree-anis..... Theres a g in there.ScenesMonica: Wheres that?ScenesPhoebe: In your atlas!ScenesMonica: I dont have an atlas.ScenesPhoebe: Oh.ScenesMonica: Oh, but wait I do have a globe.ScenesPhoebe: Oh.ScenesMonica: Hold on.ScenesJoey: So Pheebs whats this guy like?ScenesPhoebe: Umm, well hes very dashing, y'know, and umm, very, very sophisticated, and he doesnt speak any English, but according to his translator, he totally gets me.ScenesMonica: Kay, here you go. (Hands her this tiny little globe.)ScenesPhoebe: What is this?ScenesMonica: Its a globe and, a pencil sharpener.Scenes(Phoebe puts the globe right up next to her eye to try and find the country.)ScenesChandler: (entering) Hey, does anybody need anything copied? Im going down to the Xerox place.ScenesMonica: Oh, no thanks.ScenesChandler: Okay listen, just give me anything I can make two of.ScenesMonica: Well, if you dont have anything to copy, why are you going down there?ScenesJoey: Yeah, are you just going down there to gawk at that hot girl with the belly button ring again?ScenesChandler: Yeah! You wanna come?ScenesJoey: Yeah!ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: The Xerox place, Chandler and Joey are waiting in line.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Come on Chloe! Finish up with your customer first. Come on Chloe! Come on Chloe!!ScenesIssac: (to Chandler and Joey) Can I help you?ScenesChandler: Uh-oh.ScenesJoey: Uh, y'know what, were having second thoughts about our copying needs. And well need a little more time to think about it.ScenesIssac: Chloe, switch with me, theres some guys here that got a crush on you.ScenesChandler: (to Joey) Okay, that hurt us.ScenesChloe: Hi guys. I havent seen you since this morning.ScenesChandler: Well ah, ........y'know.ScenesChloe: Hey, what are you guys doing tomorrow night?ScenesJoey: Both of us? (points to Chandler and himself)ScenesChloe: Maybe. Does that scare ya?Scenes(They both start laughing. They look at each other, stop and step apart a little bit.)ScenesChloe: Relax. Its just Issacs D.J.-ing at the Philly. You should come.ScenesJoey: Well be there.ScenesChloe: Great. Ill ah, see ya then.ScenesChandler: All right, rock on. (Does the Hang 10 sign, then hides his face in shame.)

rows.Scenes: A Street, Phoebe is walking along with the diplomat (Sergei) and his translator (Mischa).]
rows.Content: Sergei: (something in Russian or Polish)ScenesMischa: Hes says, Walking with you makes this strange city, feel like home.ScenesPhoebe: Me too. Although this city is my home, so. So thats dumb what I said, dont tell him I said that. Umm, you make something up. (Mischa does so and Sergei kisses her hand.) Nice, (to Mischa) thank you. This is me. Here.Scenes(Sergei goes up to her at her door and says something.)ScenesMischa: (leaning in) Your eyes are very pretty.ScenesPhoebe: (to Mischa) Thank you, very much! Oh! (to Sergei) Thank you!Scenes(Sergei says something and leans in to kiss her, but just as hes about to....)ScenesMischa: (leaning in) He would like to kiss you.ScenesPhoebe: (to Mischa) Okay, y'know what, you dont have to do that now. (Mischa translates that to Sergei) No-no-no-no!! Not him, you dont! (Mischa tells Sergei he can proceed and steps away) Well the moments over.Scenes(Sergei says something and kisses her.)ScenesPhoebe: Oh.ScenesMischa: Oy!

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe is showing Monica where Sergeis country is.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: (pointing to the globe) See there it is right there.ScenesMonica: Wow! Its small.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah. But Sergei said it took the Germans six weeks to get all the way across it.ScenesMonica: So you had fun, huh?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah. Except for, y'know when youre on a date and youre getting along really great but the guys translator keeps getting in the way.ScenesMonica: No.ScenesRoss: (entering) Hey.ScenesPhoebe and Monica: Hey.ScenesRoss: What is ah, Rach in her room?ScenesMonica: Oh no, shes still at work, but she told me to tell you to call her.ScenesRoss: Oh what?! Is she gonna cancel on me again?! How can she do this? Doesnt she know its our anniversary?ScenesMonica: All right ah, Ross, this is the extent of my knowledge on the subject. (holds up a notepad) Call Rachel.ScenesRoss: Whats that on the bottom?ScenesMonica: Oh thats my doodle of a ladybug, with a top hat. (to Phoebe) Shes fancy.Scenes(Ross calls Rachel)ScenesRachel: (answering her phone at work) Hello.ScenesRoss: Hey, honey.ScenesRachel: Oh, hi.ScenesRoss: Hey, whats going on?ScenesRachel: Well, there was a disaster in shipping and Ive got to get this order in. Honey, Im so sorry, but it looks like Im gonna be here all night.ScenesRoss: What, do you, well umm, oh how about I come up there?ScenesRachel: No-no-no, no, honey please, Ive got, Ive just have so much to deal with.Scenes[Cut to kitchen.]ScenesPhoebe: (to Monica) Anyway, Im going out with Sergei again tonight, and um, could you come and be the translators date? So that when we, its time for our alone time, you two could split off. Y'know, hes really, hes kinda cute.ScenesMonica: Yeah, well kinda cute, like really kinda cute, or kinda cute like your friend Spackel Back Larry?ScenesPhoebe: Hey, dont call him that! His name is Spackel Back Harry!

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Chandler and Joey are sitting on the big couch.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Hey, y'know what, maybe we should get going. I mean what time did Chloe say we should be there?ScenesJoey: Uh, 10:30.ScenesChandler: What time is it now?ScenesJoey: 4:30.ScenesChandler: Yeah all right, so well hang out.ScenesJoey: Yeah. Hey, remember when she brought up that thing about the three of us?ScenesChandler: Yes. Vividly.ScenesJoey: She was kidding about that right?ScenesChandler: Yeah, I-I-I think so. (Pauses and thinks about it for a second) Yeah, I-I think so...ScenesJoey: God, that would be weird it that situation presented itself tonight, huh?ScenesChandler: Yeah. Yeah, I mean what, what would we do?ScenesJoey: Dude, I dont know.ScenesChandler: She was kidding.ScenesJoey: Yeah.ScenesChandler: She was.... But y'know what, just in case, maybe we should come up with a set of ground rules.ScenesJoey: Yeah, for sure. Okay. Probably want the first thing to be, never open your eyes. Y'know, because you dont want to be doing something and then look up and see something you dont want to be seeing.ScenesChandler: Yeah. Good call, nice one. Hold it!! Hold it! What if me eyes are closed, and, and my hand is out there.... (holds his arm out and pretends to grab something with his hand.)ScenesJoey: Ah!! Okay! Eyes open at all times! Oh, hey, how do we decide where we... (clears throat) y'know each would, (clears throat again) y'know (pause) be?ScenesChandler: Right. Right. Well ah, y'know we could flip for it.ScenesJoey: Yeah, I guess, but whats like heads and whats tails?ScenesChandler: Well it you dont know that, then I dont want to do this with you.

rows.Scenes: Rachels office, Rachel and a co-worker (Sophie) are dealing with the crisis.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (on the phone) No, no, no, Im looking at a purchase order right here and it clearly states that we ordered the Rivera bikini in a variety of sizes and colours. And.... (listens) What does it matter, what Im wearing?! Can I please speak to your supervisor? (listens) Thank you. (to Sophie) Were holding.ScenesRoss: (entering, carrying a basket) Hi!ScenesRachel: (startled) Oh!! My God, what are you doing here?ScenesRoss: Well you said you couldnt go out so.... (pulls the cover off of the basket)ScenesSophie: You brought a picnic, oh, what a boyfriend. Thats it, on Monday I start wearing make-up.ScenesRachel: Ross honey, this is very nice, but, but I-I got a crisis.ScenesRoss: Yeah, but I got cous-cous!ScenesRachel: Honey, honey, Im sorry, I know its our anniversary but I told you on the phone I dont have time to stop.ScenesRoss: Okay, you dont have to stop, Im invisible, Im not here. (lights a candle)ScenesRachel: But I dont, hmm... (on phone) Oh, who approved that order?! (listens) Well there is no Mark Robbinson in this office. (to Sophie) Get me Mark on the phone!ScenesSophie: I love Mark. (to Ross) Do you know Mark?ScenesRoss: Yeah!!ScenesRachel: Well, let me just check that with what I got here, all right see 038 is not the number for (Ross starts making a lot of noise with a handheld pepper grinder) this store, 038 is Atlanta. And I...(stops and looks at Ross)ScenesRoss: (stopping grinding) Pepper?ScenesRachel: (angrily) None for me.ScenesRoss: Okay sorry, whew.ScenesRachel: Im sorry, as I was saying the store number is wrong, and Im sorry but thats... (notices a fire that Rosss candle has started) Oh my God!!ScenesRoss: (putting out the fire with a squeeze bottle of water) Okay, thats a fire. Oh yeah. Oh yeah.ScenesRachel: (on phone) Excuse me, Im sorry, Im gonna have to call you back, Ive got a Schemp in my office. (hangs up) (to Ross) What are you doing?ScenesRoss: Im sorry. But ah, hey, oh, somebodys off the phone, how bout a glass of wine by the fire, I could get it going again.ScenesRachel: Ross youre not listening to me, I dont have time to stop.ScenesRoss: Come on Rach, you dont have what, ten minutes?ScenesRachel: I dont have ten minutes!!ScenesRoss: What? (to Sophie) Sophie, does she have ten minutes?ScenesRachel: Hey, Ross!!! I told you I dont!ScenesRoss: Dont yell at me okay, this is the most Ive seen you all week.ScenesRachel: Look, I cannot do this right now, okay, Ive got a deadline, would you just go home, Ill talk to you later. (storms out)ScenesRoss: Yeah, but wait...ScenesRachel: Good bye!Scenes(Ross starts to pack up the picnic in anger, and throws a three hole punch in the basket.)ScenesSophie: Actually, thats our three hole punch.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Ross is eating the picnic as Rachel comes home from work.]
rows.Content: Ross: Hey.ScenesRachel: Hi. Look um, about what happened earlier...ScenesRoss: No, hey, well, I-I completely understand. You were, you were stressed.ScenesRachel: (throws her stuff down) I was gonna give you a chance to apologise to me.ScenesRoss: For what? For letting you throw me out of your office?ScenesRachel: You had no right coming down to my office Ross. You do not bring a picnic basket to somebodys work! Unless maybe they were a park ranger!ScenesRoss: Yeah, well excuse me for wanting to be with my girlfriend on our anniversary, boy what an ass am I.ScenesRachel: But I told you, I didnt have the time!ScenesRoss: Yeah, well you never have the time. I mean, I dont feel like I even have a girlfriend anymore, Rachel.ScenesRachel: Wh, Ross what do you want from me? You want me, you want me to quit my job so you can feel like you have a girlfriend?ScenesRoss: No, but itd be nice if you realised, its just a job!ScenesRachel: Just a job!ScenesRoss: Yes.ScenesRachel: Ross do you realise this is the first time in my life Im doing something I actually care about. This is the first time in my life Im doing something that Im actually good at. I mean. if you dont get that...ScenesRoss: No, hey, I get that, okay, I get that big time. And Im happy for ya, but Im tired of having a relationship with your answering machine! Okay, I dont know what to do anymore.ScenesRachel: Well neither do I!ScenesRoss: Is this about Mark?ScenesRachel: (shocked) Oh my God.ScenesRoss: Okay, its not, its not.ScenesRachel: Oh my God. I cannot keep having this same fight over and over again, Ross, no, youre, youre, youre making this too hard.ScenesRoss: Oh Im, Im making this too hard. Okay, what do you want me to do.ScenesRachel: I dont know, I dont know. Urrrgh! Look, maybe we should take a break.ScenesRoss: Okay, okay, fine, youre right. Lets ah, lets take a break, (goes to the door) lets cool off, okay, lets get some frozen yogart, or something.. (opens the door)ScenesRachel: No. (Ross is standing in the doorway.) A break from us.Scenes(Ross looks at her, then leaves slamming the door behind him.)ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: The Philly, Chandler and Joey are talking to Chloe.]
rows.Content: Chloe: And the advances in collating in the past five years, I mean we just got in an X-5000, y'know. The X-5000 makes the X-50 look like a T-71.Scenes(Chandler agrees in an absolutely bored way.)ScenesChloe: (seeing Ross enter) Hey, its the dinosaur guy. (runs over to Ross) Hi, Ross.ScenesRoss: Oh, hi Chloe.ScenesChloe: I want you to met some friends of mine. (Introduces him to Chandler and Joey) This guy is my hero, he comes in with some stuff he wants it blown up 400%, we said we dont do that, and he says you gotta. And y'know what, we did it. And now anytime anybody wants 400, we just say lets Ross it!ScenesChandler: And thats the only colour that comes in.ScenesIssac: Yo, Chloe, do you have a quarter for the condom machine?ScenesChloe: Oh! (storms off)ScenesChandler: So, what are you doing here? I thought tonight was your big anniversary dinner.ScenesRoss: Yeah, little change in plans. Ahh, were gonna break-up instead.Scenes(Chandler and Joey stare at each other in shock.)

rows.Scenes: A Restaurant, Monica and Phoebe are on their dates with Sergei and Mischa.]
rows.Content: Monica: Oh, and I can also speak a little French. Voulez-vous coucher avec moi ce soir? (Mischa laughs) Why? What did I say?ScenesMischa: Well, you just asked if I wanted to go to bed with you tonight.ScenesMonica: Oh my God! No wonder I get such great service at Cafe Maurice.ScenesPhoebe: (laughing and banging her spoon on the table) Knock, knock, knock, knock, hi. Um, could you please tell Sergei that um, I was fascinated by what Boutros Boutros Gali said in the New York Times.Scenes(Mischa does so.)ScenesPhoebe: You didnt say Boutros Boutros Gali.ScenesMischa: (to Sergei) Boutros Boutros Gali.Scenes(Sergei responds.)ScenesMischa: He says he was too.ScenesPhoebe: Interesting.ScenesMischa: (to Monica) So I was wondering....ScenesPhoebe: Okay, ah, before you get all talky again, umm, could you also please tell Sergei that I really like his suit.Scenes(Mischa does so, and Sergei complements Phoebe, and says it slowly)ScenesMischa: (to Phoebe, very quickly) Eh, he said, thank you very much, he thinks you look very pretty tonight, your hair, golden like the sun. (to Monica) So you're a chef?ScenesMonica: Im also thinking about opening up my own restaurant.ScenesMischa: Oh, really.ScenesPhoebe: Monica, can I talk to you behind my menu, please. (Behind the menu) What are you doing?ScenesMonica: Well, I was having a conversation.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah but, Mischa is so interested in you, that Sergei and I havent been able to say two words to each other.ScenesMonica: What do you want me to do? Just sit here silently while you three have a conversation?ScenesPhoebe: That would be great. Thank you.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Rachel is lying in front of the bay window, and the phone rings.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (jumping up to answer the phone) Hello!ScenesMark: Oh, hi. Its Mark.ScenesRachel: (disappointed) Oh.ScenesMark: What? Is it my breath?ScenesRachel: No! Sorry, I just thought you were somebody else. Hi!ScenesMark: Hi. Well, look, I was just gonna leave a message, isnt tonight your, your big anniversary dinner?ScenesRachel: Yeah. Well, umm.....ScenesMark: Rach, are you okay?ScenesRachel: (on the verge of tears) Yeah, Im fine.ScenesMark: You wanna talk, I mean I can come over?ScenesRachel: No! Really, no, please, please, thats, thats okay.ScenesMark: All right, all right, Im coming over, and Im bringing Chinese food.ScenesRachel: Oh, yeah, Im not, Im not hungry.ScenesMark: Its for me.ScenesRachel: Oh. Okay, bye.

rows.Scenes: The Philly.]
rows.Content: Joey: So what are you gonna do?ScenesRoss: What can I do? One person wants to break-up, you break-up.ScenesChandler: Hey, no way! Come on, this is you guys, call her and work it out.ScenesRoss: Oh come on, we just had this huge fight, all right, dont I have to wait a while?ScenesChandler: Hey, this isnt like swimming after you eat, pick up the phone!!Scenes(Ross goes to call her.)ScenesChandler: Y'know that whole swimming thing is a myth.ScenesJoey: Yeah, tell that to my Uncle Lenny.ScenesChandler: Why? What happened to him?ScenesJoey: Nothing, hes just really believes in that.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Mark is there, opening Chinese food boxes.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Oh, and then, we got into this big, stupid fight. I just, it was awful. I told him he treats me like a park ranger, or something, oh and then I told him I wanted to take a break, I dont want to take a break.ScenesMark: Wow. Im sorry. Eggroll?ScenesRachel: No. (grabs an eggroll) And then I called him, and he wasnt there.ScenesMark: Well, then hes, hes probably just, out.ScenesRachel: Oh, thank you thats very helpful, Im glad you came over.Scenes(The phone rings and Rachel answers it.)ScenesRachel: Hello.ScenesRoss: Hi! Its me.ScenesRachel: Hi! Oh, Im so glad you called.ScenesRoss: Really? Ive been thinking, this is crazy, I mean dont, dont you think we can work on this?ScenesMark: Hey, what do you want to drink?ScenesRoss: Whos that?ScenesRachel: Nobody.ScenesMark: Is it okay if I finish the apple juice?Scenes(Rachel mouths Shoot! or something similar.)ScenesRoss: Is that Mark?ScenesRachel: Umm, honey, look he just came over to....Scenes[Cut to The Philly.]ScenesRoss: Yeah! Got it! (slams the phone down, and walks back to the bar.)ScenesChloe: Hey, dinosaur guy, look at you, so sad. Come dance.ScenesRoss: Ah, thats okay, thanks.ScenesChloe: Hey, you dont have to smile. You just have to dance.ScenesRoss: Look, I dont feel like dancing, I feel like having a drink. Okay?ScenesChloe: Oh, okay. (to the bartender) Hey, two beers. (sits down next to him)

rows.Scenes: The Restaurant, after dinner.]
rows.Content: Mischa: (to Monica) And the vet said it was time. And so from half a world away, while my Mother held the phone to his ear, I said good bye to my dog,. In seven languages.ScenesMonica: Oh. (to Phoebe) Can I have a tissue?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, yeah, sure. I just hope you, hope you dont accidentally suck it up through your nose and choke on it.Scenes(Sergei says something to Mischa.)ScenesMischa: (to Phoebe) Sergei, would like to apologise for my behaviour tonight.ScenesPhoebe: Well, tell him, apology accepted.Scenes(Mischa does so.)ScenesMischa: (to Monica) Oh, hes unbelievable. I mean for the first time in three years somebody wants to actually want to talk to me, but do you think he would let me enjoy that, no!! (to Sergei) You silly diplomat, why dont you learn some English, Sergei?ScenesPhoebe: Excuse me, but umm, isnt he paying for your dinner?ScenesMonica: Hey, the mans dog just died.Scenes(Sergei insults Mischa, and they get into a huge fight, in Russian.)ScenesMischa: (to Monica) I have just resigned my post. Would you care to accompany me to the Rainbow Room? I have diplomatic coupons.ScenesMonica: It will be my pleasure. (to Phoebe) My guy has diplomatic coupons. Your guy cant even say coupons. (they leave)ScenesSergei: Uh, (picks up a plate) plate?ScenesPhoebe: Plate! Yes, plate.ScenesSergei: Plate. Plate. Plate.ScenesPhoebe: See, we dont need them.ScenesSergei: (picking up a cup) Plate?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah.

rows.Scenes: The Philly, With or Without You is playing. (Which is the same song Ross played for Rachel in TOW the List.)]
rows.Content: Ross: (to Chloe) I like this song.ScenesChloe: Well, youre practically dancing already. Why dont you just do it over here?ScenesRoss: Oh, no, no.ScenesChloe: What? Are you married? Cause thats okay.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Rachel is next to the bay window again, Mark has left.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (picks up the phone and calls Ross) Oh, be home, be home, be home, be home, be home, be home. Be home. Be home, be home, be home. Oh, youre not home.

rows.Scenes: The Philly, Ross is dancing with Chloe.]
rows.Content: Chloe: Still no smile?Scenes(She kisses him. Ross leans back for a second, and then they both kiss, more passionately this time as U2's With or Without You plays in the background.)ScenesTo Be Continued......ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Sergei is teaching Phoebe how to sing American Pie, by Don Maclean.]
rows.Content: (Both Phoebe and him are singing along and they get to the chorus.)ScenesSergei: (singing) Touchet, touchet, Miss Americccan pie. (stops to correct Phoebe) Ameri-ccan.ScenesPhoebe: Ameri-can.ScenesSergei: Ameri-ccan.ScenesPhoebe: Ameri-can. Y'know its a very hard language. Lets do it again.Scenes(They start singing, and Phoebe covers her mouth at the American part.)ScenesSergei: (to the rest of Central Perk) Everybody!! (In his language, and continues.)ScenesEndScenesThe One The Morning AfterScenesWritten by: Marta Kauffman & David CraneScenesTranscribed by: Eric AasenScenesJoey: (Voice Over) Previously on Friends.Scenes[A montage of scenes from The One Where Ross and Rachel Take A Break follows.]

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Ross is eating the picnic as Rachel comes home from work.]
rows.Content: Ross: I mean, I dont feel like I even have a girlfriend anymore.ScenesRachel: You want me to just quit my job so that you can feel like youve got a girlfriend?ScenesRoss: Is this about Mark?ScenesRachel: (shocked) Oh my God.ScenesRoss: Okay, its not, its not.ScenesRachel: Oh my God. I cannot keep having this same fight with you Ross! Look, urrgh, maybe we should take a break.ScenesRoss: Fine, youre right. Lets ah, lets take a break, (goes to the door) lets cool off, okay, lets get some frozen yoghurt, or something.. (opens the door)ScenesRachel: No. A break from us.Scenes(Ross looks at her, then leaves slamming the door behind him.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Mark is there, opening Chinese food boxes.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Then, we had this big, stupid fight, and I said I wanted to take a break, I dont want to take a break.ScenesRoss: (on the phone) Ive been thinking, this is crazy, I mean dont, dont you think we can work on this?ScenesMark: Hey, what do you want to drink?ScenesRoss: Whos that?ScenesRachel: Nobody.ScenesRoss: Is that Mark?ScenesRachel: Umm, honey, look he just came over to....ScenesRoss: Yeah! Got it! (slams down the phone)

rows.Scenes: The Philly.]
rows.Content: Chloe: Hey, come dance. What? Are you married? Cause thats okay.Scenes[Cut to Chloe and Ross dancing, and their kiss.]ScenesThe Next Morning

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Monica is making a fruit drink in the blender, Rachel has just finished her shower and is coming out of the bathroom.]
rows.Content: Monica: Hey.ScenesRachel: Hey.ScenesMonica: Hows the big anniversary dinner?ScenesRachel: Well, we never actually got to dinner.ScenesMonica: Ohhh, nice.ScenesRachel: No, we kinda broke up instead.ScenesMonica: What?! (She accidentally starts the blender without the lid on it and fruit flies everywhere.)ScenesRachel: (looking up at the ceiling) God, Monica its on the ceiling.ScenesMonica: Thats okay, this is more important than fruit (pause) (angrily) on my ceiling! You broke up?!ScenesRachel: Yeah, but its okay, because when Ross left Mark came over.ScenesMonica: Oh no!!ScenesRachel: No.ScenesMonica: Rachel, you and Mark?!ScenesRachel: No, no-no, its okay, calm down. Mark and I talked, and I realised how much I love your stupid brother, and, yeah, we got our problems, but I really want to make it work.

rows.Scenes: Rosss Bedroom, Ross is waking up. He straightens himself out on the bed and puts the covers over his head.]
rows.Content: Chloe: (entering from bathroom) Morning!Scenes(Ross sits bolt upright, without moving the covers.)ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Rosss Kitchen, Ross is taking some aspirin and checking his messages.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (on answering machine) Hi, its me. Ive been trying to reach you all night. I feel awful. Please, Ross, you gotta know there is nothing between me and Mark. This whole break-up thing is just stupid.ScenesRoss: Yeah!!ScenesRachel: Eh, Im just so sorry I put you through it. And, I y'know, I dont want to get back together over a machine.ScenesRoss: Na-huh.ScenesRachel: So, I love you.ScenesRoss: I love you.ScenesRachel: And y'know what, Im gonna, Im gonna go to bed now, but ah, on my way to work tomorrow morning, Im gonna stop by around 8:30.ScenesRoss: Okay. (Ross starts frantically looking for a clock.)ScenesRachel: Bye.Scenes(Ross finds a clock, sees its almost 8:30, and silently screams.)ScenesRoss: Chloe, Chloe hows it coming?!!ScenesChloe: (entering from bedroom) Hey, what kind of puppy do you think I should get?ScenesRoss: Umm, oh, hey, I dont know. How about a big one?ScenesChloe: But my apartment is so...ScenesRoss: Well then a small one!! Listen, lets, we kinda have to get going!ScenesChloe: Wait! Wheres my shoes?ScenesRoss: You, you sure you need shoes? (Chloe nods her head) Okay. (reaches down and picks up a shoe)ScenesChloe: Do I know why were rushing?ScenesRoss: Yeah, y'know the ah, the girlfriend I told you about last night?
