Vic!!!ScenesJoey: (to Lauren) In a minute!!Scenes[cut to the end of the play]ScenesLauren: So this is it? Victor?ScenesJoey: Yeah, I guess it is. (sees Kate is watching, he turns Lauren so that he can talk directly to Kate, but still look like he is talking to Lauren) Listen, I ah, I gotta say good bye, and-and I gotta say it quick cause this is killing me. One thing you gotta know, is that I will never forget you. But, youve got things you have to do now, and so do I. And so Im gonna get on this spaceship, (smoke starts pouring in from the ceiling, and a ladder comes down, with flashing, colored lights on the side of it) and Im gonna go to Blargon 7 in search of alternative fuels. But when I return, 200 years from now, youll be long gone. But I wont have aged at all. (gets on the ladder) So you tell your great-great-granddaughter to look me up, because Adrienne, baby, Im gonna want to meet her.Scenes(The ladder retracts, taking Joey up into the spaceship for his voyage to Blargon 7, and Kate waves good bye.)ScenesLauren: So long, Vic! (waving good bye as the ladder retracts)ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, the gang, except Joey, is there. Phoebe is, well you y'know.]
rows.Content: Monica: Phoebe, its been two days.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, I know. Oh, good thing its one of those 801 numbers. Right?ScenesRoss: Phoebe, 800 is toll free, 801 is-is Utah.ScenesPhoebe: No, no, no, oh no-no-no, its has to be 800. (picks up the instruction manual to check the phone number) Cause all those big companies have 800 numbers, every one. (Finds the number) Yeah, every big Utah-based company has one.ScenesRachel: Phoe-be!!ScenesPhoebe: Sorry, Im so sorry, I will pay you back.ScenesChandler: And yet, shes still not hanging up the phone.ScenesAll: Hang it up! Hang up the phone!!ScenesPhoebe: Fine! Fine! (slams the phone down, breaking it) Oh-oh!ScenesMonica: What?ScenesPhoebe: Well, I think I broke it. But thats all right, heres the number you can call.ScenesMonica: (sarcastic) Oh.ScenesEndScenesThe One With The Ultimate Fighting ChampionScenesStory by: Mark J. Kunerth & Pang-ni LandrumScenesTeleplay by: Scott Silveri & Shana Goldberg-MeehanScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, the whole gang minus Monica is there.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Do you think that theres a town in Missouri or some place called Sample? And ah, as youre driving into town theres-theres like a sign, and it says Youre in Sample. (He says it like urine sample.)ScenesMonica: (entering) Hey.ScenesAll: Hey!ScenesRachel: Howd it go with Pete?!ScenesJoey: Tell us!ScenesMonica: Youre not gonna believe this. Okay, so I go over...Scenes[Two guys walk over and interrupt her. Theyre both names youve already heard. Ones Billy Crystal. Yes, that Billy Crystal from City Slickers. The other one is Robin Williams. Yes, that Robin Williams from Mrs. Doubtfire.]ScenesBilly Crystal: Im sorry. Ex-excuse us. Im sorry, its a little crowded. Do you mind if we... (motions to the couch)ScenesRobin Williams: Yeah, could you scooch?ScenesBilly: Yeah, move over just a little bit.Scenes(Rachel, Chandler, Phoebe, and Joey all scooch over to let them sit down.)ScenesRobin: Keep on scooching.Scenes[cut to Monica telling the gang about what happened at Petes]ScenesMonica: So guys, listen, I go over there, and umm...Scenes(Robin interrupts her again by complaining loudly to Billy as the camera cuts to them.)ScenesRobin: Why? Why?! Whats wrong with me?!ScenesBilly: Whats the matter?ScenesRobin: I have a feelin... I, my wife is sleeping with her gynaecologist.Scenes(The gang is now eaves dropping in on the conversation, and is shocked.)ScenesBilly: How do you know?ScenesRobin: Well y'know, hes got access.ScenesBilly: Yeah.ScenesRobin: Y'know its that feeling you get, y'know?ScenesBilly: Like when you go bowling and you know youre in somebody elses shoes?ScenesRobin: Thats the one.Scenes[cut back to the gang.]ScenesPhoebe: All right, so, so you went to Petes...ScenesRoss: What happened?ScenesMonica: (Robin is speaking loudly again) I...Scenes[cut to Billy and Robin]ScenesRobin: Why is this happening to me?! I dont know, maybe its my wound.Scenes[cut to the gang]ScenesMonica: Forget it. (they all turn and listen to Billy and Robin)ScenesBilly: So its-its not heeled yet?ScenesRobin: No-no, its ooozing, oozing. (to Rachel) Could you pass me the cream? Is there anyOh, theres the cream.ScenesBilly: Thomas, this is gonna be hard, but I wanted it to come from me, and nobody else.ScenesRobin: What is it, Tim?ScenesBilly: Its me, Ive been sleeping with your wife.ScenesJoey: (to Billy) So youre the gynaecologist?ScenesBilly: (to Joey) Hey, Im trying to have a private conversation! Is that okay?!ScenesRobin: (starting to cry) Ooh, (to Rachel) Can I have a napkin, please? Could you please hand me a napkin? (Rachel tries to grab one, but is to slow for his tastes.) Would you--Give me this thing (grabs the napkin holder from her.) all right!! Enough! (to Billy) And you are no longer my friend! We are finished! (gets up to leave) Nada!! No more! You are a bastard for doing this!! (Billy follows him) Get away from me!!ScenesBilly: Thomas, come back here! (they both leave)Scenes[cut to the gang, theyre all stunned]ScenesPhoebe: So Monica, what were you gonna tell us?ScenesMonica: (pause) I have no idea.ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, continued from earlier.]
rows.Content: Rachel: So, come on, what was the big news Pete wanted to tell you Mon?! Or should I say Mrs. Monica Becker?ScenesPhoebe: No-no-no oh, keep your name, dont take his name.ScenesMonica: He didnt ask me to marry him.ScenesAll: Ohh.ScenesPhoebe: Well then definately dont take his name.ScenesMonica: He wanted to tell me hes gonna compete is some ultimate fighting competition thingy.ScenesThe Guys: Pete?!ScenesRachel: Why?! What is it?ScenesMonica: I dont know exactly. Its-its sorta like wrestling.ScenesPhoebe: (intrigued) Oh?!ScenesMonica: Yeah, but without the costumes.ScenesPhoebe: (disappointed) Oh.ScenesJoey: And its not fake, its totally brutal.ScenesChandler: Yeah, its two guys in a ring, and the rules are: Theyre are no rules.ScenesMonica: So you can like, bite, and pull peoples hair and stuff?ScenesRoss: Yeah, anything goes, except ah, eye gouging and fish hooking.ScenesMonica: Whats fish hooking?ScenesRoss: Huh, whats fish hooking... (Joey sticks his finger in Rosss mouth and pulls on his cheek, y'know like when you hook a fish.) (to Joey, sarcastic) Thanks man, that would have been really hard to describe. What is that taste?ScenesJoey: What? My hands are totally clean, I just gave the duck a bath.

rows.Scenes: Chandlers office, he is just finishing a meeting with his boss.]
rows.Content: Doug: So thanks for the warm welcome. Its good to have you guys on my team, and I come to play. I hope you do too. Now, lets go out there and get em! Huh? And remember, there is no I in team.ScenesChandler: Yes, but theres two in martini, soo everybody back to my office.ScenesDoug: (to Chandler) You! Chuckles! Whats your name?ScenesChandler: Oh its Bing, sir. Im sorry , I was just ah...ScenesDoug: No-no, I heard what you said, funny. I like funny. (Chandler starts to leave) This team is about hard work, but its also about having fun. Good to have you aboard Bing! (smacks him on the butt, and Chandler leaves shocked.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, Ross is making reservations.]
rows.Content: Ross: (on phone) Thats right, Ryder. Wynona Ryder for six. (listens) Thank you. (hangs up) (to the gang) Yeah, we have the reservations.ScenesRachel: Yes!!ScenesChandler: All right buddy, way to go! (smacks him on the butt)ScenesRoss: (stunned) Dude, what are you doing?ScenesChandler: Thank you! Today, my boss keep slapping my butt and he was acting like it was no big deal.ScenesPhoebe: Yeesh, whatd you do about it?ScenesChandler: Well, I didnt do anything. I didnt want to be the guy who has a problem with his boss slapping his bottom.ScenesMonica: I gotta tell ya, I think its okay to be that guy.ScenesJoey: Yeah, maybe its like y'know, that jock thing. Y'know how football players pat each other after touchdowns. (pats Ross on the butt)Scenes(Ross throws his hands out in a What are you doing? gesture)ScenesRachel: Y'know I dont, I dont understand guys, I mean I-I would never congratulate Monica on a great stew by y'know, grabbin her boob.ScenesChandler: Yeah, I know, for a really great stew you just y'know, stick your head in between em.ScenesMonica: Okay, can we please go eat?ScenesJoey: Yeah. What are we getting?ScenesMonica: (to Chandler) Anything but stew.ScenesRoss: All right so, Chandler, from now on, dont give your boss a chance to get you. Y'know just ah, dont turn your back to him.ScenesJoey: Yeah, or you can teach him a lesson. Y'know? What you could do is you could rub something that really smells on your butt, all right? Then, when he goes to smack ya, his hand will smell. (thinking aloud) Now what could you rub on your butt that would smell bad?ScenesChandler: (to Ross and Monica) What if Joey were president?Scenes(Monica, Ross, Chandler, and Joey exit.)ScenesPhoebe: Umm, hey Rach, can I ask you something?ScenesRachel: Yeah.ScenesPhoebe: Okay, you can totally say no, but umm, would it be okay with you if I set Ross up on a date?ScenesRachel: Oh, ah with who?ScenesPhoebe: Umm, my friend, Bonnie. She just always thought Ross was really cute, and now that you two arent together, she asked if I could set it up, but if youre not cool with it...ScenesRachel: Oh-oh-oh, which one is Bonnie again?ScenesPhoebe: You remember her from my birthday party two years ago. Shes yeah, like, average height, medium build, bald...ScenesRachel: Oh! (laughs) Thats fine.ScenesPhoebe: Great! Okay, good for you! (as they leave she slaps Rachel on the butt)

rows.Scenes: A Gym, Pete is training for the Ultimate Fighting Championship, with his trainer, Hoshi.]
rows.Content: Hoshi: You are iron. You are steel! Let me ask you something, how come when I call your computer support line, I have to wait an hour and a half?ScenesPete: I told you, were adding new operators all the time. Could we concentrate on my training?ScenesHoshi: Its just hard when I know I have e-mail I cant get!ScenesMonica: (entering) Hi!ScenesPete: Monica! (runs over and kisses her) Hi honey.ScenesHoshi: All right, on the table. (Pete gets on the table for his rubdown)ScenesMonica: Hey, umm, so listen umm, my friends were telling me a little about this ah, ultimate fighting thing and it, well it sounds really dangerous. I-I dont want you to get hurt, cause I kinda like you.ScenesPete: Oh, believe me, I dont want to get hurt either. Im being smart about this. See these guys? Theyre the best trainers in the world, and Hoshi here used to be a paid assassin. (Hoshi yells at him in Chinese) A house painter! He used to be a house painter.ScenesMonica: Promise me youll be careful.ScenesPete: I promise.ScenesMonica: Hey, are we still on for tonight?ScenesPete: Yeah.ScenesMonica: Okay, good, cause umm, well maybe we could have a little workout of our own...ScenesHoshi: No! No boom-boom before big fight!ScenesMonica: How bout just a boom?

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Phoebe is there with Bonnie, as Rachel enters.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (to Phoebe) Well that was depressing, I think I just bought a soft pretzel from one of the kids from Fame. Ready to go to the movies?ScenesPhoebe: Um-hmm. Oh wait! This is Bonnie. (who has hair by the way)ScenesBonnie: Hi!ScenesRachel: This is Bonnie? (to Phoebe) This is Bonnie? (to Bonnie) Youre Bonnie?ScenesBonnie: I can show you an ID if you want?ScenesRachel: Oh no, Im sorry, you look a lot different from the last time I-I saw you.ScenesBonnie: Oh yeah, well I just started wearing bras again.ScenesRachel: Oh, that must be it.ScenesPhoebe: (to Bonnie) Well I hope you have fun tonight.ScenesBonnie: Thanks! You too.Scenes(Phoebe starts to leave, Rachel slowly follows, shocked about how good Bonnie looks now.)Scenes[cut to outside of Central Perk]ScenesRachel: (to Phoebe) You said she was bald.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, she was bald, shes not now.ScenesRachel: How could you not tell me that she has hair?ScenesPhoebe: I dont know, I hardly ever say that about people.ScenesRachel: (looks in the window) Ohh, well, this is just perfect!ScenesPhoebe: Well Im sorry, I thought you said it was okay.ScenesRachel: Yeah, I said what was okay when I thought she was some weird bald chick. I mean, y'know, that girl has hair got all over head!ScenesPhoebe: Well, maybe it wont work out. Maybe Ross wont like her personality.ScenesRachel: Why, does she have a bad personality?ScenesPhoebe: Oh no, Bonnies the best!

rows.Scenes: Chandlers office, Chandler is bent over getting some water as his boss approaches.]
rows.Content: Doug: Bing! (Chandler stands bolt upright and turns around to face him.) Read your Computech proposal, a real homerun. (He goes to slap his butt, but Chandler slides over making him miss.) Ooh. Barely got ya that time, get over here. Come on. (Chandler goes over) Wham! (slaps him on the butt) Good one. That was a good one. (to a couple of Chandlers co-workers) Keep at it team. (goes into his office)ScenesChandler: (to his co-workers) What is with him?ScenesPhil: With him? Youre is favourite, youre his guy!ScenesStevens: We never get smacked.ScenesChandler: Well, thats not true, he-he smacked you once.ScenesPhil: Not on purpose, he ricocheted of you and got me.ScenesStevens: Im telling you, I need some smacks. I got a kid starting Dartmouth in the fall.ScenesDoug: (coming out of his office) Dartmouth? Who went to Dartmouth? Dartmouth sucks. Did you go to Dartmouth Bing?ScenesChandler: No sir.ScenesDoug: There you go. (smacks him on the butt)

rows.Scenes: The Ultimate Fighting Championship, Ross and Monica are there watching Pete.]
rows.Content: Ross: (walking up with this huge tub-o-popcorn and drink) Hey!ScenesMonica: God Ross, what is that?ScenesRoss: Yeah, its the Ultimate Fighting Combo. Yeah, I saved thirty cents, plus I get to keep the cup. Yay!!ScenesAnnouncer: From New York City, New York! Appearing in his Ultimate Fighting Championship debut! Hes known for his confrontational business style. Ladies and Gentlemen, introducing Pete Beck-errrr!!Scenes[Pete enters with his entourage all pumped up, and Ross and Monica are the only ones who stand up and cheer.]ScenesMonica: I love you, Pete!!!ScenesAnnouncer: And his opponent, from Hunnington Beach, California! Hes a 300 pound street fighter, Tank Abbottttttt!!!!Scenes(The crowd goes wild, and Ross is the only one boo-ing him.)ScenesMonica: (going up to the ring) Pete! Pete!! That guys pretty huge!ScenesPete: Dont worry, Hoshi taught me how to use an opponents strength and weight against him.ScenesRoss: Well, then that guy is in serious, serious trouble.Scenes(Pete and Monica kiss, and Monica mouths I love you. to him.)ScenesRoss: All right! You go get him! Lets go!ScenesReferee: Here we go gentlemen, here we go! (to Tank Abbott) Are you ready? (He nods, and takes out his teeth) (to Pete) Are you ready? (Pete nods, Yes.) Lets get it on!!Scenes(They both rush each other. Tank picks Pete up and carries him over and slams him into the fence surrounding the ring.)ScenesPete: Uh-oh.Scenes(Tank carries Pete over to the other side of the ring, and we see both Ross and Monica wince in pain.)ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: The Arena, after the fight. Monica is walking up to a defeated Pete.]
rows.Content: Monica: Hey! (she sits down next to him) Its me. Mon-i-ca! Can I just tell you how proud I am of you.ScenesPete: It would be nice after hearing 20,000 people chant You suck!ScenesMonica: I mean I-I thought you were nuts at first, but you-you did it. And now you can just look back at this thing with no regrets.ScenesPete: What, look back?ScenesMonica: Well, youre not gonna get going are you?ScenesPete: Well let me ask you a question. Am I the Ultimate Fighting Champion?ScenesMonica: Well, no. But...ScenesPete: Well Im not gonna stop until Im the Ultimate Fighting Champion.ScenesMonica: That guy stood on your neck until you passed out!ScenesPete: Let me tell you a story. When I set out to create Moss 865, do you think it just happened overnight? No. There was Moss 1, that burnt down my Dads garage, there was Moss 2 that would only schedule appointments in January, and 862 others that I learned from, just like I learned from this fight, never to let a guy stand on my neck.ScenesMonica: You didnt know that already?ScenesPete: Look, Im gonna get better. Okay? I promise you.ScenesMonica: Okay, just get a lot better. (pause) Fast.ScenesPete: Oh, one other thing. Hoshi thinks that you being ringside may have affected my concentration.ScenesMonica: Yeah. That-that was the problem.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's balcony, Ross and Phoebe are grilling some burgers and hot dogs.]
rows.Content: Monica: (joining them) Hey.ScenesRoss: Hey! How long until Petes fight?ScenesMonica: Oh, about five minutes. Right now theyre interviewing his opponent. Apparently he trains by going to Iran and pulling the arms off thieves.ScenesRoss: Hot dog?ScenesMonica: Four, please. (Ross looks at her) Im really nervous. (Ross gives her the four dogs) Thank you. (she grabs four buns, and heads back inside)ScenesPhoebe: So Ross, how umm, how did it go with Bonnie?ScenesRoss: What? Oh! I gotta tell you, I-I wasnt expecting to like her at all, I mean I actually wasnt expecting to like anyone right now, but shes really terrific.ScenesPhoebe: Ohh, thats too bad!ScenesRoss: No, I-Im saying I liked her.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, y'know what, there are other fish in the sea.ScenesRoss: Pheebs, I think shes great. Okay? Were going out again.ScenesPhoebe: Okay, I hear you! Are you capable of talking about any thing else?ScenesChandler: (joining them) Hey! Which ones my turkey burger?ScenesRoss: Ahh, the one next to my foot. Sorry.ScenesJoey: (sticking his head out the window) Hey, the fights starting!ScenesRoss: Okay, well be right in. (to Chandler) So ah, did your boss try to slap you again today?ScenesChandler: Nine times! Okay, I had to put on lotion! But, its gonna be okay, because as of tomorrow Im conducting an experiment, and if all goes as planned, my butt will be smack free.ScenesJoey: (sticking his head out the window) Fights over!Scenes(Chandler, Ross, and Phoebe all stop dead in their tracks at the news.)

rows.Scenes: Chandlers office, Chandler is confronting his boss about the butt smacking thing. His boss is writing on a white board.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Excuse me, Doug? (no reaction) Hey there sports fan!!ScenesDoug: (turning around) Bing! You got those numbers for me?ScenesChandler: No, I ah, I didnt do them.ScenesDoug: Oh, you forgot?ScenesChandler: No, no I just ah, didnt do them. Instead, I ah, hung out with a couple of friends and had a couple of beers so I certainly dont deserve any praise, verbal or otherwise.ScenesDoug: Well, I got tanked myself last night. Pretty dicey drive home, Tapanzi Bridge never looked smaller. (laughs) Thats okay, youre still my number one guy! (slaps him on the butt) Bing!ScenesChandler: Doug!!ScenesDoug: Hmm.ScenesChandler: Im a little bit uncomfortable with the that way you express yourself.ScenesDoug: Oh, is it the swearing? I mean is it the constant swearing? Because I gotta tell ya, if it is, you can just... kiss my ass!ScenesChandler: No, no. It-its not about the swearing, its more about ah, the way, that you ah, occasionally, concentrate, your enthusiasm on my buttock.ScenesDoug: Oh?ScenesChandler: Oh, and dont get me wrong, I appreciate the sentiment. Its just that I, I have a rather, sensitive posterior, and ah, besides, its making all the other guys jealous.ScenesDoug: Well, say no more. Y'know it takes guts to bring this up. Bing! Youre okay.ScenesChandler: Okay. (he starts to leave)ScenesDoug: Ha! (goes to smack him on the butt, but stops, faking Chandler out) Ahhhhhhh!ScenesChandler: Ahhhhh! (walks out, imitating shooting himself in the head)

rows.Scenes: The street outside Central Perk, Rachel and Phoebe are talking and walking.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Okay. Would you rather live in the shirt pocket of a sweaty giant, or inside his shower drain?ScenesRachel: (seeing Ross and Bonnie inside Central Perk) Oh my God! Phoebe look, its Ross and that girl.Scenes(We see Ross and Bonnie laughing and having a good time.)ScenesPhoebe: No! No! Look at that! (drags her away from the window) Its a line of ants! Theyre working as a team!ScenesRachel: Phoebe! (goes back to the window)ScenesPhoebe: (looking in the window) Right, oh yeah. Wow, oh, it looks like Ross is breaking up with her. Uff, I hope he lets her down easy. Lets go.ScenesRachel: Come on Phoebe, look at that! They are not breaking up, look at them. Okay thats, you know what that is? That is a, that is a second date, thats what that is! Look at that, she just put her hand on his thigh...ScenesPhoebe: Oh no! That really is nothing, she is very sexually aggressive.ScenesRachel: Ohh! (walking away from the window) Phoebe, this is all your fault! Now he loves her, hes gonna marry her, and this is all your fault.ScenesPhoebe: You said it was okay!ScenesRachel: You said she was bald!!ScenesPhoebe: What?! What-what-what-what-what?!!ScenesRachel: Phoebe, we cant, we just cant just let it happen! Okay, we have to do something! We have to break them up! Okay? Just go in there and like, shave her head! You owe me one bald girl!!ScenesPhoebe: Okay, first of all, breathe. Second of all, I dont get it. Arent you the one that decided that you didnt want to be with Ross?ScenesRachel: (quietly) Yes.ScenesPhoebe: Well isnt he your friend? Dont you want him to be happy?ScenesRachel: Yes.ScenesPhoebe: So?ScenesRachel: I just y'know, I didnt expect him to be this happy so soon. Ufff. Ooo-ooh! (sits down on the curb)ScenesPhoebe: (sits down next to her and hugs her) Oh no.ScenesRachel: What?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, we killed them all.ScenesRachel: Oh!Scenes(They both jump up and wipe off their butts.)

rows.Scenes: A locker room, Pete is in a full upper-body cast. Monica enters, sees him, and gasps. Pete tries to turn around, and winces in pain.]
rows.Content: Pete: Its okay, its not as bad as it looks, its a precaution. Ah, Im not supposed to move my spine.ScenesMonica: Please tell me youre stopping now.ScenesPete: Im fine! Id fight tonight, if theyd let me. (stands up and starts swinging his arms) See this circle Im marking off here? This is my zone of terror.ScenesMonica: You are insane! You-you gotta give this up!ScenesPete: I cant until Im the ultimate fighter. I will do it. Im telling you, the day will come when children will argue over who will win a fight, me or Superman. Now, Im not saying I could beat Superman, but y'know, kids are stupid.ScenesMonica: Sit down. All right? Please, just listen to me. You are terrible at this! Okay? You are the worst ultimate fighter ever! Ever!!ScenesPete: Y'know I have a torn rotator cuff, a hairline fracture in my right forearm, and a severely bruised Adams Apple, but that really hurt.ScenesMonica: Well then, y'know what? I care about you to much to watch you hurt yourself like this. So if you have to do this, then youre gonna have to do it without me.ScenesPete: Well if youre asking me to quit, then youre asking me to be someone Im not. Ive got to do this.ScenesMonica: Then Ive gotta go. Bye. (kisses him and starts to walk out)ScenesPete: Mon-Monica?ScenesMonica: Yes?ScenesPete: Could you leave a note? Cause Im on a lot of pain killers now, and I dont know if Ill remember this tomorrow. (She leaves.)

rows.Scenes: Chandlers office, he is just finishing up a meeting with his boss and the rest of his team.]
rows.Content: Doug: So, in conclusion, the lines all go up (points to the chart), so Im happy. Great job team! Tomorrow at 8:30. (They start to leave) Phil! Nice job. (smacks him on the butt) Stevens! Way to go! (smacks him on the butt) Joel-burg, you maniac! I love ya! (smacks him on the butt) (Chandler walks up) Bing! Good job, couldnt have done it without ya. (he shakes his hand)ScenesChandler: Thank you, sir.ScenesStevens: (coming back in) Oh, excuse me. I forgot my briefcase y'know, by accident.ScenesDoug: Of course, you did. Forgot something else too ya bastard! (smacks him on the butt) (to Chandler) Well, what about you? Youre not feeling left out or anything are ya?ScenesChandler: No. No, not at all, thats-thats ridiculous.ScenesDoug: Everybody else got one, and you want one too. Dont you?ScenesChandler: Ye-ye-yeah, yes I do!ScenesDoug: Now get on out of here, you! (smacks him on the butt)ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: Monica and Rachel's, the gang is watching Pete fight on TV. Monica is hiding in the kitchen, not watching.]
rows.Content: TV Announcer: Pete Becker is circling the ring now. It looks like, hes just trying to feel him out. Oh, Bruiser is just...ScenesChandler: Run! Run you crazy, rich freak!ScenesRachel: Oh, I cant watch this. (turns her eyes away)ScenesJoey: Check it out, hes winning! (to Monica) Petes winning!ScenesMonica: Really?!ScenesJoey: No-o-o!!ScenesTV Announcer: Uh-oh, Bruiser has Becker on the canvas and is going for his favourite area.ScenesAll: Oh! Oh! (they all recoil in horror)ScenesPhoebe: Wait, if thats his favourite area, why is he being so mean to it?ScenesRoss: Well, this is ironic. Of your last two boyfriends, Richard didnt want to have kids, and from the looks of it, now Pete cant.ScenesAll: Ohh!! (they all start pointing at the screen)ScenesEndScenesThe One At The BeachScenesStory by: Pan-ni Landrum & Mark J. KunerthScenesTeleplay by: Adam ChaseScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, everyone except Phoebe is there. Bonnie is telling them of her sex-capades.]
rows.Content: Chandler: (to Bonnie) So ah, your first sexual experience was with a woman?!ScenesBonnie: All right, I was 15, it was my best friend, Ruth, and we got drunk on that hard cider, and then suddenly, I dont know, we were, we were making out.ScenesChandler: Tell it again. (pause, we see Rachel is not amused.) Seriously.Scenes[cut to Rachel and Monica at the counter.]ScenesRachel: (to Monica) I mean is that woman capable of talking about anything else but sex?ScenesJoey: Yeah, sure. Well y'know, earlier she was talking about geography.ScenesMonica: Joey, she was listing the countries shes done it in.ScenesJoey: Well, I think we all learned something.ScenesPhoebe: (entering, hurridly) Hey, you guys! Look what I found! Look at this! (She hands Chandler a picture) Thats my Moms writing! Look.ScenesChandler: (reading the back of the picture) Me and Frank and Phoebe, Graduation 1965.ScenesPhoebe: Y'know what that means?ScenesJoey: That youre actually 50?ScenesPhoebe: No-no, thats not, thats not me Phoebe, thats her pal Phoebe. According to her high school yearbook, they were like B.F.F. (Ross and Bonnie look at her quizzically) Best Friends Forever.ScenesAll: Oh!ScenesRachel: That is so cool.ScenesPhoebe: I know! So this woman probably could like have all kinds of stories about my parents, and she might even know like where my Dad is. So I looked her up, and she lives out by the beach. So maybe this weekend we could go to the beach?ScenesAll: Yeah! Yeah, we can!ScenesBonnie: (to Ross) Shoot! I cant go, I have to work!ScenesRoss: Thats too bad.ScenesRachel: (sarcastic) Ohh, big, fat bummerrr.ScenesPhoebe: So great! Okay! Tomorrow were gonna drive out to Montauk.ScenesJoey: Hey, Bonnie had sex there!Scenes(Rachel turns and gives him a look, and Joey quickly apologises.)ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Outside Central Perk, Chandler and Monica are waiting for Phoebe to arrive with the cab.]
rows.Content: Monica: (watching a happy couple walk by, arm in arm) Would you look at them. Am I ever gonna find a boyfriend again? I gonna die an old maid.ScenesChandler: Youre not gonna die an old maid, maybe an old spinster cook.ScenesMonica: (sarcastic) Thanks!ScenesChandler: Hey now besides, if worst comes to worst, Ill be your boyfriend.Scenes(At that suggestion Monica starts laughing.)ScenesMonica: Yeah right.ScenesChandler: Why is that so funny?ScenesMonica: You made a joke right? So I laughed.ScenesChandler: Ha-ha-ha. A little to hard. What am I not ah, boyfriend material?ScenesMonica: Well, no. Youre Chandler. Y'know, Chandler! (hits him on the arm)ScenesChandler: Okay, so weve established my name, and hit me. But theoretically y'know, I mean say we werent friends, say its a blind date. I show up at your door, and Im like (in a fake voice) Hey, nice to meet, ya. Hey, oh-hey.ScenesMonica: Well Id probably be scared of a guy using a fake voice.ScenesJoey: (walking up carrying a brown paper bag) Hey!ScenesMonica: Oh, hey! Oh good, you brought food!ScenesJoey: No, its just my luggage.Scenes(Phoebe drives up.)ScenesChandler, Monica, and Joey: Hey!!ScenesJoey: Woo-hoo! All right! Yeah!ScenesPhoebe: Oh, I am having the best karma this week. First, I find this woman who knew my parents, and then my client with the fuzzy back gives me his beach house.ScenesRoss: Yeah? What about ah, that bike messenger you hit?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, I wasnt talking about his karma.ScenesRachel: (approaching) Hey!ScenesChandler: Hey!ScenesJoey: Hey-hey, check out the hat!Scenes(She is wearing this giant straw hat, the brim on it must be at least, least foot wide.)ScenesChandler: What a minute, I know that hat! I was taken aboard that hat! They did experiments on me! I cant have children!!ScenesMonica: Seriously, where did you get the hat?ScenesRachel: Ross gave it to me.ScenesRoss: Yeah, I think she looks good.ScenesRachel: Ohh, thank you.ScenesChandler: Buy it for ya, or win it for ya?ScenesRachel: Well excuse me, my fashion-impaired friends, I am here to tell you that hats are back.ScenesPhoebe: And this time, theyve ganged up to form one giant, super hat.

rows.Scenes: At the Beach, its raining cats and dogs as the gang arrives. Chandler and Monica are taking shelter under Rachels hat.]
rows.Content: Ross: Go, go, go!ScenesRachel: Oh yeah, now everybody wants to be under this hat!Scenes(They get inside and notice on small problem.)ScenesPhoebe: Oy!!ScenesMonica: Whats with all this sand? (picking a handful of sand off of the floor, which is covered in sand)ScenesPhoebe: Oh, yeah, Bob said there might be flood damage.ScenesRoss: Yeah, either that, or he has a really big cat.

rows.Scenes: Phoebe Sr. house, she is a real estate agent and is trying to sell a house over the phone. By the way, its still raining outside.]
rows.Content: Phoebe Sr: Well, yes, its kindve an unusual house. It has umm, three beautiful bedrooms and ah, no baths. But y'know, the ocean is right there.ScenesPhoebe: (at the door) Knock, knock, knock.ScenesPhoebe Sr: (on phone) Ah, oh, hang on a second. (to Phoebe) Come in, come in. (on phone) All right, so think about it, and call me back. (hangs up)ScenesPhoebe: (entering) Are you ah, Phoebe Abott?ScenesPhoebe Sr: Ahh, yes.ScenesPhoebe: Hi Phoebe Abott, Im your best friends daughter!ScenesPhoebe Sr: Youre Erwins daughter?!ScenesPhoebe: No, I-I mean your-your old best friend, here. (hands her the picture) Lily, from high school. Remember?ScenesPhoebe Sr: Oh gosh, Lily, yes. Of course I remember Lily. I... Then you must be?ScenesPhoebe: (points to herself) Phoebe. (points to her) Phoebe. Phoebe, yeah. She named me after you I guess.ScenesPhoebe Sr: Uh-huh. Wow! Well, look! Theres Frank. (points to the picture.)ScenesPhoebe: Yes!! Yes! Yes! Yes!! Thats my Dad, thats Frank! Yeah! Im sorry Im getting all flingy.ScenesPhoebe Sr: Take it easy--if you want, theres cookies on the counter, or, or--sangria! (jumps up) I can make sangria!ScenesPhoebe: No-no, sorry. Cookies are good, thanks.ScenesPhoebe Sr: Oh.ScenesPhoebe: (goes and gets some cookies) Well, so, umm, anyway umm, Ive been, Ive been looking for my Father, and umm, have you heard from him, or seen him?ScenesPhoebe Sr: Oh no, I-Im sorry, I guess we lost track of everybody after high school.ScenesPhoebe: (disappointed) Oh, okay. Well, so tell me everything about my parents. Everything.ScenesPhoebe Sr: Ohh, well. Y'know we were always together, in fact the had a nickname for the three of us.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, what? What was it?ScenesPhoebe Sr: The three losers. Oh, poor Lily. (Phoebe notices a picture on the fridge, takes it, and puts it in her pocket.) Ohh, y'know I-I heard about what happened, that must have been just terrible for you, losing your mother that way.ScenesPhoebe: (happily) Yeah, no, it was great.

rows.Scenes: The beach house, its still raining. Chandler is building a sand castle, Rachel is doing Monicas nails, and theyre all drinking margaritas, obviously bored.]
rows.Content: Joey: (getting an idea) Hey, y'know what a really good rainy day game is?ScenesMonica: What?!ScenesJoey: I mean naked game. Strip poker, we should totally play strip poker.ScenesAll: No, no!ScenesMonica: What are you crazy?!ScenesJoey: Come on! When you go away, you-you have to play, its like a law!ScenesRachel: (to Monica) Allll done!ScenesMonica: Aww, thank you.ScenesRachel: Okay, whos next?! (She looks around the room, and stops when she comes to Ross.)ScenesRoss: No-o-o! (Rachel gives him a Please? look.) No way!ScenesRachel: Come on, please?! Im boredddd! You let me do it once before.Scenes(Ross shoots Joey a look, who shoots Chandler a look, who gives Joey an Oh my God. look back.)ScenesRoss: Yeah well, if ah, if thats the rule this weekend... (She gets up) No!ScenesRachel: Yes! (she starts creeping up on him)ScenesRoss: Get away!ScenesRachel: Just once!ScenesRoss: Stay away!ScenesRachel: Take it like a man, Ross!ScenesRoss: (he gets up and starts to run away from her) No! (in his escape attempt he crushes Chandlers sand castle) No!ScenesRachel: Oh, come on!ScenesChandler: Big bullies!!Scenes(Ross dives over the couch, Rachel goes the other way, and lands up top of him.)ScenesRoss: Ow! Ow! Oh, no-no-no!Scenes(They get into a wrestling match, that ends with Ross making Rachel paint her forehead with the nail polish. They both end up lying next to each other, stop, and look at each other for a moment.)ScenesPhoebe: (entering) Oh, hey!ScenesChandler: Hey!ScenesRoss: Hey!ScenesPhoebe: Oh, so, how are we doing?ScenesChandler: Bored and bored!ScenesJoey: Hey, you know what naked card game is never boring?ScenesAll: Noo!!ScenesMonica: (to Phoebe) So whats Phoebe like?ScenesPhoebe: Im kind, caring, and sweet. Whats Monica like?ScenesMonica: Ah no, the other Phoebe, the one you went to go see.ScenesPhoebe: Ohh, I think she knows where my Dad is.ScenesJoey: What?ScenesRachel: Really?!ScenesMonica: Oh well, where is he?!ScenesPhoebe: She was acting, she was pretending like she hasnt heard from him on years, but I found this picture on her fridge, and look (shows Monica)! Isnt this what he would look like now?ScenesMonica: (gasps) Totally familiar. (Phoebe shows the rest of them.)ScenesRachel: Oh, yeah.ScenesThe Guys: Yeah!ScenesMonica: Well, why would she lie to you?ScenesPhoebe: I dont know, but were having dinner tomorrow night, so I figured, shes gonna tell me then. Y'know maybe she just wanted to give him time to, buy me presents, I dont know! So, youre all bored?ScenesAll: Ohh!!ScenesChandler: Yes!ScenesPhoebe: All right, Im gonna close my eyes and point to someone, and you, whoever I point has to come up with something fun for us to do, and we have to do it.ScenesJoey: Okay, all right.ScenesPhoebe: Okay.ScenesJoey: Fan out! Fan out!Scenes(They do so, and Phoebe gets in the middle, closes her eyes, and starts spinning in a circle.)ScenesPhoebe: Okay. (Starts to spin) Ooh, y'know we could just do this. (She stops at Chandler)ScenesChandler: Okay, umm, we all have to play strip poker.ScenesJoey: (jumping in triumph) OH YES!!!!!Scenes[cut to later]ScenesMonica: Strip Happy Days Game?ScenesJoey: Yeah, well, I couldnt find any cards, so it was either this or Strip Bag Of Old Knitting Stuff.Scenes(Monica rolls, and Ross goes first.)ScenesRoss: Okay, (reading the card) Fonzy gives you two thumbs up, collect two cool points. Yeah.ScenesPhoebe: Monica, if you get five cool points, you get to make somebody take off one item of clothing. It hasnt happened yet, but were all very excited.ScenesRoss: Okay, come on! (blows on the dice) Daddy needs a new pair of electromagnetic microscopes for the Prehistoric Forensics Department! (They all look at him, and he shuts up and rolls the dice.) (he moves his piece) Okay. (reading a card) Take Pinky Tuscadero up to Inspiration Point, collect three cool points!! Yeah! Which gives me five, and lets see who is gonna lose their clothes. Ummmm, I think I pick our strip poker sponsor Mr. Joey Tribianni.ScenesThe Girls: Woo-hooooo!!!!ScenesJoey: All right, relax. Its just a shoe.ScenesAll: Wooooo!!!!Scenes[cut to later in the game]ScenesRachel: (reading a card) Okay, your band is playing at Arnolds, collect three cool points. Which means, I have five, and that means I get Joeys boxers!ScenesJoey: Fine. Gang up on me! I got you all right where I want you.ScenesPhoebe: Come on, take em off!!ScenesJoey: Actually, y'know its kinda cold, so how about I keep my boxers on, and give you all a peek at the good stuff?ScenesRachel: (getting up) All right, Im gonna make more margaritas! (She pours the rest of the pitcher into Rosss glass.)ScenesRoss: Whoa, hey! What are doing? Trying to get me drunk?ScenesRachel: Im just making margaritas.ScenesRoss: Okay.ScenesMonica: I think Ill help her out. (She gets up to go over and help Rachel, and reveals she has no pants.) (to Rachel) What is going on here?ScenesRachel: What?!ScenesMonica: You painting his toenails?ScenesRachel: Oh, come on!ScenesMonica: Chasing him all around the room?ScenesRachel: Monica, please?ScenesMonica: Hes totally flirting with you too.ScenesRachel: (pause) He is, isnt he? I dont know, I dont know, I mean maybe its just being here at the beach together or, I dont know. But its like something... (shes interrupted by the sound of Bonnie entering)ScenesBonnie: Hey!ScenesRoss: Hey! (Rachel is shocked) Hi Bonnie!ScenesBonnie: Hi! My boss let me off early, so I took the train.ScenesRoss: Oh.ScenesBonnie: What are you guys doing?!ScenesJoey: Were playing Strip Happy Days Game!ScenesBonnie: Cool! Ill catch up! (She takes off her sweater.)ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: The beach house, the next morning. Chandler and Monica are in the kitchen eating breakfast.]
rows.Content: Chandler: So, you still dont think Im boyfriend material?ScenesMonica: Huh?ScenesChandler: I saw you checking me out during the game last night.ScenesMonica: You didnt even take off your pants.ScenesChandler: Yeah, well, lucky for you.ScenesMonica: What?ScenesChandler: I dont know.ScenesRachel: (entering) Well! Is everybody else having just the best time?!ScenesPhoebe: Shhh! Shhhh! Joeys asleep.Scenes(Joey is sleeping on the floor and is buried in sand that has been carved into a mermaid complete with breasts.)ScenesPhoebe: After he passed out, we put the sand around him to keep him warm.ScenesRachel: Well I assume the ah, happy couple isnt up yet. Did you guys hear them last night?ScenesChandler: Oh, yeah, I dont know what they were doing, but at one point sea turtles actually came up to the house.Scenes(Ross and Bonnie enter)ScenesRoss: Good morning.ScenesAll: Hey.ScenesBonnie: Hey! How did everybody sleep?ScenesRachel: Oh, great.ScenesMonica: Like a log.ScenesRoss and Bonnie: Us too.ScenesRachel: Im going for a walk.Scenes(Joey finally wakes up.)ScenesRoss: (to Joey) Good morning. Nice breasts by the way.Scenes(Joey looks down and his look turns from shock to satisfaction.)

rows.Scenes: The porch, Bonnie is coming back from swimming, Rachel is reading.]
rows.Content: Bonnie: Hey, what happened to you?ScenesRachel: Oh, ah nothin. I just felt like hangin out here and reading.ScenesBonnie: Oh, the water was sooo great! We jumped off this pier and my suit came off.ScenesRachel: Ohhhh, sorry I missed that.ScenesBonnie: Yeah, Joey and Chandler sure are funny.ScenesRachel: Ohh-ha-ha!ScenesBonnie: I think I brought back half of the beach in my hair. It was so much easier when I used to shave my head.ScenesRachel: Y'know, I gotta tell ya, I just loved your look when you were bald.ScenesBonnie: Really?!ScenesRachel: Ohh!ScenesBonnie: Because I think about shaving it all off again sometime.ScenesRachel: Really?!ScenesBonnie: Yeah!ScenesRachel: I mean you definitely should do that.ScenesBonnie: Y'know what, I should do it.ScenesRachel: Yeah!ScenesBonnie: Yeah, thank you Rachel, you are soo cool.ScenesRachel: Awww, stop. Come on. Now go shave that head!ScenesBonnie: All right.Scenes(As Bonnie goes to do just that, Rachel smiles to herself, proud of what shes done.)

rows.Scenes: The beach house, at night. Phoebe is hangs up the phone, and gently pushes one of the stools over.]
rows.Content: Joey: Whats the matter, Pheebs?ScenesPhoebe: She cancelled! My namesake cancelled on me!ScenesJoey: What?!ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, she clamed she had to go out of town suddenly. Shes avoiding me, she doesnt want to tell me where my Father is. She knows, and she wont tell me.ScenesRachel: Aww Pheebs, that sucks!ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, well, dont Aww Pheebs, that sucks! me yet. (she starts to leave)ScenesChandler: Where ya going?ScenesPhoebe: Well, shes out of town so, theres gotta be something in her house that tells me where my Father is.ScenesRoss: Uh, Pheebs, some people call that breaking and entering.ScenesPhoebe: Well, are any of those people here?!ScenesAll: Oh, no!! No, no!ScenesPhoebe: Okay, look I-I-I do something nice, okay? Ill-Ill fill her ice trays.Scenes(She exits just as Bonnie comes down the stairs, as bald as Michael Jordan.)ScenesBonnie: Hey, everybody!ScenesAll: Wow!! (they all recoil in shock and horror)ScenesRoss: Wh-haa-haa! Look what cha did! (Rachel has her hand over her mouth to keep from laughing.)ScenesBonnie: You wanna touch it?ScenesRoss: Nooo, but it, but its great.ScenesBonnie: Come on, touch it!ScenesRoss: Okay. (He gently touches it.) You can feel all the bones in your skull.

rows.Scenes: Outside the beach house, Ross is coming out to talk to Rachel.]
rows.Content: Ross: Hi.ScenesRachel: Hi!ScenesRoss: I was having a little chat with ah, Bonnie, and ah, guess what, she-she happened to bring up y'know, who was behind the um, whole head shaving idea, and now, who was it? Oh, thats right, thats right, it was you!ScenesRachel: That was her idea, I just gave her a nudge.ScenesRoss: She said you gave her the razor!ScenesBonnie: (joining them) Hey guys.ScenesRachel: Hey!ScenesBonnie: So, anyone up for a midnight dip in the ocean?ScenesRoss: Ahh, no, Im good.ScenesBonnie: Okay, Ill see you in a bit.ScenesRoss: Okay, have fun! Wooo!!ScenesRachel: Come on see, she doesnt look that bad.ScenesRoss: You can see the moonlight bouncing off her head! What the hell were you thinking?!!ScenesRachel: I dont know.ScenesRoss: You dont know?! Rach, you balded my girlfriend!ScenesRachel: All right! Ross, do you think its easy for me to see you with somebody else?ScenesRoss: Y'know, hey! Youre the one who ended it, remember?ScenesRachel: Yeah, because I was mad at you, not because I stopped loving you!ScenesRoss: You still love me?ScenesRachel: Noo.ScenesRoss: You still love me.ScenesRachel: Oh, y-yeah, so, you-you love me!ScenesRoss: Noo, nnnnn. What does this mean? What do you, I mean do you wanna, get back together?ScenesRachel: Noo! Maybe! I, I dont know. Ross, I still cant forgive you for what you did, I cant, I just, but sometimes when Im with you I just, I feel so...ScenesRoss: What?!ScenesRachel: I just, I feel, I-I just...ScenesRoss: What?ScenesRachel: I feel...Scenes(Ross leans in and kisses her. They both look at each other for a moment, and then embrace in a more passionate kiss, only to be interrupted by Joey and Chandler coming outside.)ScenesChandler: (to Joey) Noo!! I dont care! Im not, Im not gonna playing one-on-one strip poker with you for practice!Scenes(Rachel and Ross both stop kissing, and quickly step back from each other.)ScenesJoey: But I made cards!!ScenesRachel: Well! Good night. (to Ross) Im going upstairs.ScenesJoey and Chandler: Gnight.Scenes(Rachel walks inside, stops, and turns back to look at Ross for a moment then goes upstairs.)ScenesJoey: (to Ross) Wanna play strip poker for practice?

rows.Scenes: Phoebe Sr.s house, Phoebe is breaking in through a window.]
rows.Content: (She throws her bag inside, and starts to climb through the window. She gets halfway in and the window slams shut on her butt.)ScenesPhoebe: Ow! My ass. Okay. Okay. (She manages to climb completely inside and the window slams shut.) Oh, shhh!Scenes(She starts walking across the darkened room and hits her head on a wind chime hanging from the ceiling, to stop it from making a noise she grabs it and Shhhs it. She goes into the kitchen and finds Phoebe Sr.s appointment book, to read it she opens the freezer. Just as she starts to read, Phoebe Sr. jumps out from her bedroom with a coat hanger, startling Phoebe.)ScenesPhoebe: No! No!! Its me! Its me! I-I didnt want to make any noise!ScenesPhoebe Sr: Then don't break in!!ScenesPhoebe: Im sorry.ScenesPhoebe Sr: What are you doing here?!ScenesPhoebe: I-I, came to fill your ice cube trays.ScenesPhoebe Sr: What?!ScenesPhoebe: Umm, okay, okay, look. I took this picture from your fridge. Okay, because I know that this is my Father. Yeah, this is Frank Buffay and you are standing right there next to him. Now, look I deserve to know where I came from. All right? So if you can help me find my Father then you should! Otherwise, youre just mean! (pause) So, just tell me the truth!ScenesPhoebe Sr: All right, the man in the picture is Chuck Magioni.ScenesPhoebe: My Father is Chuck Magioni?ScenesPhoebe Sr: No, no, thats just Chuck Magioni, I-I sold him a house last year! And Im very sorry, but I dont know where your Father is, and thats the truth.ScenesPhoebe: Oh.ScenesPhoebe Sr: But umm, youre right. I think that a person should know where they come from. Wh-which is why I ah, (pause) ahh, (pause) okay. Im your mother.ScenesPhoebe: Heh?ScenesPhoebe Sr: Y'know I wanted to tell you yesterday, but I just, I kinda felt all floopy, and...Scenes(At that Phoebes eyes open in shock.)

rows.Scenes: Outside the beach house, Ross is telling Joey and Chandler what happened with Rachel.]
rows.Content: Joey: Im telling ya, you guys are totally getting back together!ScenesRoss: Thats not true! Her, she doesnt even know what she wants! Rachels still mad about the whole thing.ScenesChandler: Okay, then you gotta back away, all right? You dont need that kindve hurt. Take it from a guy whos never had a long term relationship......ScenesRoss: I know, but ahhhhhh!! I really wanna go up there and finish that kiss!ScenesBonnie: (coming back from her swim) Hey!ScenesChandler: Ahhhh! (Steps away from her.)ScenesBonnie: You guys, the waters great. You should really go in.ScenesChandler: Oh, ahh, no thanks, I just had an M&M.ScenesBonnie: Okay, well gnight.ScenesRoss: Good night.ScenesBonnie: (kisses Ross) Dont be too long.ScenesRoss: Okey-dokey!ScenesChandler: There is not one hair on that head.ScenesRoss: Hey, itll grow back, right? And she-shes really fun, and shes cool, and-and Im finally moving on. Y'know? I mean getting over Rachel was so (makes an incoherent nasal sound), y'know? Y'know, and Im finally feeling sane again. And now if I go up there, and-and I kiss her, and, Gooood I wanna kiss her, and-and-and it doesnt work out, right? Do I really wanna put myself through that again?ScenesJoey: So let me get this straight. If you go with Bonnie tonight, youre doing the smart, healthy thing and moving on.ScenesRoss: Yeah.ScenesJoey: Right, and you go with Rachel, Bonnies free tonight?

rows.Scenes: The hallway between the bedrooms. Ross is coming upstairs and stops between two doors. He looks at the one on the right, then he looks at the one on his left, thinks about it, and goes in the one on his right.]
rows.Content: Ross: (entering the bedroom) Hi. (closes the door)ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: The beach house, Chandler is simulating hes coming to pick up Monica for a date. Chandler knocks on the door, and Monica answers it.]
rows.Content: Chandler: (in a fake voice) Hi there.ScenesMonica: Thats that weird voice again.ScenesChandler: Okay! Okay! Let me try it again, youre gonna wanna date this next guy, I swear!Scenes(Monica closes the door, Chandler knocks, and Monica opens it to reveal Chandler on his knees.)ScenesChandler: Hi! Im Dorf! Youre date for the evening. (Monica walks away in disgust) Oh come on! Dorf on dating, thats good stuff!!ScenesEnd
